item.text: @#/ /rgyud nya pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra maN+Da a laM ka ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad
du| dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i
dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor
@##/ /bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes
rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i
cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag
rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna
tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i
las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa/ /kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs
pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi 'phan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye
bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzang 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
@#/ /kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med
khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de
bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sku/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhugs so/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos
ston par mdzad do/ /thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar
ba| chos thams cad kyi tshul yongs su dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis
su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po/ chos
thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs
rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems don
yod pa| yongs su bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po snang ba'i me tog /bzhad pa po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo/ skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa
@#/ /can| srung ba po/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba/ yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes
can| khyab bdag chen po/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su grong
pa rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes
snying po| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang
bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po/ gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i
spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs
pa can| rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen tog de 'od byed pa/ /'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon/ /don yod pa ni las kun byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor
rtog pa'i ye shas gnyis su med pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs
pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs
pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
@#/ /phyug gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs
shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brdabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/
bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhAHoM hUM badzra sa mA dzaH/ de nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi
gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin khyab par mthong ngo / /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros kyis ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par
gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa de/ ngas bshad par bya'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /b+hUM/
de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med/ /don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs//
gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs so/ /zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlabs par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal
bzhi po rnams las chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu
dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems pa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas
gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /zhe
sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub
sems dpa'i gnas so/ /nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin
pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam
par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
gnas so/ /ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang
chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/
'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa
de ni| 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par
dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams
cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug/
gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po/ /sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba/ bstan pa la rdzi ba med pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
snying po bka' stsal pa/ b+hUM/ 'jam dpal/ gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan gcig tsam yang thos na/ de'i
@#/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po thams
cad nye bar bsags kyang nam yang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par
'gyur ro/ /gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni/ skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo
rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par
mdzad do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang
chub chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las
thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal/ gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di thos nas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang /
sgom par byed na/ ji srid byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa yang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /aM| de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos
thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags
kyi spros pa med pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi spro ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad spros pa med
pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/
@#/ /gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na/ des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams
gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro//
hUM| de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i
dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir
yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no/ /'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no/ /'jig rten
gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no/ /'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin no/ /'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid
yin no| |'jam dpal/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed pa 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na
gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang
bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po
yongs su thob par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang
zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /trAM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya
brnyes pa/ thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya
@#/ /ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge
'dzin thams cad thob pa'i dan du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam
dpal| gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs
pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par
'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro/ /AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa
med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba'i
phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i
phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /AM/ de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas
byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas
pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub
@#/ /kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can
thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid
dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid bas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas
khro ba rdo rje nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i
de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid
pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang
chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad
rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos
kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying bo'o/ /hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de
@#/ /bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par
byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byad na/ de ni/ dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol
bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /b+h+yo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu
grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen
po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha'
dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing
lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro/ /swaM /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa/ /de srid mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin
@#/ /pa'i thabs/ /ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub/ /las ni thams cad rnam dag pa'i/ /srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro/ /chags sogs rab ldan 'jig
rten ni| |kun nas srid par sdig byed pa/ /de dag rnam par sbyang don du/ /de rnams 'dod chags chen po 'dzin/ /ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba/ /dmar ba'i skyon gyis ma gos
ltar| |bag chags skyon gyi srid pa ru/ /rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa/ /bde ba chen po nor chen po/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su//
de dag don ni brtan par byed/ /haH'jam dpal/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid nyin re bzhin du nang par langs te
gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / rjod par byed na/ des bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos
grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyi shu

rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni/ nges par shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di ltar/ oM na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra tsA R+Ye d+hi/ oM

tsin+ta ma Ni/ oM a ni ro d+he/ oM dzat+ti bi b+ha te/ oM dzA ti pa ri wa ra te/ oM mahA rA gA d+harma te/ oM bIR+Ya ka wa tse/ oM sarba gA mi ni/ oM badzra dr-i D+haHka wa tsi te hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/

oM swa b+ha bi shud+d+he/ oM pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ oM ni suM b+ha badzri hUM phaT/ oM kar+m+ma rA ge/ oM badzra hUM badzre/ oM hUM sarba gA ma NI oM hrIH/ oM A kA ro mu khe

oM pra dz+nyA pa ra mi te/ oM a ma hUM oM aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka bi sho d+ha ne/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzre aH/ oM s+pho Ta ya sarbA pa ya big+h+naM ni pra mok+Sha
ya sarbA pa ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badzra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos
grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'am/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi
'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang
nus pa ma yin no/ /gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung du na yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas sems can de sangs rgyas
@#/ /mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang la la gang+ga'i
klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan
par nus so/ /sa'i khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ phyag bya ba'i gnas so/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bzung ba'am/
glegs bam du bris par gyur na/ de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod do/ /rgyal po
chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te/ de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur zhing /tshul ma yin pas dus
byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye
bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po/ /mchog tu
gsang ba'i dam tshig/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /mtshan nyid gcig
pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma
nas rnam par dag pa'o/ /thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /aHb+h+rUM trAM hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad shin tu gsal bas snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba bshad par bya'i/ nyon cig /de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs
la| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po la rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs par byos shig /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te byin gyis brlabs nas de las thon te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis
rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje snying po gsang chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ /rdo rje snying po dang
mtshungs pa/ /khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang / /gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje
kun gyi rang bzhin grong / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog chun pos spras/ /gra yi cha ni thams cad
dang / /sgo 'gram dang ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi phyi rol tu bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun/ /sgo
khyud du ni rin chen ni/ /mchog tu rmad byung gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun bzhag pa/ /bum pa la sogs dag gis
spras| |tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas brgyan/ /ra ba ra ba chen po ni/ /ri bo gnyis kyi phyi rol tu/ /sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba/ /khyad par ji
bzhin bri bar bya/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam bzhir bya/ /gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang / /gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang / /zla ba phyed pa'i tshul 'dra ba/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni bzhi pa'o//
de yi nang gi cha la ni/ /pad+ma lo ma brgyad pa bri/ /de ltar shes rab chen po yi/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bris/ /de yi rjes su lha rnams kyi/ /go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /gdugs dkar
@#/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / /gzi brjid dra ba rnam par rgyal/ /dam tshig mchog gi rnam pa bzhi/ /slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams su bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis
song nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru/ /mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri/ /mi bskyod ba yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya//
der ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che/ /shes rab chen pos dgod par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'i/ /
rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin/ /rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa/ /don yod grub pa'i dkyil
'khor ro/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya/ /rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yin/ /rdo rje snying po rgyal
po che| |khyab bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo/ /byams pa bdag nyid chen
po dang / /nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po/ /kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang / /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs
kyi mchog /sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med/ /sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel/ /de nang sa yi snying po mchog /nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa/ /lag na rin chen bla na med/ /
mi phan pa kun 'joms pa ni/ /dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya/ /dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che/ /dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya/ /'khor lo de ni dor nas ni/ /blo gros ldan pas
phyir song ste/ /shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya go rim bzhin du dgod/ /'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs ris/ /rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya/ /gtsug tor rnam pa
sna tshogs pa/ /rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsil dang / /chos gos kyang ni khyad par du/ /'di dag shAkya seng+ge sogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu
gsungs/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /de rnams blo ldan brtan pas bri/ /byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi /phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te/ /pad+ma ut+pal nyi
dang ni| |spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang / /dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis/ /ma myos pa ru bri bar bya/ /slar yang lho ru song nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /slob dpon
bdag nyid chen po yi/ /phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje pan+Ti sha dang ni/ /dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang / /dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang / /dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshan pa dang / /lcags sgro
@#/ /dang ni rtse gsum yang / /'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni/ /'jam dpal dbyangs ni blo gros kyi/ /gsang ba'i chos ni dam
pa'i mchog /brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri/ /ut+pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /ral gri yang ni khyad par du/ /thod pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /rma bya dang ni seng+ge nyid/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams
brtson 'grus che/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/ /phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru ni/ /rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya
sogs| |bdag nyid che po 'bad pa yis/ /mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang
ni| |khyad par du ni ro dang yang / /reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /sgo yi nang ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya/ /de bzhin dkyil
'khor gzhan pa ru/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /go rim bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi/ /yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes
bya ba dang / /shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang / /phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan/ /ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma/ /thams cad shar du dgod par bya/ /de nas blo gros ldan pa
yis| |byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che/ /khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma/ /khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang / /mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /de
la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ /bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs su rab
phyin la| |mA ma kI dang lcags sgrog dang / /khab rtse rdo rje mtshan mchog dang / /de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis/ /nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni/ /der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis/ /sgra
gcan stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyu dang / /lha mo zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams su ni/ /lha mo nye ba'i skra can ma/ /'bad pa yis ni

bri bar bya/ /rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang / /'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan/ /gra yi cha ru bri bya ba/ /rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs/ /sgo yi nang ni thams cad bya/ /sgo skyong ba ni rnam par
bri| |gzhan gyi mi thub lha mo che/ /de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog /rdo rje dregs ma lha mo che/ /rdo rje kum+b+hi yang dag bri/ /de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni/ /thams cad las ni thon nas su//
shar gyi cha ni thams cad du/ /sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang / /khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni/ /mnga'
@#/ /bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor/ /shar du bris nas sngags pa yis/ /de nas byang gi char song ste/ /rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang / /skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par
du'o| |khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa/ /khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che/ /pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang / /ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bka'
stsal to| |de nas blo gros ldan pa yis/ /lho yi phyogs su song nas ni/ /der ni phyin te brtson chen po/ /khro bo chen po stobs po che/ /rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa/ /shes rab
chen pos dgod par bya/ /khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang / /de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang / /sgra gcan khro bo stobs po che/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /rdo rje sa 'og sa 'og dang / /de
bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang / /rkang pas bsnun pa'i rdo rje mchog /gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang / /bran dang pho nya khro bo ni/ /stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor/ /de
ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis/ /nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni/ /der ni song ste brtson chen po/ /gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba/ /gdong drug pa la lag drug pa/ /khro bo yi ge bdun
zhes bgyi/ /khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni/ /bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du/ /khro bo gtum po thams cad bri/ /de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas
su| |rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ /de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni/ /rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs lha/ /dkyil 'khor
kun tu rnam par bri/ /dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang / /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang / /gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong / /rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa
gsum dang / /mtha' bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang / /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / /tshangs pa mthun na 'don pa rnams/ /tshangs chen rnams dang / 'od chung rnams
dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams bskyes
rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i
gnas rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o/ /de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / /mer me lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang /
bden bral du bden bral dang / chur chu lha dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya
@#/ /chen po dgod par bya'o/ /lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o/ /nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen
po dgod par bya'o/ /byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o/ /phyi rol tu ra ba dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba
lnga po gzhag par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ dra ba dang /
dra ba phyed pas sgrubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar
rgyas pa de'i steng du rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshogs mchod la mnyes par byas
te| mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas nam mkha'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
rgya chen po rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par bzhag ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje sems
dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ rnam par snang mdzad nga'o snyam du snyems pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das
pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems dpa' hUM
mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te dam tshig gi
phyag rgya bcings la cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag pa byas nas se gol gyi sbyor ba dang / kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag
rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /de la de'i snying po bzhi po ni/
a A/ aM aHbdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang par bya'o/ /de la snying po ni/ 'di yin te/ b+hUM trAM hrIHhUM/ oM badzra
@#/ /sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha a gats+tshan+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri br-i tA/ pra t+ye ka ri ha ha te swAhA/ oM badzra sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba ta thA ga ta
badzra yo gi shwa ra/ satwa na yeH/ sra hA a hAH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs
su rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzugs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
gzhug par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badzra badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+Than+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta mahA maN+Da laM/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyi /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar
bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang
ste byin gyi brlab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma
gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags

'dis snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badzra a d+hiSh+Tha naM ku ru mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ye Shu me ya d+hi tiSh+Than+tu sarba bud+d+ha mAM pra be sha yan+tu/ pra ti pA la

yan+tu| pU dzAny+tsa me pra yan+tu/ pra biSh+Tos+thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra maN+Dal/ a laM kA re ma hA badzra maN+Da le pra ti ba la yan+tu mAM stu dzAny+tsa me pra yats+tshan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me
tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang / sor mo'i rtsa mor me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o/ /hUM d+h+waM hrIM kruM shruM
@#/ /dzruM baHkaHpraM khiM shriM dzruM haM maM/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha maM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+wa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o/ /sngags
ni| sa ma yo haM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o/ /sa ma yo haM/ sa

ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ ta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badzra hUM/ bi kr-i ta bi d+yu dz+dzi hwA dur dAn+ta da ma ka/ ha si ta lam+bo da ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/

aT+TA T+Ta ha sa/ da ra bi da ra/ badzra badzrod ga ta/ badzra nai tra/ badzra shro tra/ badzra g+h+ra Na/ badzra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si pra bi sha/ badzra pA Ni hri da ya mA bi sha mA bi sha /g+hur+Na gur+Na/ pUr+Na pUr+Na/ g+hur+NA

pa ya g+hur+NA pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a be sha ya/ dzalpA dzalpA/ dzalpA ya dzalpA ya/ la g+hu la g+hu/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzA ka ra pra ba ra/ d+harma lap+d+ha/ bi dza ya/ he he badzra
dz+haM kA ra hUM kr-i ta swAhA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig /de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba'i ma mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes 'di'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin
pa'am| dge ba'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo / /zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du
yongs su bzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du
'ong ba'am/ seng+ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro
dang reg dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i
dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par

bya ste| oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzroSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM badzra s+t+wa a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badzra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa
dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / rked pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la/ rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i cho ga rnams brlab
@#/ /par bya ste/ de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni/ 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas
'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su
shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par rig par
'gyur ro/ /oM/ 'dod chags kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /ha/ zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba'i
phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyur ro/ /mai/ gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i
mtha' ste/ rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /raM/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa
yid la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /hrIM/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa
la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas
'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /oM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos
rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /aM/ bdud kyi las
thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /hUM/
ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su
rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /paM/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las
'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /maM/ chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro/ /
@#/ /khaM/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te/ /bdag gi de nyid dang brtags nas/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur/ /
de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid
bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin
nyid dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis/ /
sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis/ /sangs rgyas
kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i/ /kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam
par bzhag pas bsgom/ /yo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /rgyal po'i
dbang bskur nyid dam ni/ /yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /de ni rang gis brtan por bsgom/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang / /thob na dngos grub
gzhan ci smos/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang / /de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur/ /de lta bu'i byang chub kyi
sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid
kyi| |dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /gdugs
dkar gtsug tor chen po ni/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che/ /de ni yang
dang yang du bsgom/ /chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid/ /mdor bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi/ /dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /legs par rab gnas
'od zer can/ /dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa/ /phyag rgya
@#/ /de rnams bdag nyid mchog /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gcig bu nyid/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/
sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog /sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med/ /bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /da ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o/ /
zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o/ /oM paM/ a zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
bshad par bya'o/ /oM a A aM aH/ pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta
bar bya'o/ /oM paM/ na zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams
cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /oM naM/ da zhes bya ba ni/ 'dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do/ /oM daM/ sa
zhes bya ba ni/ thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang //
khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /oM sruM/ ta zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin nyid
kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o/ /oM taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni/ las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos
thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o/ /oM kaM/ ma zhes bya ba ni/ sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang / shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
gsal bar bshad do/ /oM maM/ ga zhes bya ba ni/ zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM gaM/ dza zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs
su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM dzaM/ d+ha zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos
thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM d+hi/ sha zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM shaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni/
@#/ /gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par
gzhag go /oM khaM/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni/ g.yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM k+ShaM/ nga zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM daM/ tha zhes bya ba ni/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM thaM/ D+ha zhes bya ba ni/ sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar
thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /oM D+haM/ dz+ha zhes bya ba ni/ myur du 'chi ba med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM dz+haM/ ka zhes bya ba ni/ lus rnam par spyod pa 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i
phyir chos thams cad kyis sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM kaM /A zhes bya ba ni/ sems rnam par spyod pa nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi
sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM aM/ ba zhes bya ba ni/ ngag rnam par spyod pa ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings
rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM baM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni/ grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta
bar bya'o/ /oM tshaM/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni/ gcig tu 'dis pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM g+haM/ Ta
zhes bya ba ni/ ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis
gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /oM phaM/ Da zhes bya ba ni/ dgra chen po las grol ba'i mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir
chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM DaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni/ tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM ShaM/ u zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad
nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /oM UM/ ya zhes bya ba ni/ rgyun du byed pa nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye
@#/ /bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM yaM/ ta zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na nyid spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos
thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /oM taM/ hu zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do/ /oM
hUM| hrI zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su gzung ba med pa 'thab pa rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM hrIM/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med
pa ni| mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM ka kha ga g+ha nga / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams
cad kyi sgor gnas so/ /oM tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ snang ba ni/ gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /oM Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ sgom pa ni/ chos thams cad gnyis su mi
gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /oM ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni/ chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /oM pa pha ba
b+ha ma| byang chub ni/ chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o/ /oM yang la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ glo bur ba thams cad nges par
dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
blta bar bya'o/ /oM sha Sha sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam
par nges pa'o/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas/ /ri rab chen po
gru bzhi pa/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /de yi steng du pad+ma bzhag /'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ba/ /rnal 'byor ston zhes rnam par bshad/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom
par bya| |mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni/ /bskal mthar yang ni de gnas 'gyur/ /b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor
pa gnas mi bzad pa/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /sems can kun la thams
@#/ /cad du| |gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas/ /de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos/ /gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres
pa| |gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni/ /de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms
na| |sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal po che/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang
phyug ni| |rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni/ /mnyam med 'khor los bsgyur ba mtshungs/ /gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che/ /lag par mnyam par bzhag pa bsgom/ /'bar ba'i
phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni/ /rang bzhin gzi brjid phung por 'gyur/ /gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug
tor gyis/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya/ /ral gri 'bar
ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs/ /zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par
bzhag pas bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis/ /de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /kun
tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs/ /mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dang
mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che/ /de yi don du bsgoms nas
ni| |'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /skye rgu thams cad chags
'gyur na/ /bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms par bya/ /legs so ba ni rang gsol bas/ /bung med thams cad tshim par
byed| |byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom/ /de yi dar thod dbang
bskur thob/ /rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /snying gar gnas pa bsgom par bya/ /kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed/ /rin chen tog gi
@#/ /phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog /sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed/ /rdo rje bzhad pas phyag rgya
che| |legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te/ /de ni skye rgu dga' byed 'gyur/ /dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /pad+ma yi ni pad+ma che/ /
dag pa'i chos ni mnyam bzhag pas/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ /mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/ /shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno/ /bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang / /shes
rab pha rol phyin dag pa/ /stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /dam pa'i don du bsgom bya ste/ /mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs/ /rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che/ /legs par
mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse/ /mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor/ /rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo
rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis/ /ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni/ /kun nas kun nas
rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje srung ba byams pa che/ /rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste/ /chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /rdo rje
gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che/ /khro bo chen po stobs po che/ /dam pa'i don gyi bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin
du| |rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster/ /phreng ba yang ni dbang bskur ba/ /glu mas mdzes
pa'i sgra dbyangs byed/ /gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/ /dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te/ /me tog byang chub yan lag nyid/ /sgron mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o/ /bdug pas bdug
pa dag la brtson/ /lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zhags pas dbang po'ang 'ching 'gyur na/ /gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos/ /
lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang / /tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching / /'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na/ /dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos/ /'di nyid
kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/ /'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad
par du| |spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /yi ge yis na yongs gang bar/ /gzugs brnyan gcig gis go 'phang gyur/ /sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur bar bsam/ /sal rab
@#/ /gnas pad+ma ni/ /dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad/ /dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas/ /dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi
pa| |dbang chen gi ni las su bshad/ /chu ni zlum par shes par bya/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mas rnam par mtshan/ /zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan/ /zhi ba'i don du de bshad de/ /me ni gru
gsum shes par bya/ /sum mdo yi ni gnas su bshad/ /dbang du bya ba bsgrub don du/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od/ /mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
dam pa ste/ /ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar/ /nag po yang ni khyad par du/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor
nas sbyangs te/ /tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag /dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhag /de yi rjes su rin chen te/ /pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor/ /grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad/ /phyag rgya
thams cad kyi ye shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ /gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs
su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rtag pa dang chad pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
ba'o| |zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi
mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas
rgyas btab pa'o/ /sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings
yongs su khyab pas chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dad tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad
stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'tshe ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag
rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin
@#/ /nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas
rgyas btab pa'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos
thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
pa'o| |rang bzhin gyi bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad
pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mi rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /
byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang
bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
pa'o| |rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi
dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med
pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i
@#/ /phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed
dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams
cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
pa'o| |mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir
chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /thams cad
kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi
phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas
rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams
cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad kyi chos kyi
dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /muH/ 'jam dpal/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni/ mi
mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg
pa chen po'i tshig ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / chos kyi
@#/ /phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / byang chub kyang byung ba yin no/ /a i aHAM/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o/ /hUM/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /khaM/ de nas de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba
thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi dbus su rtag tu bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma
chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /de yi steng du rtag sgom pa/ /yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /kha ba ba mo'i 'od 'dra 'od//
dpa' bo kun da zla ltar dkar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal/ /zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
ra sa ya na dang mtshungs mchog /kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya/ /thig le nA das rnam par spras/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu mjes/ /thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i bdag /de
yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de yi steng du sgron ma che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /de yi steng du rtag bsams pa/ /yi ge mchog gi go 'phang
ngo / /man ngag mchog las shes bya ste/ /gzhan du na ni nga mi smra/ /sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/ /rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas/ /
thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min/ /lce ni rka na la sbyar bar bya/ /sna yi rtse mor yi ge hUM/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas
rang sems bsgom/ /snang ba med cing spros med pa/ /shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya/ /khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos/ /bsam bya bsam gtan brtson byas te/ /mig dang sgron
ma'i 'od bzhin du/ /kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ /mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas ni/ /dkar po ser po sngon po 'od/ /dmar po yang ni thams cad du/ /'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa
yis| |sgrub po dam pas mtshon par bya/ /snying gar gsal bar byas nas su/ /de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song / /gnas de las ni thon nas kyang / /dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//
de las thon nas 'jig rten ni/ /mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du/ /slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni/ /de ni 'jig pa rab tu bsam/ /yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni/ /rang nyid 'khor
los bsgyur lta bu/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang / /mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur/ /ji
@#/ /snyed bud med yon tan dang / /ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni/ /bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su/ /dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya/ /de rnams lhan cig yongs
bsten nas/ /sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob/ /gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa che/ /zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa mchog/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag
pas bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che/ /de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /mchog ni rtag par shes par bya/ /bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan
med mchog /smon pa med pa zhes su grags/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed/ /sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad
thob| |rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /theg chen mchog tu yid 'ong
ba| |stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /gang gis rtag tu sgom byed na/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /yon tan mchog las skye bar 'gyur
bud med gang zhig sngo bsangs ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis/ /yongs reg A ling+ga tsum+pas/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
bud med kha dog ljang gu gang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de tshe de ni sngags pas bsten/ /mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar//
pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad/ /dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma/ /sngags
pas de dang lhan cig gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur/ /bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs/ /gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags pa cho ga shes pas bsten/ /rig 'dzin
rnams kyi stobs chen 'gyur/ /gsang chen ma ra ka ta mtshungs/ /gang gis rtag tu bsten pa ni/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ /bud med pad+ma rA ga 'dra//
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/
gang gis rtag tu sgom pa ni/ /mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms na ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar//
rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur/ /yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug
@#/ /mtshungs| |so sor yang dag rig pa bzhi/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs/ /mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang
'dra| |mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi/ /shin tu
mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po/ /tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni/ /
rdo rje sbyor bar bdag bsgoms na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub/ /sbyor pa'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//
mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs/ /yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /'khor los bsgyur pa brtson 'grus che/ /stobs 'dzin lta
bu nyid du 'gyur/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun/ /gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni/ /rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis/ /khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par
'gyur| |'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten shes las rab tu 'da'/ /rjes
su dran pa rnam pa drug /bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na/ /sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru/ /sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur/ /stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgom/ /sgom pa'i rnal 'byor
de nyid kyis/ /bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te/ /rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs/ /stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang / /sa rnams
kun ni des bskyed nas/ /myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur/ /bud med nu ma shin tu bsnun/ /rje ngar rje ngar de bzhin du/ /mchu yis mchu ni yongs su bzung / /'bad pas dam du
A ling+ga/ /rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che/ /rdo rje dbyings su bdag bstan pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ka
ra Na| |rnal 'byor shes pa de bsten bya/ /sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su/ /bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi
b+ha gar bsnun/ /ling+ga myur du gang bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis/ /stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub/ /gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o//
gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i/ /chos su grags pa gang yin pa/ /de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni/ /dngos grub
@#/ /thams cad rab rdzogs pa/ /ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad/ /sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste/ /de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster
byed| |bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni/ /gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang / /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum
cu bdun/ /chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba/ /de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing / /sbyor ba thams cad
thams cad du 'o/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam/ /ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'/ /mchod dang
dbang bskur byin brlabs pas/ /rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no/ /zhu zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / /bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang zhing / /de
bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang / /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /khyad par du ni dus kun du'o/ /thog ma bar dang phyi ma red du/ /ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni/ /brtan pa'i snying po legs par bshad/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems
dpar de bshad do/ /'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya/ /don yod ye shes dag pa ste/ /rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad/ /rdo rje chags pas
chags gyur nas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur/ /'gro ba ma lus lus med pa/ /de yi sems ni chags par bshad/ /chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam par
dben zhing gnyis su med/ /gang tshe dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong / /de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis/ /ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
mnyam sbyor ba/ /sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste/ /sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso/ /rdo rje dbang bskur las
byung ba| |de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te/ /rnyog pa med cing yi ge med/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog /brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen
po| |chos rnams thams cad legs gnas pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che/ /rdo rje tog ni bla na med/ /ye shes snang ba rin chen che/ /yongs su skye ba yongs su blta/ /de bzhin gshegs
kun gsang ba ni/ /rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su bshad/ /chos kyi bdag med las byung ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /chos nyid dam pa bsam du med/ /rdo rje chos zhes rab tu grags//
@#/ /rdo rje blo gros snang ba che/ /shes rab ye shes dri med mchog /zag med shes rab chen po pa/ /de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo/ /gnyis
su med las byung bar mtshon/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel mang / /rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad/ /dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog /yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che/ /de ni rdo rje sma bar bshad/ /sems can kun gyi don la sbyar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /de ni rdo rje lus su
bshad| |bla na med pa'i byams pa che/ /bsrung ba'i bya ba gong na med/ /dga' ba'i chos ni brtson chen po/ /rdo rje srung ba zhes su grags/ /shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che/ /sangs rgyas
kun dang rjes mthun pa/ /nyon mongs thams cad za ba che/ /de ni gnod sbyin chen por brjod/ /lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi gsang / /de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis stobs po che/ /thog ma mtha' ma med zhi ba/ /rig pa mchog ces bya bar
