bshad| |de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs

pa/ oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bud+d+h+ya shud+d+h+ya la li ho/ /su b+ha ga /su ra ta/ ma hA ma hA a d+hi ma hA bud+d+hi bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo gA shwa ra ta thA tA b+hA bi twA ta ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las
'khrungs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos/ /gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po/ /rdo rje can kun la phyag
'tshal| |de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal/ /mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa/ /mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal/ /'dren pa rnams kyi stobs
po che| |hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang / /shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po/ /rdo rje ye shes dri ma med/ /rnam par
dag ba rdo rje mchog /dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog/ dus gsum bsam pa dbang gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /
khyab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan las/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
sla zla yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gar zhugs te bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor
@#/ /chen po'i phyag rgya'i don du zhu ba zhus pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
skyob pa'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes/ /sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang / /phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
su ni| |'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas/ /rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs/ /rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni/ /lte ba'i gnas su legs
brtag pa/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /ge sar bltams pas rab tu mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ /rnam par snang mdzad brtson
chen po| |sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams dgod/ /shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can/ /gtsug tor dkar
po nub tu ste/ /gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas/ /dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri/ /mer ni steng 'gro dgod par bya/ /steng 'gro chen po bden bral
du| |rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas 'di dag bri/ /mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /
nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur/ /byang du don yod grub pa'i ming / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
bri| |thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i//
lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya/ /rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa/ /sgo srung 'bad pas bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor la
gnas pa/ /kun tu bzang sogs rim bzhin bri/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang / /pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang / /khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang / /de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo/ /rgya mtsho
yi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal pa'o/ /phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming / /dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su/ /'jig rten skyong
ba brgyad po bri/ /tshangs po khyab 'jug dbang chen ming / /dbang po la sogs lha thams cad/ /ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams/ /rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas/ /de bzhin lha rnams thams
cad dang / /brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding / /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /khyad par du ni mchod par bya/ /me tog bdug spos rol mo dang / /de
@#/ /bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs/ /phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis/ /mchod
pa kun gyis thams cad nas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug /yongs su dag pa khyad par du/ /byang
chub sems ni bskyed nas su/ /byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa/ /cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug /'dren pa rnams la mchod du gzhug /rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis//
dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin/ /seng+ge'i khri yi steng du ni/ /dar dang me tog chun pos spras/ /dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che/ /bla bre rgya che 'bar ba dang / /de yi g.yas kyi drung
du ni| |mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya/ /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul/ /g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas/ /'bad pa yis ni gzhag
par bya| |rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i/ /bum pa legs par bzhag byas te/ /rdo rje chu sogs dbang bskur gyis/ /de la rang gis dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang
bskur ba/ /mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya/ /kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis/ /yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya/ /chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob
pa ni| |sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam tshungs pa'o/ /chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma sbyin/ /de ltar slob ma dbang
bskur ba/ /khyad par du ni sngags pas bya/ /de la dam tshig cho ga yis/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyin par bya/ /slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing / /sgrub po kun la smad mi bya/ /sngags kyi
spyod pa thams cad las/ /'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / /grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la/ /smad par mi bya blang mi bya/ /de la mngon par dga' ba spang //
sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing / /de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu/ /bza' dang ston mo du ma la/ /bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya/ /'dod pas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs/ /de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs//
mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dang / /dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su/ /de nyid dam tshig shes nas su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong / /lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya/ /khyod kyis
sar sna mi bya ste/ /phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya/ /byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde/ /chang gi btung ba spang bya ste/ /pha rol bud med rnam par spang / /thams cad
@#/ /mkhyen pa yongs mi dor/ /rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya/ /sems can rnams la snying rje dang / /byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom/ /sems can rnams
la phan pa ni/ /yang dang yang du yongs su bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa/ /dam tshig de nyid 'di dag ni/ /slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /mkhas pa yis ni bstan
par bya| |de nas phyag rgya rjes bcings pa/ /go rim bzhin du bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ /me tog zum pa'i tshul
bzhin du/ /thal mo legs par bsdam par bya/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi/ /pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags/ /sems dpa' mchog ni legs pa rkyang ba/ /pad+ma'i
phyag rgya zhes su brjod/ /re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa/ /de ni rdo rje thal mor brtag /sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa/ /rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa/ /
sor mo brkyang ste steng du bstan/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed/ /khu tshur nang du byas nas ni/ /gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor los bsgyur sogs phyag
rgya'o/ /dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no/ /ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis/ /kun gyi rtse mor yongs su
brtag /rdo rje'i rnam par legs par sbyar/ /rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags/ /mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur las/ /gung mo legs par brkyangs nas su/ /mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su
sbyar| |'khor los bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed/ /brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni/ /gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya//
gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che/ /gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed/ /de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags/ /de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin
gshegs/ /khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas/ /gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te/ /thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa yongs
su sbyar| |dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ /gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar/ /mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang / /lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ /legs so ba ni sbyar bar bya//
gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse/ /phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog /rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar/ /bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /dbu ma pad+ma lta
bur bskum/ /ral gri'i chos ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo 'dra/ /kha ru phye ba'i phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che/ /gar
@#/ /mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can/ /chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya/ /mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes
su bshad/ /khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis/ /rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag /rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags/ /yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag /rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod/ /thal
mo sbyar ba gdong du sgrol/ /rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags/ /'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad/ /pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye/ /spyi bor yongs su sbyar
la bzhag /snying gar mthe bo bsnyams pa dang / /rab tu brkyang pa byug pa'o/ /lag pa steng du yongs brkyang pa/ /gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur/ /lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du
bzhag /sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad/ /dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod/ /gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni/ /ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags/ /mkha' la
myur ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las/ /de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni//
lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag /bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes/ /rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag /phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya/ /blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag /thal mo yongs su
sbyar la bsdam/ /mdzub mo gnyis po bskums nas ni/ /rin po che yi rnam par bcing / /kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis/ /de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum/ /sems kyis byams pa bsgoms
nas su| |mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni/ /ral gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste/ /'di ni nam mkha' hi snying po yi/ /phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/ /de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha
yi| |rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par/ /thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod/ /gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang / /pad+ma'i lta
bur rnam par brtag /pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis/ /de nyid me tog zum tshul dang / /ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa/ /'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya/ /pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grags/
mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i/ /kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste/ /kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag /pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi/ /blo gnyer du
ni nye bar sbyar/ /rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che/ /dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa gzung / /thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang / /mi bzad blo gros
phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtag/ gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin chen rdo rje snying gar bzhag /nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/ /nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster
@#/ /bar byed/ /rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang / /mthe chung mthe bong nges par bcing / /lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar
'gyur| |rdo rje thal mo steng du bsgreng / /mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya/ /rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to/ /khu tshur nang du byas nas su/ /mdzub mo
gnyis po rtse mo sbyar/ /'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste/ /rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shak+ti'i rnam pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o/ /gshin rje mthar byed
mdung rtser 'gyur/ /mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag /mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni/ /gung mo'i steng du yongs su bzhag /zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas/ /gshin
rje yang ni 'jigs par byed/ /de nyid ral grir byas pa ni/ /skra can gyi ru rab tu bshad/ /khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te/ /mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya/ /'di ni nye ba'i
skra can rgyar/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te/ /dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spang / /mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya/ /mthe chung dang ni
mthe bong brkyang / /'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin/ /mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni/ /mA ma kIr ni yongs su bshad/ /mdzub mo lcags sgrog

rnam pa las/ /gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya/ /'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya/ /rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad/ /mchog gi rtse mo rtse
gcig bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad/ /lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni/ /lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya/ /sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya/ /skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad/ /
thal mo yongs su sbyar ba las/ /mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag /mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par bshad/ /bkra shis kyi ni skyil krung bca'/ /rnal 'byor
rig pas lug bsrang ste/ /lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba/ /bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'i//
mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg /rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med/ /ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed/ /don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /mi
'jigs pa ni med pa sbyin/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag /mnyam par bzhag pas phyag rgya kun/ /'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/
'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la/ /lag pa gcig ni rab rkyang ste/ /dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa/ /mthe bong mthe chung mnan par bya/ /lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer gyur/ /lag pa g.yas
@#/ /pas bteg par bya/ /me yi oM yig lag pa dag /mthe bong gung mo nyid la bzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar/ /de
nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste/ /'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya/ /lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni/ /ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad/ /sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni/ /srin
po'i bdag nyid chen po'i 'o/ /mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni/ /chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad/ /mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang / /rlung lha
rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag /dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba/ /dbyug tho'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni/ /lus
ngan bdag nyid chen po 'o/ /mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni/ /tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad/ /drag po'i gsal shing shes bya ste/ /lha mo'i paT+Ti se ru brjod/ /tshogs bdag gi
ni sna ru bshad/ /zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /dbang po'i rdo
rje mtshon cha ltar/ /'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya/ /dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnad/ /dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags/ /dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya
che| |rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir/ /lha chen pos ni rab tu brtag /ting ting shag 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /dri za rnams kyir rab tu bsgrags/ /
pi wang bsgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad/ /rtag tu dun+du b+hi sgrog pa/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod/ /lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa/ /klu
rnams kyir ni legs par bshad/ /gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'gyed dang 'dud pa'i de bzhin no/ /lag pa'i zhags pa nges bcings pa/ /de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /'di
rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs/ /las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yis/ /'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /phyag rgya dor nas sems
kyi ni| |rin chen yang dang yang du bsam/ /rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi/ /chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa/ /stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom
par bya| |'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing / /rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas/ /dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang / /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang / /mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni/ /
'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru/ /srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis/ /sgyu
@#/ /ma smig rgyu brag ca dang / /lbu ba chu yi chu bur dang / /gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs/ /thams cad mgal me'i
'khor lo ltar/ /zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du/ /gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra bar/ /zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta/ /rtag tu glog gi phreng ba 'dra/ /sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs
par bshad/ /'khor ba shin tu bslad pa ste/ /rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas/ /'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni/ /sgom pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyi/ /sems ni legs
sgrub rnal 'byor pa/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad/ /stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin lus/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ /dam tshig gsum ni brtags
pa 'o| |phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang / /de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas/ /bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas/ /de 'di dam pa'i
phyag rgya ru/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste/ /rnam pa med cing snang ba ste/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po'i de nyid nyid du
bshad/ /dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin/ /dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde/ /rtog ge med cing
snang pa med/ /'khrul pa med cing yi ge med/ /stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems/ /gang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa/ /de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags/ /lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/
sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing / /phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing / /rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par
mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs
nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar
gnas nas nye bar 'khod de bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du
@#/ /'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa mA dza A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tAn hUM/ de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/ chos kyi dbyings su spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur
to| |de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhag par gyur to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad
do| |oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+hi kA ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul
pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par phyung ste spros par mdzad do/ /de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs
par byas nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags
'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
kar sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par bzhag go/ legs
par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM

dz+nyA na rasmi bi sr-i dzaHhUM/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par byung ngo / /de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te shes
@#/ /bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu
'dres te rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis brlabs so/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra pa ra da b+hu ya pany+tsa mu d+ha/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM s+pha ra badzra/ slar yang sngags
'dis bsdus so/ /oM saM ha ra badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyA na badzra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par
mdzad do/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon
par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra ba sgrags so/ /de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang nges 'dul ba'i
skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to/ /'di rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de
las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag tu bzhag par gyur
to| |de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta
@#/ /bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so/ /de nas thugs ka nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang / drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'i phreng ba rnam
par gnas so/ /de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la
sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams
cad kyis/ /rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /sgo logs dang ni kha khyer dang / /rta babs kyis ni so sor spras/ /de yi dbus
su khri chen po/ /kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa/ /de yi steng du pad chen po/ /ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya/ /sangs
rgyas kyi ni drung kun du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du/ /'khor los bsgyur ba la sogs bri/ /phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas
sras po rnam par dgod/ /kha dog ser po gzi brjid che/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba/ /thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan/ /brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya/ /rdo rje snying po
rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po
bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod/ /de yi phyi rol gnyis pa
la| |zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya/ /ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ /sgo dang sgo logs brtag par bya/ /rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /de yi dbus
su pad chen po/ /ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa/ /'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba la/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /rgyal ba thams cad dkar
po mchog /kha ba ba zho ltar dkar gsal/ /shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ /kun da zla ba ltar dkar bstan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /
sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod/ /thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra/ /zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa//
@#/ /chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod/ /gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya/ /shing rta'i rnam pa dang mtshungs shing / /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs
'jigs pa 'o/ /kha dog dmar po stobs po che/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba/ /rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che/ /rdo rje rtse
gsum sna tshogs pa/ /shing rta'i snying gar gzhag par bya/ /bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs/ /ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra/ /pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag
'bar| |bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas/ /de yi nye 'khor thams cad du/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras/ /khro bo dang ni mngag
pa dag /mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya/ /de dag thams cad kha dog dmar/ /gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa/ /'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
dbus son par/ /thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can/ /dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus/ /phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa/ /'di ni
gzi brjid gter zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba 'o/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rlung gi khams
dang 'dra bas na/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra/ /dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs/ /a ta si yi me tog 'dra/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'ong dang mtshungs/ /
de yi dbus su pang chen po/ /bai DUR+Ya yi 'od dang 'dra/ /shin tu nag pa'i mig sman mtshungs/ /sngo dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab
'bar ba/ /rgyal po 'khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi/ /mtshon mo nag mo lta bur gnas/ /ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul/ /stong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas/ /de yi nye 'khor thams
cad du| |rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri/ /khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang / /de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo/ /thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa/ /ba
@#/ /dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsngams/ /kha dog nag po thams cad du/ /gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs/ /kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba/ /bla re rgyas
pa mnyam pa ni/ /kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu/ /sangs rgyas kun
gyis rjes skyob pa/ /bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom/ /gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun/ /
yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por/ /bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya/ /sgra dang
gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor/ /yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam/ /hUM/ sngags pas snying gar son pa
bsgom| |gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/ /dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod/ /dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba/ /pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go/
dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra/ /tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gis/ /sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs/ /nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang / /rnga chen sgra ru rab tu

bshad| |pi wang gling bu de bzhin glu/ /gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni/ /rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hUM gi sgra/ /spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad/ /rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams
dang / /de nas gzugs kyi bzlas la mchog /go rim ji bzhin rab tu bshad/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste/ /de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar/ /sngags
dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ /de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog /rtag tu lus can bsam bya bsam/ /lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i/ /phyag rgya'ang snying
gar son zhes bya/ /rang gi rigs rim cho ga yis/ /de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing / /sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim/ /de ltar kun nas thams cad du/ /kun nas ba spu'i rtse
@#/ /dag nas/ /'od zer 'bar pa'i phreng dge bas/ /gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad/ /de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa
brtsam par bya/ /mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog /spro la sogs rim thams cad du/ /sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di/ /'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad/ /snying ga
mgrin pa mchu lce min/ /rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin/ /nang min phyi dang gnyis par min/ /chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la/ /bzlas ba'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin/ /'di ni bcom
ldan rnal 'byor che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad/ /de nas rjes su mdor bsdus te/ /snying ga'i dkyil
'khor rab zlum pa/ /zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya/ /dri ma med cing legs par gnas/ /de la yi ge rnam par dgod/ /tshig gi phreng ba ma tshang ba/ /mu tig phreng ba ltar brgyus
pa| |char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od/ /de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed/ /lha yi lus ni snang byed cing / /ji lta ji ltar yi ge'i phreng / /mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa/ /de lta de ltang
sngags kyi lus/ /lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/ /mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag /bzlas pa'i de nyid mchog 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyis bsngags pa'o/ /ji ltar rnam par sems ni sgom pa yi/ /de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chan po las/ bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos
nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos
can| |yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chal 'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can
khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu
brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /chad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang
khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod ba mi g.yo 'gags par yong mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog
@#/ /sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa/ /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab
mkhyen pas/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste/ /lan gcig tsam zhig brjod pas
kyang / /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na/ /rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te/ /bskal par
gnas shing bskal par bskul/ /lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru/ /bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis/ /mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang / /rgyal ba
dag pa 'od dpag med/ /don yod rgyal ba thams cad du/ /dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang / /mchog kyang rab tu stsol bar byed/ /dngos grub yid kyi ma lus la/ /rgyas pa'i don dang
phun sum tshogs/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ /mchog tu dge ba stsol bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos
grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ /smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med/ /ji ltar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i
yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis bdug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs

pa'i mchod pa byas te sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sarba pA paM ta kA yi kA bAk+tsit+ta ka ma na sot+ta b+hA tAM rA ga dwe Sha mo ha ma da mA na d+hISh+The na ya da kr-i taM tan tra kA li kaM hUM

hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM s+pho Ta yA mi swAhA/ oM sarba pA paM pra ti de sha yA mi swAhA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nAn At+ma b+ha ba ni

ni r+yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+nan+tu mAM swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha rA na a nu mo da

yA mi swAhA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badzra sa ma yaM mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mi
swAhA| de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa sa bcu'i
@#/ /dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng+ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /oM shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par rgyas

te| oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'ong gsal ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu
swa b+hA wa At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he shwa ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por spros nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do/ /zhes nga rgyal
bskyed la bdag skye rgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal par lhag par gnas par byas te nye bar thun mtshams bzhir
bzlas ba bsam par bya ste/ yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzla bar bya zhing / nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad pa la stong phrag re bzlas te ji srid
mtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o/ /tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul
gyi zla ba'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas te sna ma'i me tog gam me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
mchod rten la mchod de ji srid 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /de
nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems
can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la mchod
rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzla'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis
mchod rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o/ /tha ma yang mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs
pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ris kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod
@#/ /sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid a bi tsi mnar med pa'i bar
gyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /yi dwags rnams kyang yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems
can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes la lus ngang pa gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /
lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang
'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur
ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis
ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / dpa' bos rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil
gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis
brlabs te sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i
thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas te/ pi wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du bzhag la ji srid
dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid do/ /rig pa 'dzin par gyur
nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu bu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing rig pa 'dzin
@#/ /pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /
rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro/ /mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro/ /grog mkhar gyi
rtse ma'i sa bzung ste sa srung gi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i steng 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gi mtshan mar bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am
bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o/ /bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur pas bka' stsal pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas lhung ba dang / rgya
mtsho skem pa dang / ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa nam mkha' la 'phen pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang /
bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o/ /sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do/ /sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do/ /yang na
zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro//
nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do/ /me 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa ston par byed do/ /gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag
kyang g.yo bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos bye ba phrag bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / snam sbyar dang / 'khar
gsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na
'chi ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis
sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te rma med pa'i ral gri blangs
@#/ /la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad pa'am/ bcu bzhi pa'am/ nya gang ba la skyil krung bcas te ji srid du ral gri
'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go /steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa
steng du 'gro'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur
ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang rgyan 'chang ba/ 'dod rgur rgyu ba/ skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang /
nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po
stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo'am pa Ti sa blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song
ste nim pa'i lo ma tsha ba'i mar khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o/ /lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo
thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du sreg blugs bya'o/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o/ /de nas grogs dang bcas nas 'jug par bya'o/ /ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas
lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag /lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po/ gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams
cad dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug sa 'og thams cad kyi bdag po/ lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi
'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs
gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams
cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa la skyil krung bcas te ji srid 'bar ba de srid du
@#/ /bzla bar bya'o/ /de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /dbang phyug chen po
la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dag/
mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams la nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod
par byed do/ /sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug cu byas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye ba bzla ba'o/ /de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ro blangs
la khrus byas nas nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod de ji srid ma langs pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /langs nas dngul chu dang / bcud len dang / mi snang ba la sogs pa
thams cad des ster bar byed do/ /gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o/ /de bzung bas nyi ma stong
gi gzi brjid can/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas

gyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong sgul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skem pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong
phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / skra li zhing 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan
thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ bsreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor
gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi char pa dang / nam mkha'
mdzod kyi ting 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjes su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
rgyal srid dang / rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / glang
po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan+dan dkar po las pad+ma sor drug pa'i tshad byas pa pad+ma de lag par bzung
@#/ /nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcas te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi gzung bar bzla bar bya'o/ /
zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun sreg blugs bya'o/ /zla ba nya nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil mo krung bcas
nas mtshan thog thag bzla bar bya'o/ /tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis
brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs
pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams rnam par mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ut+pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan+dan dmar po pad+ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo / /sgrub pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ni/ shel dang / pad+ma rA ga
dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu'am rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te
gang yang rung ba'i grangs mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su mngar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me
tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ga ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan+dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar
gyi sreg blugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig byas la/ sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub
par bya'o/ /skyil mo krung bcas te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro
bar 'gyur ro/ /skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig
pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bla ma 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do/ /skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te
@#/ /'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang / shing lham dang / mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i cho gas bsgrub par
bya'o| |thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o/ /yongs su rdzogs pa dang / me
tog can gyi lcags sam lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshang tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog
thag khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya
phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i
lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ /lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
ba chen po ka k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang
sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob/ /gsang sngags ka k+Sha sbyar zhes bya /gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung //
gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa/ /kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag /re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya/ /dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis la ni/ /a sogs
blo gros ldan pas dgod/ /ka sogs lhag ma'i ra mig la/ /sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun/ /go rim bzhin du dgod par bya/ /re mig stong pa
@#/ /dag la ni/ /k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri/ /rim pa de dag bkod nas ni/ /rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog /dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su/ /yi ge phyag rgya mdor
bsdus pa/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha/ dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i nyid do/ /don kun grub par yang dag ldan//
me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ /'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /kha tsha Tha tha pha ra Sha/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan/ /ga dza Da da ba la sa/ /dngos grub kun
byed rlung gzugs ldan/ /dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs/ /g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wa ha/ /steng 'gros dngos grub byed par brjod/ /slar yang nga nya Na na ma/ /chos kun dbang du
byed pa mchog /thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa/ /de na de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu/ /khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu
gnyis| |ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong / /r-i r-I l-i l-I zhes bya ba/ /dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags/ /de dag yi ge ru yang bshad/ /dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun/ /thig le sgra
gtsug zla phyed ces/ /sna ldan gyi ni phreng zhes bshad/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyi/ /yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing / /gsal byed ces gyis gsal ba'o/ /de bzhin
ya ra la wa rlung / /me dang dbang ldan bdag po ste/ /'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams so/ /rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas/ /thams cad nyid kyi
lam zhes bya/ /phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags/ /ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /chos rnams kun gyi sdom du brjod/ /stong pa mtshan
med smon med pa/ /rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /de ni/ sngags gyi ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba la rab tu btus pa
sbyar ba dang / phral ba bshad par bya'o/ /yi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ /lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /dbyangs rnams kyi ni bsdus pa bshad//
mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya/ /dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de/ /gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya/ /de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid/ /ster ba nyid du legs par bshad/ /thog
mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags dri ma med 'byung / /thog mar dbyangs ni thig ler ldan/ /rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi ba/ /rnam par 'phro
ba nyid du gnas/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /kun gyi ye shes 'od po che/ /kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob/ /thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'/ /de ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa/ /yi ge
@#/ /med cang dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad/ /dung dang kun da zla ltar dag /gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /de ni shin tu ring por
shes| |sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /su sma rnams kyi rnam pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhes su sgrags/ /dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par can/ /mchan
nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab stsol byed/ /da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi de nyid 'dir bshad bya/ /thog
mar sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan/ /gsum pa ma yi ming can no/ /rgyu med pas te cung zad pa/ /bzhi pa yis ni gsal
bar byas/ /drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la/ /de yi steng du thig le gnas/ /chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par/ /yang dang yang du bshad pa yin/ /de ni lnga par shes par bya/ /yi
ge lnga pa stobs po che/ /yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso/ /mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes/ /mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las
rab grol byed pa/ /yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag /mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med/ /de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste/ /mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags
byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /brtan pa'i sems dpar rang byung ba/ /chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid/ /gang bsgrags de ni thams cad du/ /me yi sa bon dang ldan pa/ /spyod pa yi ni
steng du gnas/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su bshad/ /chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni/ /med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o/ /me yi sa bon yang dag ldan//
bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bo ru/ /mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//
don yod pa yi snying por grags/ /sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni/ /dngos dang dngos med rab rtogs byed/ /me yi sa bon rab tu ldan/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas/ /drug pa'i dbyangs dang
yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rgyus par spras/ /'khor los bsgyur ba ye shes che/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i nor ster byed/ /gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'/ /sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu
gnas| |de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni/ /gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o/ /brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal
'byor ni/ /spyi bor thig les mnan pa'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che/ /mA me kI ru de bsgrags so/ /lnga yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/
@#/ /spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming / /sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de/ /rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba/ /sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum
pa ni| |phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang / /gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che/ /yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po/ /thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs/ /de yi dbus su spyod pa bzhag /tha mar sna tshogs zhes
bya sbyar| |sku gsum du ni rnam par bsgom/ /tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni/ /gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o/ /de nyid bcom
ldan mgon po ni/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /de nyid rab tu grags pa'o/ /'di kun thams cad stong pa ste/ /rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o/ /dbyangs lnga
dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad do/ /gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po/ /me dang rab tu ldan pa dang / /bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /gzi brjid phung po stobs po che
de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba/ /sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags/ /bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /shes rab pha rol phyin par nges/ /thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /sgra dang ldan pa'i
mchog tu gyur/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang / /me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag mnan/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ /de nyid
bcom ldan zhes bya bar/ /spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan/ /de yi rjes nyid la ni me/ /dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi/ /sde tshan
dang po'i dang po ste/ /de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni/ /'jig rten mgon po thub pa che/ /ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab stsol byed/ /sde tshan lnga la rin chen
mchog /bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa ste/ /'og tu me yi yan lag ldan/ /khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grag pa/ /dbang chen yi ge dag pa la/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs
rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o/ /sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas/ /gsod
ba'i don du rab tu gsal/ /mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming / /rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyis/ /dri ma med pa stsol bar byed/ /gnyis pa'i dbyangs
dang yang dag ldan/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya/ /dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan/ /'gro ba'i rdo rje rangs byed na/ /gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
sbyar byas pa/ /rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro/ /'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na/ /gdug sems can gdan smos ci dgos/ /de nyid me dang ldan pas na/ /dbang dang dgug pa'i las
@#/ /rnams dang / /'gegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni/ /khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed/ /don dam bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs/ /rnam par snang mdzad gnas las
byung / /gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni/ /me dang ldan pa nyid kyis bya/ /drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis
drangs pas/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /ti se man+d+ha ra la sogs/ /de yis phye mar rlog par nges/ /rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi/ /dbus nas 'gro kun rengs
par byed/ /gnas nas bskyod par byas pa yis/ /'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed/ /rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi snying gar son/ /chos kyi dbyings
mtshungs thob nas ni/ /bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi sa bon rin po che/ /spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan/ /me las byung ba me la gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad
'bebs par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang / /sa yi yi ge steng du mnan/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni/ /drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas/ /'og tu me yi sa bon ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dbus su ste/ /sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed/ /me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad bsgom/ /rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor/ /rgyu ni byed
pa mtshungs pa'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che/ /de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya/ /dbang chen me ni sbyor ba las/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya
yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don/ /rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid/ /rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /dbyangs
dang yi ge thams cad la/ /sbyor ba'i dbye bas rnam par gnas/ /tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang / /ting nge 'dzin rnams thams cad du/ /slob dpon man ngag shes bya ste/ gzhan du
bya ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste/ rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par spyad par bya'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo
rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i
dkyil 'khor che/ /zlum po kun nas bzang po ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas/ /de yi steng du pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni//
yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid/ /bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya/ /ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po/ /snying gar zla ba der pad+ma/ /de yi steng du dung brtag bya/ /dung gi dbus su
lce yin te/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba 'o/ /de yi steng du rin chen pad/ /yang na sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang / /'bar zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab
'bab pa/ /pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas/ /bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa ni/ /go rim bzhin du bsam par bya/ /zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig /yang na
zla ba bzhi 'am ni/ /zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya/ /skyil krung gis ni nyer gnas te/ /dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes/ /chos kyi
dbyings ni mtha' dag tu/ /thams cad du ni yongs su gang / /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob
pa'i| |ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog /de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /lus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug
bsam| |dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam/ /pad+ma'i khams la yang dag brten/ /pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las/ /sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams/ /mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te/ /de
las kyang ni ji ltar gyur/ /slar yang lce ru son pa dang / /yi ge mchog tu ngag ba 'o/ /lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba/ /gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul/ /kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba//
rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don/ /sgra yis nam mkha' kun gang bar/ /sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla/ /de bzhin du ni snying gar sgra/ /lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas/ /mchu 'am so las
rab bkra ba'i/ /gal te 'od zer mthong na ni/ /de tshe grub par rnam par shes/ /grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don/ /yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis/ /ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ /rang lce
rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yang / /'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa/ /rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha/ /yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis/ /a yi yi ge mnga'
bdag mchog /rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin/ /rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs/ /yi ge yi ger yongs su gzhol/ /phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni/ /'bar zhing thig le dang
@#/ /mtshungs shing / /snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa/ /de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba/ /ji srid rkan gyi bar du son/ /slar yang yi ge thams cad ni/ /yang dang yang
du gsal byed cing / /rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dang / /yang dang yang du rnam par 'don/ /'jig rten kun tu de song ste/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /yi ge'i rang bzhin
rnam bkra ba/ /rang gis 'gro ba rnam byas te/ /slar yang 'ongs nas rang gnas su/ /'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag /de nas sgra dang yi ge ni/ /lte bar song ste yongs su gnas/ /
lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes/ /de yi steng du dung chen po/ /rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas/ /de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra/ /brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung
slar yang mgrin par song nas su/ /rdo rje lce la yang dag reg /'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med/ /kha ba ba zho ltar dkar 'od/ /bcud
len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra/ /rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag rnams/ /yang dang yang du gsal bar byed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rtser son te/ /slar yang snying ga nyid du song / /thig le las
ni gug skyed gyur/ /grub skyed ri mo ring bo can/ /cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las/ /de ni yi ger rnam par shes/ /yi ge las ni sgra skye zhing / /sgra las nA da de las dbyangs/ /
dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur/ /yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs/ /tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur/ /tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin du ni bA thA dang / /phreng 'dzin rgyun
chags de bzhin te/ /'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang / /rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur/ /de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te/ /dgug dang
gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya/ /bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad du ni brtan par bya/ /yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo/ /rmad byung mchog tu
rnyed dka' ba'i/ /yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi/ /ngag 'grub thams cad skyob rnams kyi/ /yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po/ /ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dge /sangs rgyas kun gyi
bdag nyid ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /rang snying zla bar rdo rje che/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /de las bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /nges par
gdon pa nyid du bya/ /ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing / /de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed/ /sems
can kun gyis thams cad du/ /dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa/ /de dag thams cad rnam shes te/ /skad cig tsam la smra bar byed/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las/ ngag gi
@#/ /sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams zlar yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bka'
stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa nye bar gsan nas de de bzhin no/ /zhes bka' stsal nas
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim
par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri/ /yang na bcu
drug rtsibs kyang bri/ /lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgong / /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam bar brgyan/ /mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun/ /mkhas pa yis ni spel par bya/ /
de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba stobs po che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das
skad cig ma ni nyid la thon/ /'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas/ /sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug /'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che/ /'khor los bsgyur bar bdag nyid
'gyur| |chung dang che dang dbang phyug dang / /rang dbang 'dod rgur spyod pa dang / /kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras/ /rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing / /nges
par 'khor los bsgyur dang mtshungs/ /gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che/ /de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang / /me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung / /rang gi lag gis bzung nas su//
dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid che/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de ltar bdag nyid

bsgom na ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te/ muN+Ti tsakra warti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu na trA

sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha Ta ya ha na b+hany+dza broM khi ni kuN+Ta li ni a pa rA dzi TAs+t+ra d+ha ri Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM oM a pa rI dza ta d+hi ka swAhA/ snying po'o/ /na maHsan+ta
bud+d+ha nAM a pra ti ha ta shA sa naM a pa rA dzi ta d+hi ka swAhA/ mchog gi snying po'o/ /'khor los bsgyur bar rang grub ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs dang
@#/ /shugs| |yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun/ /dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub thabs so/ /
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /nam mkha' la ni yongs su bsgom/ /gzi brjid phung po ye shes che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi
mchog /dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba/ /de ni me yir shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po/ /'khor los bsgyur ba legs
'bar ba/ /de la de bzhin rin chen bdun/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma re rer bkra shis bsgom/ /gzi brjid
phung po sku chen po/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo ni/ /snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas/ /de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam/ /nam mkha'i rnam par
legs par gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam par khyab/ /de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /kun tu kun
nas thams cad du/ /dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ /kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang / /rdo rje can kun

nyid dang ni/ /gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas/ /gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ /oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te murti te te dzo rA shi dz+wa la dz+wa

la| d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha bi d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM te dzo rA shi swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM dz+wA la te dzo ra shi hUM phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dag pa'i gsang
sngags 'di rnams kyis/ /nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal/ /kun tu 'gro ba 'grub par bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur/ /gzi brjid phung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
so| |kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog /yi ge gsum pa stobs po che/ /gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing / /gtsug tor steng na 'od gsal ba/ /sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya/ /
kun nas snang ba lta pur 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di/ /bsgom pa tsam gyis thams cad du/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro kun kun nas snang bar
'gyur| |kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub ba'i thabs so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/
chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed/ /'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su gnas/ /rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba/ /bya ba'i don du dag pa
@#/ /ste| |sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po/ /nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom//
'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni/ /'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /de yi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM d+hu na pA ta ya
ts+tshin+da tsakre Na badzra Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char/ /skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du/ /dam pa'i chos ni bskor bar
byed| |chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na/ /nyon mongs rdo rje
'dra bar 'gyur/ /snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /de yi snying la rdo rje me/ /dri ma med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rtag tu yongs
zad cing / /dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed/ /bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na/ /bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sngags ni/ oM kA+e sha a sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni nyon
mongs rdo rje'i sngags/ /drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pa'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dbang chen
dkyil 'khor la gnas ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che/ /bdung bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che/ /
lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid/ /khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes/ /
brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni/ /'di dag thams cad ma skyes par/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de la sngags su gyur pa ni/ /oM bi dza ye hAH/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dngos grub las byung 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'o/ /
rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom/ /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis/ /'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du/ /
kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI bya dI bya ud ga toSh+NI Shi d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ steng 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya
@#/ /bar| |sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs/ /'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che/ /legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po
ni| |chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing / /chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/ /dri med puN+Da
rI kar gnas/ /ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang / /bcud kyis len gyi mchog lta bur/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /sems
can rnams la thams cad du/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che/ /sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni//
ye shes che dang stobs mgyogs 'gro/ /dpa' bo thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ /gdugs dkar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs ral gri ni/ /sngags pas snying gar bsgom par bya/ /rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin
sprin chen pos/ /nam mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba/ /bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis/ /rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgrom par bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che/ /'bar

ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /sngags pas snying gar bsgom par bya/ /rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa loSh+Ni Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma da ma dru ma dru
ma da ha da ha na hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri che/ /shes rab ye shes dri ma med/ /sngags pas kun nas bsgom na ni/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i
gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /seng+ge'i khri yi steng du bsam/ /yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas/ /
kun tu gtsug tor cher 'bar ba/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /chos kyi sku ni
mchog tu che/ /'di ni bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni/ /kun tu gtsug tor stobs po che/ /skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no/ /sngags ni/ oM
badzra ban+d+ha hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgom na/ /de ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje snying po
@#/ /rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs su rdzogs so// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol pa btab pa/ bcom ldan
'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas pa bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag
gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim
par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che/ /snying gar yongs su bsgoms nas su/ /ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid che/ /mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas/ /'jam
dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya/ /gur gum gyi ni rnam pa 'dra/ /gtsug na zur phud lnga ldan pa/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /mtha' yas rgyas pa'i rlabs che ba'i//
rnam par 'phro ba lta bur gnas/ /ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams/ /dbang chen dang ni me las 'khrungs/ /ye shes chen po gzi brjid che/ /'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral/ /
sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog /nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed/ /rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don/ /dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po/ /
rig pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di/ /zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog /mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug /rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag drug dam pa stobs po che/ /gzi
brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang / /kun nas yongs su gsal ba po/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ /nam mkha'i khams na rnam par gnas/ /yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya/ /
ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom/ /dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa/ /zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes phra/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar/ /gdod nas
ma skyes pa zhes bsam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab stsol byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/ /de'i sngags ni/ oM bA kye daM na maH/
gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang / /gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed/ /rnam thar gsum gyi sgo la gnas/ /pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal/ /rang nyid shes rab yin no zhes/ /
sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las/ /pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba/ /sems dpa'
@#/ /chen po gser gyi mdog /stobs po che ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni 'grub pa tsam gyis ni/ /shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab smra
