zhing | |dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas/ /kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid/ /rang nyid kun gyi rgyal po mtshungs/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /byang chub kun gyi pha rol
son| |dbang phyug kun dang bde pa che/ /chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na//
dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang / /rkang pas spyod pa de nyid mchog /ril bu dang ni mi snang ba/ /thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur/ /dpal
ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags/ /'di ni bsgrub
pa tsam gyis ni/ /bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na/ /gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
so| |snying gar pad+ma chen po la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che/ /thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi
pa| |dung dang kun da zla ltar dag /chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung / /chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug ches/ /de la gnas pa dge ba bsgom//
rang bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dag /gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba/ /gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che/ kun
tu rnam par 'phros pa yi/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po/ /ral pa'i dbus su dpa' bo che/ /'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag /ston
ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal/ /kun tu nam mkha' yongs gang ba/ /gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas
pa| |pad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gad/ /kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku/ /khyad par du bdag dgang bar bya/ /
'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba kun/ /snang dang mi snang dngos po ni/ /yang dang yang du blta bar bya/ /gdul bya ma lus sems la ni/ /stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya/ /kha dog dbyibs ni
'di bzhin du/ /sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba/ /kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni/ /sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya/ /de nas sngags pas de ma thag /slar yang rtse gcig
@#/ /sems kyis ni/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na//
dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing / /rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang / /rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang / /rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur/ /rig pa 'jin
dang 'khor lo can/ /sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de'i sngags ni/ /oM A ro li ka /gsang
sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni/ /rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster/ /pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i
sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgrub/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal rnams ni/ /srid par bkug nas rnam par ster/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i
thabs so/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ /de yi dbus su bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa/ /de yi dbus su de 'dra
bsam| |nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
brgyan| |tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du/ /kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed/ /hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo/ /dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs
pa| |zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra/ /'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs/ /bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas/ /zhal bzhi pa la mche ba bzhi/ /'jigs pa'i dus kyi thal ba
'dra| |hUM gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan/ /sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab tu 'dra/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na
gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+Na ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/ /a na la ho b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/ /'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs
byed na| |bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs/ /chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas/ /de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na/ /sdug bsngal can
gzhan smos ci dgos/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan snying gar son/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje can gyi sngon du bsgrub/ /bsam
ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur/ /rgyal po thams cad sbyin 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /sngags ni/ 'dir/ oM Tik+ka hUM dzaH/
@#/ /gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /longs spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams/ /de snyed thams cad rnam par ster/ /rdo rje
'dzin pa'i sgrub pa 'o/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku/ /snying gar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'od/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba ldan//
'jig rten khams ni 'byams klas pa/ /rab bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni/ /rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang / /dbang bskur pa yi rang bzhin dge /gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba//
ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po/ /ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che/ /dung dang kun da zla 'ong bzang / /bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la/ /brtan pa'i don du dbang
bskur bya/ /yang na sems can thams cad la/ /bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro/ /sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ /gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu
ba dang / /gnas sogs dbye bas rnam par dbye/ /byams pas kun tu rnam par spro/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar/ /shin
tu dri ma med par gnas/ /ri rab lta bur brtan ba'i sems/ /'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral/ /de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas/ /mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam//
bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes/ /dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /cung zad li zhing 'khyil ba'i skra/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen sems ni rnam dag
pas| |bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya/ /'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi tany+dza ya sarba satwA sa ma yAnu ga ta swAhA/ gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal
po 'di| |byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab/ /byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong / /dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgrub pa'i thabs
mchog bsgom par bya/ /oM mai tre ya tri/ 'di ni bsgrub pa tsam gyis kyang / /dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag /rang nyid lha yi bu dang
mtshungs/ /byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgom na ni/ /'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur/ /byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de mdun chos ni
legs nyan nas/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang / /dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ /mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /byams pa'i yid
kyis thob par 'gyur/ /byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /rang gi lus ni thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du bsgom/ /chos bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang / /rang nyid
@#/ /nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis/ /
sems can rang gi sems las spro/ /thams cad sems las spros nas ni/ /slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya/ /nam mkhar sa many+dza rA blta/ /rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya/ /rin
chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rin chen kha dog 'od po che/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa/ /lag na rin chen stobs po che/ /rin chen sbyor bas bsgoms
pa yis| |nam mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin/ /sngags ni/ oM A ka sha gar+b+ha ya swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po stobs po che/ /bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang
gi dngos grub thams cad ni/ /ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos/ /dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa/ /nam mkha'i snying po bsgrubs
pa yis| |de dag thams cad myur du ster/ /nam mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis/ /kun tu bzang
po'i 'od bzang ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i/ /rang gi phra
rab rdul rnams kyis/ /de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya/ /sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du/ /yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su/ /rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
mtshungs byas te/ /bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes/ /yi ge lnga pa zhes su bshad/ /'di yi sngags chen bzla bar bya/ /yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyis/ /rtag tu sngags su gyur pa 'o/ /
oM sAM hrIHkA ya swAhA/ gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing / /gdod nas ngag cing rang 'byung ba/ /grub pa gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /de yi shes rab dri med cing / /gzugs mdzes
pa ni de dang mtshungs/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba/ /kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
par| |rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /dam pa'i don du bsgoms par bya/ /gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang / /bcud kyi len gyis bde
blag tu| |ring po nying du mi thogs par/ /sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sarba ni wa ra Na biSh+kaM b+hi ni swAhA/ oM na si rA ya swAhA/ gtso bo gsang sngags
'di 'dzin la/ /rnam par sel bar grags pa ste/ /thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du/ /gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis/ /gdod nas dag cing
@#/ /'gyur ba med/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni/ /lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas/ /rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i/ /rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya/ /
ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar/ /gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i/ /me yis yongs su bskor ba yi/ /phyag na ral gri gzi
brjid che/ /yang nas yang du sems byed cing / /dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che/ /rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni/ /mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog /thams
cad nas ni stsol ba nyid/ /rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs/ /gser gyi mdog can sku chen po//
'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /snying gar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas/ /sa snying zhes byar bdag nyid bsgom/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba/ /rang gi gsang sngags brjod
par bya| |sa snying zhes byar bdag bsgom nas/ /sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di/ /oM k+Shi haHrA dzaHswAhA/ bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni/ /dngos grub thams
cad rab stsol mdzad/ /sa yi snying po zhes grags pa/ /dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas/ /sa'i snying po'i sgrub ba'i thabs so/ /zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ /zad med
mchog gi shes rab can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge /blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /me yi
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs/ /rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal/ /sngags ni/ oM ak+Sha ya ma ti swAhA/
sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di/ /thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed/ /ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog ces bya/ /shes
rab ye shes dri med mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /kun nas shes rab chen po can//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par/ /gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs
par mdzad/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba/ /nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes/ /lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du/ /thams cad rig pas brtan par bya/ /shin tu dri med byang
chub sems/ /rang snying me long lta bur bsam/ /de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de/ /mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag /mkha' la rin chen 'byung
@#/ /gnas dang / /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing / /de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gi /nye bar mkho ba thams cad
'bab| |'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad/ /ji snyed yod pa de dag kun/ /'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la/ /dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur/ /oM ga ga na gany+tsa gaM swAhA/ nam
mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa/ /nam mkha' mdzod ni stobs po che/ /skad cig ma la byad par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
so| |rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs/ /rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol/ /lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya/ /lag na rin chen phyag rgya
che| |zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang / /rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod/ /thams cad rdo rje
bzhin bdag nyid/ /pri yang sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od/ /dbang chen dang ni me las byung / /phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya/ /oM rat+na pA Ni ra
muHswAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs na ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni/ /rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed/ /lag na rin po che sgrub
pa'i thabs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems/ /bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang ba/ /stong gsum zhes ni bsam par bya/ /pad+ma gcig gi steng na gnas/ /de yi steng du gzi
brjid che/ /chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /de yi steng du brtson 'grus che/ /rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung / /de yi steng du
pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgya pa 'od gsal ba/ /de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs
pa'i 'od/ /dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi lag na phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje dung du rab tu grags/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /rang nyid
rdo rje yin no zhes/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che/ /slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /sngags ni/ oM sA ga ra ma ti sa ra swAhA/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste/ /shes
rab ye shes dri med mdzes/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs nas ni/ /shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs/ /rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug
rgyal| |dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i 'od/ /rdo rje snying
@#/ /po brtson 'grus che/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ji snyed sa steng mtha' dag tu/ /khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yis/ /sa zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i/ /
mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa'i/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni/ /chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa/ /bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /
de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ /yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar/ /thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba/ /rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngags
mchog gtso bo ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing / /rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na/ /dngos
grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed/ /bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes/ /nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni/ /rdo rje snying
po bzhin du gzhan/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob/ /des na rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje snying pos
yang dag byung / /rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje/ /sbyin pa byed pa de yis sgrub/ /rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dbang chen me las yang dag byung / /nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus//
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po/ /'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas/ /pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa
can| |phyag rgya de yi snying gar gnas/ /rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ /sngags ni/ oM rat+na kA ra hrIHrat+naM da nga swAhA/ rin chen 'byung gnas
rgyal po 'di/ /mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang phyug /sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya/ /rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro
bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la/ /me ni dbus
@#/ /nas dbus su 'o/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /'od zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes/ /de yi mdun du bya ba yang / /mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi/ /de yi g.yas kyi
gdan la ni/ /rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can/ /g.yon nyid du ni be con can/ /rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ /rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni/ /rin chen 'bar bas rnam par
brgyan| |phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i/ /khro bo thams cad dgod par bya/ /de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang / /gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba 'o/ /gzhan du med cing grangs med
mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po/ /rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed/ /dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par
brgyan| |de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni/ /dbyangs bdun par ni bshad pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ /'jigs pa'i thal ba mchog tu 'bar/ /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar
ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus can gyi/ /char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /'bar ba kun gyis rnam par
brgyan| |dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang / /gsal ba'i skra ldan stobs po che/ /rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus can gyi/ /
rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas/ /smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug
pa'i gdong / /gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten snang ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan/ /gcig tu gyur cing rnam pa mang / /rnam mang zhal ldan nga
dag gi /sngo ser la sogs tha dad ldan/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan/ /sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po
che| |shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas/ /phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can/ /zhal drug pa ste gsus po che/ /char sprin mchog 'dra cher nag
pa| |dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas/ /mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra/ /zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs/ /khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /gshin rje mthar mdzad stobs po che/ /de
la sngags kyang oM AHhUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha na hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trUn na shA ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di/ /khyab bdag gdul
mda' 'dul ba po/ /gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing / /dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas/ /rtag tu gdul
@#/ /dka' 'dul mdzad cing / /rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul/ /shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la/ /zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te/ /shes rab thabs kyi
bdag nyid kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad/ /thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can/ /'jig rten gsum yang nges sreg mdzad/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis//
shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku/ /thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed/ /gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nyid bcom
ldan rnal 'byor te/ /khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i khro bo che/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /de yi kha
dog rnam par gsal/ /drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer/ /phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar//
me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog /li khri mdog ltar shin tu dmar/ /de yis khro gnyer bsnyer pa yis/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa
ni| |yang dang yang du bsam par bya/ /ma lus sa rnams thams cad du/ /son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des/ /'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos//
sngags ni/ oM ka Ni d+hu Ni hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa/ /'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che/ /sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na/ /skye bo gzhan lta smros ci
dgos| |khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /rta mgrin zhes su
bshad pa yin/ /rtag tu 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar pa 'o/ /chu dang gzi brjid can rag pa/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan/ /'dod ldan rnams la
'dod pa 'byung / /gdug pa can rnams gdug pa 'byung / /zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung / /stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor/ /zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi
dang mnyam par ldan/ /phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che/ /seng+ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya/ /skad cig nyid la gnas
nas ni| |thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM a mr-i tong+b+ha bo de b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i tong b+ha ba hUM phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /g.yon brkyang ba ni rab
tu sbyar| |khro bo'i skyil krung byas nas ni/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu mnyes/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che/ /
@#/ /stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha/ /tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang / /mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can/ /sa
rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /gcig bu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid
gyur| |khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song / /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /sna yi rtse mor yid kyis
ni| |g.yo ba med par bsam par bya/ /slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan/ /ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang / /thog ma tha ma med pa'i
mchog/ pri yang ku ltar ljang ba'i gzugs/ /'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas/ /ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /khro bo mngag
pa bran dang ni/ /pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /skye bo kun gyis yongs su gang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na/ /bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol/ /sngags ni/ na maH
sa man+ta badzra NAM tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ka hAM maM/ khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /dbang
du yang ni mdzad par gnas/ /rlung dang me las yang dag byung / /'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog /lus dang ngag yid ge bzhin no/ /dgug
dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog /khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba/ /drag po
thog ma tha ma med/ /rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi
dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs kyis ni rnam bar mdzes/
thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen
@#/ /legs par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su rtag bri ba/ /dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /de yi nya 'khor thams cad du/ /sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la//
nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri/ /shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te/ /thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs bar/ /go rim
bzhin du rnam par dgod/ /phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis/ /kha dog dbye ba thams cad du/ /rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa/ /chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /de las 'od
zer bsam mi khyab/ /sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis/ /shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya/ /'dus par gyur nas de dag kun/ /lha
nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin/ /shes rab chen po gzugs chen po/ /'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas
rten| |sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs/ /du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma/ /shes rab pha rol
phyin ma ni/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad/ /kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum/ /sems can kun gyi thams cad du/ /thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab/ /sems
kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs/ /zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab/ /dri ma med cing ngang gis stong / /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /thog
ma tha ma med cing zhi/ /chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas/ /kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ /chos kyi sku ru de
bshad do/ /dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes/ /sems dang thams cad thams cad du/ /yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad/ /shes rab blo dang blo gros dran/ /lhag mthong dang ni ye shes
kun| |kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang / /rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs/ /kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ /rnam pa gnyis su de rab
brtags| |ji ltar bud shing la brten nas/ /me yi sa bon gnas pa dang / /til la til mar ji bzhin no/ /bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag /me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam/ /zho la
mar gsar ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub/ /bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung / /gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las/ /ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste/ /de bzhin
ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /bsrungs pas yongs su brtag par bya/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /yang nas yang du bsrub par bya/ /mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i//
@#/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag /nam mkha' dri ma med brten nas/ /nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas/ /'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa/ /'bar ba stong
phrag gi ni snod/ /mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la/ /kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems/ /mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med/ /gzung 'dzin
las ni nges par grol/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun/ /der gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ /ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms
te| |gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos/ /rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun/ /gdod nas ma
skyes rnyog pa med/ /yi ge de nyid de lta bu/ /gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs/ /sde mtshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la/ /thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan/ /de nyid bcom
ldan mgon po ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad/ /oM pra dz+nyA swAhA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
par byed/ /oM yaM/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum/ /de nyid 'khor los rnam par bsgyur/ /'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang / /grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas/ /bstan
bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang / /shes bya thams cad khyad par du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun/ /dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam/ /gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can/ /zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs//
brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan/ /mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi/ /de yi gsang sngags rab

bshad bya/ /nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams/ /sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu
bshad| |dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa/ /bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug
ste| |bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas/ /phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che/ /rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /sangs
rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar/ /mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu/ /'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /
@#/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na/ /bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi/ /dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas/ /
dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo/ /'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar/ /grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang / /'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma/ /rtag
tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ /sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka Te swAhA/ gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che/ /dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che/ /pad+ma'i
rgyal po rab tu gnas/ /'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /zhi ba'i
yi ge mnyam par ldan/ /zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi/ /sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs/ /gos dkar me'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs
gzugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yongs gang ba/ /'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma/ /thugs
rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod/ /sngags ni/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog /sgrol
mas legs par rnam par gnas/ /gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la/ /bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog /kun tu kun tshe thams cad du/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol bar
mdzad| |sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang / /ral pa'i cod pan dag gis
brgyan| |'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar/ /dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan/ /brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /
rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du/ /shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ /hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra/ /sa gsum mo ni 'khrug par mdzad/ /khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags/ /sngags

kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sa ni/ trA sa ni trA se/ trA sa yA/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta Ti be ta Di be ra Di shwe te shwe ta je Ti ni/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHswAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson
'grus che/ /gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed na/ /gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos/ /khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris/ /der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni/ /stobs chen pri yang
@#/ /ku ltar ljang / /phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba/ /dngos grub thams cad rab
stsol ma| |sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che/ /rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas/ /khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'/ /dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan/ /lha mo 'jig rten gsum
rmongs byed/ /dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun/ /nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i rlung gi phreng ba che/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas//
'jigs pa chen po'i me ltar drag /snang ba chen po stobs po che/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya/ /lha mo 'jig rten

gsum gyis mchod/ /sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA trI ye na maH/ shaM ka re/ shAn+tiM ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni/ g+ha ta ya g+huT+Ti ni swAhA/ oM ku lan+d+ha ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di
ni don gyi mchog /gsang sngags kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing / /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed
la| |rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin/ /mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor drug po la/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor/ /de yi dbus su snang ba che/ /zla ba'i
gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de spros pa las bdag nyid ni/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku/ /phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de/ /rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni/ /sa
gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang / /de yi thugs kar rdo rje che/ /
'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi /rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan/ /nges par phyung nas de dag kun/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
pa'i| |'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu/ /kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang / /bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du/ /khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal/ /lte ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba/ /mche ba
bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /'bar ba yi ni phreng ba gsal/ /gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan/ /sngags ni/ oM badzra shiM kha lA yA d+hi pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma hA bid+yA

ra dzA ya te pra dz+wa li ta/ hasta ya na mo ni la kaN+tha ya ki ra ta rU pa laM bo da rA ya/ b+hUM b+h+r-i ku TI mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu kha la/ tsa tur daMSh+Ta ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya ra sha ri ra/ ma nu pra

wi sh+ya shi raM gr-ih+Na/ gri ba gr-ih+Na/ hasta pA daM gr-ih+Na bi Sha/ A ba shA ya/ kaM pA ya kaM pA ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ bi kurba bi kurba/ tsU r+Na tsUr+Na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/
@#/ /marmA Ni| ni kr-in+tA ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ ba la ba la/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ de ba/ nA ga /yak+Sha/ rak+Sha sa/ pI shA tsA na sA da ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra/
hA hA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ ni Shi ni Shi/ badzra shriM ka la/ a dz+nyA pA ya ti swAhA/ oM badzra ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra kA li hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis//
bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang / /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang / /gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang / /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang / /lha dang lha min lto 'phye che/ /
'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang / /rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni/ /grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni/ /dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thams cad gus pas
sbyin par byed/ /bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma dmar pos rab tu
gnas| |phyag bzhi pha la du ma'i gzugs/ /dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /zhi ba la sogs nyams dang
ldan| |chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes mchog /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas mtha' las yang dag 'byung / /der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni/ /skul byed
ma zhes yongs su grags/ /sngags kyi phreng ba'i yi ge ni/ /kun nas 'phro ba mu tig 'dra/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba/ /ji srid de yi spyod yul yang / /de srid de yi 'od
zer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul/ /sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swAhA/ 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po/ /mtshungs pa
med pa'i dngos grub ster/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod/ /'di yis sdig kun mdzad byed cing / /phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /sangs
rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad/ /skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes
pa ni| |rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba
sdom| |'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i bu/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /sgyu ma dag ni thams
cad las/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub bo/ /nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'di/ /bkur bar bya bar 'os pa yin//
@#/ /ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste/ /rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro/ /thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub/ /rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba/ /sna tshogs sgyu
ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad/ /kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /stong pa nyid kyi
de nyid bskul/ /kun la kun nas thams cad du/ /kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo/ /thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur/ /sems dang
sems can ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /dbang nyid du yang de bshad do/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /sangs
rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin
pa nyid| |sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin/ /ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po/ /'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni/ /'di rnams kyi
yang rigs nyid 'gyur/ /de nyid chags dang chags bral ba/ /'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur/ /dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum
pa| |brtan pa thams cad de nyid de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa sna tshogs mchog /chos
dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /nam
mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang / /rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen
khyab| |sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod/ /che dang rin chen 'byung stobs che/ /tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog /don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' blta na
sdug /dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang / /legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin/ /rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin rtog /rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che/ /rdo rje chos dang rno ba che/ /rgyu dang smra mchog
bdud rtsi dang / /las dang go cha gnod sbyin che/ /khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che/ /rdo rje hUM mdzod hUM mdzad
dang / /rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje me ni 'od chen po/ /gzugs rnams
@#/ /kyi ni mchog gcig pu/ /ting nge 'dzin las dbang bsgyur ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gtso/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i stobs/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po
bzhi| |dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / /rjes dran drug phor gyur pa dang / /bsgom par bya ba rab tu
gnas| |de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste/ /byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa/ /mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan/ /'jig
rten 'das pa'i lam po che/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa/ /stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen
po| |rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni/ /dgu la gnas par gyur pa dang / /bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis/ /sems can bsdu
bas sdud pa dang / /so so yang dag rig pa bzhi/ /de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba/ /skal pa chen po'i mi 'jigs pa/ /mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni/ /bsam gtan gzugs med
bzhi phrag gnyis/ /tshad med pa yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems kyi skyed pa gtso/ /bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/ /nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs/ /zag bcas zag pa
med pa'i mchog /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang / /skye rgu'i bdag po skye rgu'i mgon/ /mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po/ /kun
rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang / /sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur/ /brjod du med cing spros pa bral/ /stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med/ /tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa/ /'jig
rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs/ /de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis/ /sa rnams kyi ni yongs su brtags/ /sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes/ /rdo rje'i sku
dang de bzhin du/ /ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags/ /mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po/ /rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa/ /pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che/ /thams cad sku ni las bzang byed/ /
rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku/ /rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba/ /kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor gzi brjid ldan/ /gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya/ /zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba/ /gsum pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya/ /mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje'i
'od mtha' gang zhig sa/ /bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba/ /bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya/ /dbang bskur pa ni rab tu
@#/ /gnas| |drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya/ /pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang / /rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag /bdag gi med cing yongs bzung mad//
bdun pa las kyi sa zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che/ /brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya/ /dpe ni de la yod ma yin/ /dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya/ /dpe rnams thams
cad rab 'jug pa/ /bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya/ /sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba/ /bcu gnyis so sor
bdag rig pa/ /rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid/ /sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos/ /rnal 'byor
ye shes gang brjod pa/ /thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po
las| sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor
lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba
btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du
byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs
nas ting nge 'dzin las gzhengs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do/ /zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsungs bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
pa btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par
@#/ /rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos
grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni/ 'jam dpal/ khyod legs so legs so/ /de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig
dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya
ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya/ /gru
bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje snying po yongs bcug pa/ /byang chub shing
gis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gra rnams dang / /sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /rdo rje pad+ma thams cad du/ /las kyi rdo rje thams cad du/ /'bar ba'i
phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i/ /gos dang me tog chun pos spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /ral gri rdo rje
ut+pa la| |lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs rgyan/ /chu yi gyad dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba/ /mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas/ /de la'ang sgo logs la sogs pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni spro bar
bya| |de yi nang du bri bya ba/ /'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas/ /cha brgyad dang ni yongs su ldan/ /dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras/ /rdo rje'i thig dang yongs su ldan/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher

'bar ba/ /de yi dbus su snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas/ /pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /dung
dang kun da zla ba dkar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad/ /de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa/ /khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa/ /ting 'dzin ldan
ni sdig pa bcom/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches/ /spras pa rnam par dgod par bya/ /de sngags rtag tu shes
@#/ /bya ba| |yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo/ /sa yi steng dang ldan pa g.yas/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po/ /drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba/ /thig
le nA das legs par brgyan/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis/ /don can rab tu bskyed par bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//
chos kyi sku ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshang / /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi
bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do/ /
dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa/ /me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med/ /rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas
phyung ba'o/ /oM badzra s+t+wa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don mngon
par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i
thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho rdo rje snying po bdag /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /snying po ye shes rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur
nas| |byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang / /sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas thon nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po/ ser po/ dmar pho/
ljang gu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi ye ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to/ /dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rA dza/ rjes su chags
pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rA ga /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra sA d+hu/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil
'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rat+na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi
ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra ha sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang
thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra d+harma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra he tu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra
karmA/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badzra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyung ngo / oM badzra d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig
pa mchog ni/ oM badzra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM badzri Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i
dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHaM/ oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsit+ta badzre
badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa zhes
khya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra rat+na saM b+ha wa trAM/ oM badzra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha ti hUM/ de nas de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshigs gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi tA b+hA hrIH/ oM badzra d+ha ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi aM/ oM badzra mahA ba le hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la
rnam par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na badzra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba d+harma sa ma tA dz+nyA
na badzra hUM/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs par mdzad
nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying

po 'di phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba s+t+wa sa ma tA pra pany+tsa bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga nas bka' nod cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/ de de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gra rnams su de bzhin du rnam
@#/ /par gnas so/ /sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnams su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams bshad do/ /de dag gi sngags su gyur
pa ni/ oM badzra me g+he TaM TaM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su bzhag par bya'o/ /oM sne ha badzri Ni he/ oM sha rad badzre aM aM/ oM badzri Ni kI li kI li hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes
pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o/ /oM badzra gan+d+he
hUM| oM ma d+hU badzri ni/ g+huM g+huM/ oM ma nod b+ha ba badzri Ni hI/ oM badzra shi shi re ho ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs

pa'i oM badzra d+hu pe/ oM badzra shap+te/ oM badzra gan+d+he/ oM badzra ra se/ oM badzra spar she/ mnyes par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu
ra ta s+t+waM/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas dngos grub thams
cad stsol bar mdzod/ dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang / /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid/ /kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun/ /dngos grub thams cad
rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wA na badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM pra be sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wAn/ oM tu Sh+yo hoH
b+ha ga wan badzra A be sha aH/ 'di dag ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin las so/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun
tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o/ /sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma
bcug ste dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la dang
po kho nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni/ dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis
byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni/ skyil krung bcas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub
@#/ /par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams pa bzhag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni/ gar gyi sbyor bas so/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de rked ba'i phyogs su bzung ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o//
rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni/ rdo rje'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las legs
so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje
bsdams pa las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni/ tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /kha'i thad du bskor ba ni/ rdo rje
bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thad du bskor ba ni/ rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid snying gar byas pa ni/ rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'khor lo
ltar yongs su bskor ba ni/ rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid snying gar bsgreng ba ni/ /rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni/ las sna
tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang snying ga dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje gnod
sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying gar bcangs pa ni/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du sgeg mo dang / bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad
kyi phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang / /sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang / /dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid/ /rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag
nyid nyams/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bdag 'di rdo rje'i gar byed dam/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bcing pa rab
tu sbyar| |thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis/ /skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku/ /sgeg pa'i sbyor
ba'i rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan/ /snyems bcas rdo rje can gyis dgongs/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can/ /ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya/ /'khrugs pa'i
lta stangs khro rnams kyi/ /btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / /bsdigs spyod rnams kyi lta stangs steng / /chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug
@#/ /pa'i| |shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya 'o/ /tshogs dang pho nya pho nya mo'i/ /lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa/ /g.yo ba med
cing mi 'gul ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan/ /rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med
gnas| |rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can/ /rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can/ /khro bas su ni yongs su bsdams/ /'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad//
mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can/ /'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya/ /rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral/ /shin tu brang dka'i 'dod chags dang / /sdang dang
rmongs las thams cad du/ /rol cing rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/ /g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang / /mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /lha mo pho nya tshogs kyi yang / /de la sogs
pa mtha' yas mchog /lta stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming / /phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba/ /skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya/ /ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang / /dbang po
la sogs rab dbye dang / /de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi brtags pa nyid/ /sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che/ /tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par
dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta
babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog /dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin
gzhan| |dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong pa/ /mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po/ /de sngags rtags
su shes bya ba/ /dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa 'o/ /de yi nye 'khor brgyad du ni/ /'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang / /'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
su ni| |'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas/ /sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin bri
@#/ /bar bya| |nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya/ /dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin
no| |dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun/ /cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa 'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu
bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes/ /bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi nang du 'khor
lo ni| |dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu 'o/ /de yi dbus su khro bo che/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang / /khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog /spyan gsal 'bar ba
chen po pa/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /dka' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnon/ /sangs
rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa/ /zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'/ /be con dang ni zhags par mdzod/ /
dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad/ /gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs mdzub can/ /phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag /mthe chung gnyis ni
mnyam sbyar ba'o/ /lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sprel/ /snying gar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes
bya ba'i| |phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'/ /sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam par 'khrigs/ /dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su/ /cha rnams kun
tu thams cad nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'/ /de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid/ /de la sogs
pa'i mtha' yas mchog /mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod/ /de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod
par bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams
cad kyis/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan/ /de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no/ /de
mi dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ /zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog /ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin
@#/ /pa can| |phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro/ /
mtha' yas rab 'byams rgya che ba'i/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la/ /de yi sngags su yongs grags pa/ /sha Sha'i sdi yi mtha' dge ba/ /k+Sha yig don ldan sngon
byung ba| |rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed/ /bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan/ /me yi sa bon gsal bar byed/ /thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug ces
bya'i mtshan/ /de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad/ /pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang / /bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad/ /dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri/ /mdun du bgrang
phreng pad+ma yi/ /rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ji
ltar rigs pa dgod par bya/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po 'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /dpa'
po rin chen snying po yi/ /rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi dbus su rin chen che/ /yan lag brgyad
pa mchog tu 'bar/ /de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni/ /rin chen phreng pas rnam par mdzes/ /de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra/ /rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cong pan can/
rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso/ /rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog /g.yas su pad+ma rA ga ste/ /rgyab tu in+d+ra nI la 'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu
rin chen g.yon/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni/ /gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas
dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /de yi sngags su yongs grags pa/ /bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang / /me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan/ /dbang
bsgyur ba ni steng du gnas/ /de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad/ /rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te/ /rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen no/ /rdo rje rin po
che'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang
ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i/ /'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po'o/ /kha dog sna tshogs/
@#/ /yongs 'bar ba/ /de yi dbus su brtson chen po/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni yongs su bri/ /rdo rje khur 'dzin mdzes pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /
kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ /sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad/ /bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'/ /mya ngan 'das don legs
gsal bya/ /sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan/ /sna tshogs bkra ba mchog tu 'bar/ /de yi dbang bskur
phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa kun gyi thams cad nas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil
'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che/ /sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma
brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa/ /sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can ral
gri can| |phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga/ /de yi drung du legs par gnas/ /dbyangs dang
smra ba kun nas de'i/ /thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas/ /phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor/ /sgo bzhi yis ni
shin tu mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid/ /de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /sngon du bshad pa'i cho
ga yis| |mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin/ /shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil
'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi yis ni yang dag ldan/ /phyi yi dkyil
'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du bri bya ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po//
rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o/ /kha dog nag po gzi brjid che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad/ /de yi
sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ /rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed/ /dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan/ /thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan/ /yi ge chen po'i phreng ba can/ /'khor lo/
@#/ /gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi mdun du dung yin la/ /rgyab tu zhags pa brjod par bya/ /rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che/ /'khor lo bzhin du rab tu
gnas/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /thog mar chos kyi
'khor lo bskor/ /dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /
thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo/ /de yi dkyil du snang ba che/ /mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /sems dpa' chen po nam
mkha'i mdzod/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs/ /zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che/ /sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog /gzhon nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal/ /nam
mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor brgyan par mdzad/ /'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /dbyangs dgu pa
la thig le dang / /nA da yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum ba la/ /thig le nA des rnam par brgyan/ /de yang gtso bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur/ /nam
mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa/ /ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun/ /thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i
tshul| |tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i/ /de bzhin du ni nges par bcing / /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la/ /gal te bdag ni grub 'dod
na| |mchod ba kun gyis rnam par mchod/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor snga
ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /der yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog /dkyil
'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad/ /de sngags yi ger gyur pa ni/ /sha Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba/ /rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya/ /khro
bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor/ /sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin de yi ni/ /gal te dngos
@#/ /grub mchog 'dod na/ /sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag
rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /lcags kyu yis ni rnam par mdzes/ /dbus su bcom
ldan rdo rje rgyal/ /lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che/ /'bar ba 'phro bas
rnam par brgyan/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad/ /sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar/ /sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa/ /byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas/ /
dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye/ /zla phyed thig les legs par brgyan/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas legs par sbyar/ /'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o/ /de ltar
dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge /dgug pa la sogs thams cad la/ /'gro ba 'dul pa yongs su bsdu/ /don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /
de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /
dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can/ /de yi dbus su gru gsum grags/ /lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba 'o/ /
de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o/ /gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar/ /zhags
pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba/ /de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad/ /don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po/ /sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni/ /gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par
gnas| |de yi thig le mya ngan 'das/ /sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor/ /sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che/ /'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang / /
sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen
po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes
par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pas/ /dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /de yi
@#/ /dbus su pad chen po/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag
bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /sbyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can/ /de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni/ /mdzes pa yis ni mda' gzhur 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i
lus| |'gro ba kun la chos mchog 'gyur/ /de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa/ /rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mthar thug pa/ /k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du
gnas| |dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag brgyan/ /me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen/ /re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /de lta'i
dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed/ /rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad
bya ba| |rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /de yi dbus su cher
mdzes pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa/ /de yi dbus su pad chen po/ /ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang
dag 'bar/ /der gnas dpa' po bsam par bya/ /rdo rje legs pa stobs po che/ /dung dang kun da zla ba dkar/ /kha ba ba zho'i 'od ltar mdzes/ /legs so stsol ba tshim par mdzad//
ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sgyur/ /rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa/ /de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs/ /sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /de yi sngags gyur
mdzes pa ni/ /gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar/ /lha mi yi ge sngon gang de/ /sems can don ni rab sgrub byed/ /thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan/ /legs stsol bas ni rnam
par gnas/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor/ /bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs/ /thams cad yongs su spyad par bya/ /rdo rje legs
pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ces su grags/ /rdo rje nyi ma blo gros ldan/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo
bzhi pa| |rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du bri bya ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'od po che/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i
steng du ni/ /gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba/ /de yi dbus su gzi brjid che/ /'bar pa yi ni me lta bu/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes/ /de yi
@#/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che/ /bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rgya skyegs khu tshur mtshungs pa'i mdog /phyag
bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan pa 'o/ /de yi sngags su yongs grags pa/ /kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i nyid/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa
yi mtha'/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i mchan ma ldan/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan
ming / /bdag nyid chen po rdo rje tog /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /
dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung / /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs bsgreng ba/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /
rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs/ /phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che/ /
de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la/ /me yis rab tu gsal byas pa/ /tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor/ /sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /
de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /
rdo rje bzhad ba zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dkyil
'khor chen po bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni/ /in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can/ /phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes/ /dkyil
'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od/ /'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /dbang phyug
thams cad yang dag ldan/ /de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po/ /rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya/ /stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab/ /rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa 'o/ /de lta'i
dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gru
@#/ /bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /de yi steng du 'ang pad+ma
che| |pad+ma me las yang dag byung / /gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po/ /sum mdo ris kyis rnam par brgyan/ /chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na/ /thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid
dge /de yi mdog gi de nyid ni/ /'phro ba'i ma ra ka ta 'dra/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur ba ni/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshungs
pa'i 'od/ /ji srid ngag gi 'khor lo ni/ /smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas/ /thams cad so sor gsal bar byed/ /sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung / /de lta'i dkyil
'khor bris nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil
'khor snga ma'i sbyor ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su go cha che/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su brtson chen po/ /rdo
rje srung bar yang dag ba'i/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan ba po/ /kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ /thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/
phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba chen po go 'phang mchog /de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ /sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog /mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon
par brjod/ /steng du nA das brgyan par bya/ /kun nas kha dog du ma yis/ /yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya/ /sngags kyi phreng ba yongs su ldan/ /glog gi phreng bas rnam par
brgyan| |de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu
bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus
su ni| |rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /de yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/ /phyag bzhi pa
la zhal bzhi pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po/ /kun da dung dang zla ba dkar/ /khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /sku dang gsungs dang thugs khu tshur/ /rdo rje nyid du mnyam
nyid mchog /gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba/ /khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad/ /de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni/ /brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa/ /sde tshan lnga ba'i
@#/ /gsum pa ni/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku/ /'di yi sngags la rnams par gnas/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris
nas ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog /dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi
mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog /de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni//
sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs/ /rtse gsum snam bu nyid dang ni/ /dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan/ /thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod/ /rtse gsum pa yi phyag
rgyur ldan/ /khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa/ /stag gi pags gyon phyag bzhi pa/ /thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la/ /ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba/ /chu yi
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni de bri'o/ /de'i sngags ni /oM tri sa sruM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher
