gsang ba/ /bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag po
chen po gzhag par bya'o/ /lag pa stong gi gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o/ /rang gi
sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hUM b+h+yo/ /oM nan+di ke shwa ra hUM b+h+yo/ /'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do/ /dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de
nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya/ /der ni pad+ma yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsi byed/ /la sogs mthar byed spun bri'o/ /gzhu yi phyag rgya
yongs su 'dzin/ /sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal bar byed/ /nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no/ /me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan/ /rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can/ /sngags ni/
ma d+hu kr-i ta snaM/ oM swaM/ oM sA d+ha na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can/ /dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub/ /sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ /dbus su tu ma bu ru'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o/ /lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /nub tu mi thub pa'o//
byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rim ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o/ /oM tuM bu ru hAM/ oM dza ye hAM/ oM bi dza me
@#/ /hUM/ oM a dzi te hAM/ oM a pa rA dzi te hAM/ dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du/ /khu tshur g.yon pas rab sgrub stsol/ /'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags/ /lag pa dgod par rab bshad bya/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod/ /sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas//
rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la 'o/ /mi thub de bzhin ming med la/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mtho chung la/ /lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM/ /dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab/ /rdo rje
phreng ba'i mthar thug tu/ /dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad/ /sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang / /phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu/ /so sor brtan par bya ba nyid/ /sor mo
rnams la khyad par du/ /dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs/ /rengs byed la sogs go rim bzhin/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /sngags pas mnyam par bzhag
ste bya| |de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod pa mdzad de bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje che/ /sangs
rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang / /legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog /blo gros dag pa ye shes che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig
mchog /mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba che/ /thog ma tha ma med khyab pa/ /ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don/ /shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal/ /rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che/ /rdo
rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon/ /chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog /dbang bskur kun gyi bla
ma'i bla| |theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog /dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog /zab cing yangs la phra ba dang / /thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'khor los
bsgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che/ /gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che/ /phul byung phul las phul du byung / /rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog /gzi
mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang / /legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po/ /rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che//
rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad/ /rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog /rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad/ /rgyal mtshan chen po rin
@#/ /chen tog /rdo rje bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad/ /'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che/ /shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po/ /
sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad/ /sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad/ /khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams
sbyor sel/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge /snying
po'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol ba/ /'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/ /ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes/ /gsang ba chen po
mchog tu gsang / /sba bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo/ /brjod du med cing yi ge bral/ /rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang
'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid
la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ /zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las thon te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes
rnam par sbyangs te byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs
par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo
@#/ /rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang | smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad
de yongs su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos
kyang sems can yongs su smin cing srung ba'i khro bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams
mtha' dag yongs sus min pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes
rab kyi ye shes la zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma ho zag med shes rab ni/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /shes rab shin tu dri med sems
sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to/ /dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na/ /e ma ho chos ni bsam med nyid/ /bdag gi dbang du rnam
par gnas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas thon nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul
te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byin gyis
brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje snying
po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /legs par rab tu nyon la yid
la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags
kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin
dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid me bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lta zhing rnam
@#/ /par spyod do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//
nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos
la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten
du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas so/ /oM kAM oM tsa twA ri smr-i t+yu pa
pas+thA na na hUM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skye pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /
brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs
pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /dge
ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu
'dzin to/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /chos thams cad don dam par tshad med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
pos 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM samyaka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ta a d+hiSh+Thi te aHraHhUM/ yang dag par spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba sgom par bya'o/ /sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa'i
ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu
ma'i mtshan nyid do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM ri d+hi pA da pA ra mi te la ba pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i
@#/ /pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni/ /dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa
med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /oM in+d+ri yA ba bo d+ha pra dz+nye i sheny+dza nA ma n+ya nA ya ga ta ya AHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /stobs lnga ni/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so/ /zhes bka'
stsal to| |bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ gdod ma nas dag pas
'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM baH/ stobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /changs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni/ byams pa
dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms pa'o/ /oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+hiSh+ThA na kaM maM druM k+ShaM hUM truM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa
dang / ngas pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu
ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /oM pra ti sam+bi daHswahUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
pa nyid do/ /rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims
rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni/ chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid
med pa rnam par dpyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba a nu smr-i ti bud+d+haM saM pa dA di shi hUM hUM hUM/ rjes su dran
pa drug gi shes rab bo/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
@#/ /dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i
mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba tA bo d+h+yaM ga sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi te d+huM baM/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang
dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lam zad mi shes
pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /oM A R+ya Sh+TIM ga marga mA Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gsum ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /de la stong pa nyid
kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dang / med pa'i rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems
rtsi gcig pa ste/ 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar ma byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang /
shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting
nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /chos thams cad rtogs nas
smon par mi byed de/ lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams
cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o/ /oM kha sa maHsarba d+harmAHkhaM/ de la stobs bcu ni/
gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang
@#/ /mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag ba zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /oM da sha ba la sa ma tA tha/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi
gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das
te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
la nye bar bsgrub te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das ta rnam par
shes pa mtha' yas so/ /zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam bar thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do/ /zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad du
cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med man skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam
pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar
pa brgyad pa'o/ /chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa/
snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM san+ta b+ha dre sarba swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he d+haM ShaM khaM/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral
ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /zhes dam bcas na /chos 'di rnams
@#/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/ /zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye rgyu'i tshogs gzhan
ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde
ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i sgra sgrog go /
tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye rgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor
bar mi nus pha bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do/ /zhes dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/ /zhes bya bar
bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'i lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye rgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang
yang bdag gis bar chad kyi ches su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i
'byung brtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pas sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo //
zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye rgu'i tshogs su yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid de/ ngar
'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /oM bai sha ra bya sa ma tA brap+ta a A aM aH/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/
'dod pas dben pa/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po
la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/
ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas
@#/ /te dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms
ba'o| |zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang
yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
gnas so/ /de rnams pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi
byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/ /zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched las yang dag par 'das te dam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad
du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do/ /zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa
thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad 'du
shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa
nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ /dngos po med par rtogs pa mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so/ /'di ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do/ /oM a nan+taHbi mo k+Shu mu She shuM/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o| |de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med
@#/ /pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ste| bstan pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so/ /oM sarba pA ra mi ta ar+tha pa ri pU ra Ni/ oM braM hUM taM/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o| |de las bcu pa gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i sa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka'
ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba
dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to/ /ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdong ma nas dag pa/
dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbA r+tha ba ri pU ra Ni baM b+huM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor
spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o/ /oM sarba b+h+ya bas+thA na bi ga te
hUM| rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad
la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o/ /dbang ba
dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par rab tu ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /
oM sarba ba shi te treM hruM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /ma
brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting
nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa
yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs
pa 'jug go /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su
'brang ngo / /gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste
ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas
pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na/ shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/ /oM a we Ni ka bud+d+ha d+harma sa ma te aHbI ra hUM khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid
ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de/ 'di
yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs gyi mthil
legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni/ dma' ba dang / dma' ba ni/ mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo
dang pa'i rgyal po lta bu dra bas 'brel pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa
bzhin du mdzes pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhan sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang skyes nas zla
ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang / kA tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa/ reg na bde ba'o/ /bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang /
@#/ /phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go /sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do/ /rtings pa yangs pa ste/
'di'i rting ba che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro/ /sku che zhing drang ba nyid de/ 'phye bo ma yin zhing / zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma
yin| legs par skyes pa/ rnam pa thams cad pa/ bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro/ /zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid
de| 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro/ /ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs bar 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs
su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do/ /byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu
ste| bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dwags e na ya rnams kyi lta bu'o/ /phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang
gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o/ /'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste/ spubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sku mdog gser
'dra ba ste/ 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro/ /pags pa srab pa ste/ shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza'
'dzin pa'o/ /spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro/ /smin ma'i dbus na mdzod bu can te/ 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa
lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid gyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do/ /sku stod seng+ge lta bu ste/ 'di
yi sku stod du yangs pa seng+ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro/ /dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro/ /thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing
gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no/ /yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do/ /zhes pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid do/ rtsa
rnams yin la/ de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs ba rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar
chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o/ /dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkag pa gtsug
@#/ /tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o/ /ljags ring ba ste/ snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mas reg par byed cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang dpral ba'i
mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing / bya ka la ping+ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du
'gyur ro/ /'gram pa seng+ge lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng+ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro/ /tshems dkar ba ste/ dung dang / kun da dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so/ /
tshems mnyam pa ste/ ha cang dma' ba ma yin/ mtho ba ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi chos rnams su 'gyur ro/ /tshems thags bzang ba ste/ tshems rnam par
med pa'o/ /tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o/ /spyan mthon mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag
par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi
ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa/ ma 'dzings pa/ legs par gzhol
pa'o| |sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams
kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra ni la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung
dang kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum
pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang
bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying
po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang
bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar
@#/ /thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang / zang zing dang / don mthun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i
dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ lha rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya ba'i mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub
pa ni/ ma yin no/ /byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no/ /lha thams cad kyang stong
pa nyid du mnyam pa'o/ /lha thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid
kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba ra lak+Sha na sa ma tA d+harmA te AM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen
mo mtho ba dang / sor mo rnams zlum par 'gyur ba dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long
bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng+ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs
pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su
rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku sgru ba med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa
gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum pa dang / sku skabs phyin
pa dang / sku ma rnyongs pa dang / sku skad gzhu'i lag bcags lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med
pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / pags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang / sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing ba
@#/ /lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang /
mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang /
mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / rdzi ma nag pa dang / smin ma sdug pa
dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin
ma rjes su mthun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams zhing skyon dang bral ba dang /
yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra nag pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri
zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil bas
brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can
dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin
pas mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu
ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dpe byad mnyam
pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so/ /zhes pa'o/ /oM a nu byany+dza na sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Tha ti badzra dz+nyA na hUM laM aM/ dpe byad mnyam
pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor
gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so/ /zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad do/ /oM byang chub sems chen khyod legs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog /
@#/ /sangs rgyas chos chen khyod legs so/ /tshad med ched du khyod legs so/ /shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang / /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /sangs rgyas
snga mas ma gsungs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhis mngon par dgyes par mdzad
do| |sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog /gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la/ /shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la//
rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa/ /theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha/ /gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che/ /dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi
mchog /dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal/ /ces pa'o/ /na mo stu te/ oM mAM hUM hUM na mo stu te swAhA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig
gis| |sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad
cas gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan
'das| khyod nyid kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi
de ma thag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de
nas 'di las yang dag bshad/ /byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o/ /dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba/ /
me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba/ /kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni/ /kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /ri yi
mchog gam grong khyer ni/ /me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa/ /der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog /gal te 'dod na yang dag bri/ /gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i
gnas/ /ri steng rnams su kun nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas su
@#/ /ni| |rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams/ /don dam par ni bsgrub par bya/ /pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang / /chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang / /phyag na pad+ma dpal
bya ba| |dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba/ /rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen de yi ni/ /rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya/ /
rtags gcig pa dang ba lang gnas/ /chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang / /sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'
dang / /lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /gang du mnyam par bzhag pa der/ /rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa/ /bya ba thams
cad bsgrub par bya/ /phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyis/ /phyogs su dkyil 'khor
thig brgyad pa'o/ /de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni/ /kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste/ /sna tshogs gos dang me tog
phreng / /rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi/ /sgo nang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su'o/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil
'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dkyus su ni/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya/ /shar
du bcom ldan 'khor lo bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan/ /'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad ni/ /sgeg bar bcas pa kun bri bya/ /lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba
yang dag ldan/ /gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni/ /rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri/ /byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni/ /gzi brjid phung po stobs po che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas
pa| |rim pas kun nas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi ni/ /dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che/ /rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas ba/ /
thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/ /me mtshams su ni cher 'phags so/ /bden bral du ni
rnam rgyal nyid/ /rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /gsal zhing
'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te/ /sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che/ /de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs
@#/ /dang / /bdug pa la sogs gsang chen po/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri/ /de ltar
dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ /mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin/ /de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs/ /dkyil
'khor mngon sum mthong ba las/ /snga ma rtog pa ji bzhin du/ /phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya/ /bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams/ /thams cad tshon gyis rab brtags
pa| |rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri byar 'gyur/ /rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub/ /cho ga sman dang
lhag pas kyang / /'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba/ /kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bdag nyid che'i/ /rin
chen bdun gyi mchod pa che/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar/ /dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad
byas pa'o/ /phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che/ /pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya/ /rin po che yi rin chen rnams/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dman zhing
dam tshig rnams/ /dor bar byas pa de nyid ni/ /gsang ba shes pa ma yin na/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de phyir gsang ba thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad lta
ba ni| |gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya/ /brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi/ /rdzas rnams
ji snyed thams cad de/ /rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang / /'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas/ /slar yang rin gyis blu bar bya/ /grong dang de bzhin
gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog /gang la sbyin bya cung zad yod/ /'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya/ /bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad rab mchod pa'o/ /bla ma la ni yon phul nas/ /gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba/ /mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la/ /slob ma bzhag nas
yan lag kun/ /phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas/ /khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang / /sa bon 'bras bu dud pa yi/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas phreng
ba'i dbang bskur las/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang / /sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun/ /cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal
@#/ /ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu/ /gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o/ /rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ /yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya/ /dpal kun
gyis ni mngon mtho ba/ /zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o/ /khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang / /rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba'am/ /seng+ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba/ /
dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byed cing / /dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i/ /dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba/ /bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u/ /gang yang bris nas dbang bskur
bya| |sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/ /rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do/ /tsan+dan chu dang bum pa che/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa/ /kun nas dbang bskur
ched du ni/ /rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag /gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog /dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa/ /de ni de
dang de brtag bya/ /de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad/ /dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams/ /lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong / /sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad/ /tsan+dan dang ni rgya spos dang / /ga bur de bzhin gur gum dang / /a ga ru dang lha yi shing / /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /siM hA byA g+h+ri de
bzhin mchog /kun nas sa ha de ba dang / /gi ri kar+Na tshangs mchod sbyin/ /sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad/ /lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug
cing / /dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed/ /rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni/ /gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas/ /sman kun dang ni sa bon kun/ /
'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rnal 'byor las/ /dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /dbang bskur dam pa
'od 'bar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /zhes pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// //rigs gzugs skal
bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs/ /phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs par/ /dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par
bsgyur|| ||rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pany+tsa bing+sha ti ka pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa
zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab
@#/ /kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /
'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang shing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge
slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs
su bskor cing rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams ni/ nga'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /
oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos
nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rdo rje
thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM rang bzhin rnam par dag
pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo
rje can phaT shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes
@#/ /rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM hUM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM hrIHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo/ /oM
a zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM aM baM hUM shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM eM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo/ /oM de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i sgo'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya gu h+ya ma Ni ti la ka
nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsang ba nor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo/ /bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad
par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su
rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ kha dog rnam par bkra ba'i dril bu dang
ldan pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang na
@#/ /bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod
dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
'di lta ste/ dper na/ til gyi gang bu ltar dzam+bu'i gling yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du med cing grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
nam mkha'i khams thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bgrod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings
thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po nam mkha'i khams thams cad
la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mngon par yongs su mkhyen pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas
chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur ba'i rin po che dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che'i tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa chen po'i chos dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes
chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi las sna tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su skyong ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dgongs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu bzang po don yod pa/ /'chi med rab tu
dga' ba'i gtso/ /nam mkha'i snying po gzi brjid che/ /rin chen tog ste cher 'dzum pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug chen/ /'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang / /brjod
bral sna tshogs pa yi las/ /dpa' bo gtum po dam por 'dzin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo
gsung / /las dang chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che/ /gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag
che| |u ma'i bdag po skye rgu'i mgon/ /'jug sred rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/ /'byung chen sems can
don rab mdzad/ /thams cad sems can pha chen po/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das dang brtag/ yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po/ /sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid pa gsum po'ang
de bzhin no/ /de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la
bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes
bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyi lags so/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/
@#/ /lag na rdo rje/ gsang ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad
par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
gyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed par mdzad
de| de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang mi phyed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o
bdag ni thabs chen po/ /rab tu gsang ba thig le yi/ /ting 'dzin gang phyir grub pa yang / /gsang ba nyid ni zhu bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen
po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas thon nas phyag tu 'khod par gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu gsang
ba'i thig le zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to| |lag na rdo rje/ rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni/ mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /ches shin tu gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rjes su rig pa'i don du de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni/ gsang ba'i mdzod do/ /'di
nyid pad+ma'o/ /'di nyid rdo rje'o/ /'di nyid dam tshig ste/ de nyid kyis na lag na rdo rje/ dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rjes ngas 'ga' yang ma
bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig la smra bar
bgyi| de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje
@#/ /rin chen khyod legs so/ /legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis/ /rdo rje las khyod rab legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis/ /bde blag tu ni sangs rgyas thob/ /bde ba zad med mi zad
pa| |skye ba 'di la 'grub par byed/ /ces so/ /lag na rdo rje/ des na shin tu gsang ba'i thig le las kyang mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di legs
bar sba bar bya/ sems can gang kha cig nye bar skrag pa dang bcas pa yod la/ gang kha cig dang pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa dag yod do/ /
de dag las dang po la ni/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang gsang ba thams cad bshad par mi bya zhing gsang ba thams cad bstan par mi bya'o/ /dad pa can dkyil 'khor
chen por dbang bskur pa thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /legs par gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thig le 'di ni/ ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu
gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang dag ches shin tu dga' ba skye ba de
dag ni| sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par shes par bya'o/ /de dag la 'bad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o/ /sems can gang kha cig nyan thos kyi
theg pa dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |lag na rdo rje nyon cig /sems can de dag gis lha'i ris ma mthong zhing dam tshig la rab tu snod par byed pa de dag la gal te smras na/ lo rgyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal
bar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar rab tu
'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa 'dis rigs thams cad sreg par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni/ tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par bgyi'o/ /zhes so/ /
des yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa de dag gi nang du
@#/ /bshad par mi bgyi lags na/ de ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i snying po dkyil 'khor chen
po'i dam tshig ji srid bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i don du bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba'i sbyor ba'i dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gcig tu mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin gyi khyad par du ma la mnyam par bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ma lus shing lus pa med pa sems can gyi khams thams
cad 'gugs pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i don du ji srid ting nge 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
la bka' stsal pa/ so so'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mdor bsdus te/ cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ lag na rdo rje/ dang po re zhig sngags pas lag pa gnyis a'i rnam
pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ /a'i rnam pa de dri ma med pa'i gzugs la dkar ba bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can te/ de nyid yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
'khor ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i phyir lag pa gnyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/
'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje phra mo nas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na
rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ rdo rje des ci zhig bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos
lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje thal mo dam du bcings nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba
@#/ /bi shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+honya haM/ de nas bdag nyid shel dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal ba'i gzugs su sngags pas bsgom par bya'o/ /
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid snying po byang chub la thug gi
bar du| ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa dag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi
ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /so sor brtan por bdag gis gzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
te| |bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas brtan por gzung / /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /de nyid so sor
gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu/ /rin chen
rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba 'o/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam
chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus pas/ /las
kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa rab tu bskyed pa dang / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma bsgral
ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sdom pa bzung ste phyag rgya
chen po la gnas nas sngags pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /'di dag thams cad phyi rol dang nang du rtog pas brtag pa las gzhan 'ga' yang mi
gnas so/ /zhes de ltar snying la bzhag ste 'di skad ces/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal la gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid do/ /zhes brjod
bar bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das/ sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ji ltar bsgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sems so sor rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid/ nam mkha'i dkyil ma
lus pa khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil mdzes pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong las lhag pa/ a la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i yi ge/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/
aM aHzhes bya ba de dag yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bdag nyid zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgoms pas bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor
de don yod grub pa'i gzugs su gnas so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis/ /thog med grub pa'i don yod bdag/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na
rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ji lta blta bar
bgyi| de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs par mdzad
do| |zhugs nas kyang gcig tu mi phyed par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po lag na rdo rje/ byang chub kyi zla ba de bshad par bya'o/ /zla ba de'i steng du bdag nyid byang chub kyi zla ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
pa'i gzugs/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i mchog /gnas ngan len thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong ba'i don dang /
@#/ /ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dri ma med pa sngon ma mthong ba'i zla ba lta bu ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'jug pa ste/ ka kha ga

g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ a laM k+ShaH/ ka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di dag skar ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su zhugs
te gcig tu mi phyed par gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad
kyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi ba 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la
bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ rdo rje de sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ste/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje 'bar bas rnam
par brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par klubs pa/ lus thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gang zhing dang ba/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yas
pa'i lag pas rdo rje snying gar brten pa/ zhal cung zad bzhad par sngags pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /sngags ni/ 'di yin te/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs de
bzhin gshegs pa'i skur sngags pas sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta s+thA a haM/ de nas suM gyi yi ge las sngags pas ri rab bsams la steng dang 'og
gi sgor suM dgod par bya'o/ /de nas hUM gi yi ge las khang pa brtsegs pa bsam par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs dag dang
bcas| |sna tshogs ka bas nye bar mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla ba zla ba phyed pas spud/ /nor bu dang mu tig gi phreng bas nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i rgyan du ma dang / dar
dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi chun pos nye bar spud pa/ de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sngags pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bdag
@#/ /nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas te slar yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su
gang ba rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa bsgoms te de nas hUM gi yi ge de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i lus kyi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la de nas rdo rje
sems dpa'i yi ge bkod de rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yi ge de dag yongs su son pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi zhing dkar bar bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yang byang chub
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sna tshogs rdo rje 'khums lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdo rje de nyid 'od zer dang bcas snyems pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal ras dang phyag gnyis
rdo rje gsor bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bzhugs pa/ dpral ba dang nye bar mi bskyod pa/ g.yas su rin
chen 'byung ldan/ rgyab tu 'od dpag med pa/ g.yon pa'i drung du don yod grub pa can/ de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bsgom
par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bskyed nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la lags so zhes gnang ba/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' bo/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs
so| |legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa
@#/ /chen po mngon bsdus pa'o/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag na rdo rje
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod la thams cad bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas brkyangs te sngags 'dis lag na rdo rje dbab pa
bskyed par bya'o/ /oM badzra A be sha A be sha aH/ de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nas sems dpa' rdo rje bcings la dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas dam

tshig byin la yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ shA shwa to me b+ha wa/ hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi

m+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wAn sar+b+ba taM thA ga to badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha wa badzra satwa AH/ de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje
me tog spyi bor sngags 'dis gzhag par bya ste/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /sngags pas de me tog gi phreng bas bsam par byas la/ de nas phreng ba de blangs la sngags 'dis spyi
bor bcing bar bya ste/ oM pra ti gr-ih+na s+t+waM i maM satwa mahA ba la/ de nas phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor blta bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'dis

gdod dbye bar bya ste/ oM badzra satwa sa yan+te AR+ya tsak+ShUd g+ha Ta na ta ta pa ra u g+ha Ta ya te sar+b+ba tsak+Shu badzra tsak+Shur nu tA raM he badzra pa sh+ya/ de nas nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa'i
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong na/ de nas grub par shes par bya'o/ /gal te snang ba tsam mthong na yang des dngos grub
la nye bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri'i chus sngags pas bdag la sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas pheg rdob

gsum dang / se gol gdab par bya ste/ badzra tu Sh+ya hoH/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje blang ste/ oM AR+ya a b+hi She ka ta stAM/ si bud+d+he badzra a b+hi She ka ta i daM te sarba bud+d+ha s+t+waM gr-ih+na badzrAM
su sid+d+ha ye/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad do/ /gal te slob dpon du gyur na/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags
'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas bdag la phyag rgya 'di dang sngags 'dis dbang bskur te/ oM badzra
satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA ma a b+hi Shi ka ta he badzra nA ma/ sems dpa' gang gi ming du gyur pa'i ming de la brjod par bya'o/ /de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa dang /
@#/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas
dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dbab pa bskyed par bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi/ badzra e Sha s+t+waM d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM ho/ /de nas bdag la rdo rje
sems dpa'i dam tshig brjod par bya ste/ oM ma hA satwa sa ma ya s+t+waM haM/ de nas de ltar byin gyis brlabs te slar yang yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma

ya s+t+waM/ oM sa ma ya satwa haM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+taM
shri yeHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /b+ha ga wA na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba badzra satwa aH/ de nas yang de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du lag pa g.yon
par dril bu/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje snying kar bzhag la thams cad sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin bsgoms te/ sgom pa'i rim pa des rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dam de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / dga' ba zlos pa thams cad la sngags pas thog ma kho nar 'di ltar bsgoms te bya'o/ /
gsang ba chen po rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje thig le las/ sems so sor rig pa la sogs pa rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bdag pos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la bzhugs nas dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / lag na rdo rje
la sogs pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste/ de nas de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
po thog ma dang tha ma med pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje
dang po kun tu bzang / /phyag na rdo rjer phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje rgyal po blo bzang mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje
'gugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje chags pa bde ba che/ /rdo rje mda' ste dbang du byed/ /'dod pa chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje gzhu la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje tshim par cher dgyes pa/ /rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje dgyes par phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje rin chen don bzang mchog
@#/ /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug /rdo rje snying por phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal
ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje sgron mar phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can don rab rdo rje tog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan legs tshim pa/ /rdo rje tog ste rdo rje
che| |phyag 'tshal rdo rje sku khyod la/ /rdo rje gad mo gad rgyangs che/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /dga' zhing rab dgyes rdo rje mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod
la| |sems can don rab rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje pad+ma legs dag pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje'i spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la/ /rdo rje rnon po theg pa che/ /
rdo rje mdzod de mtshon cha che/ /'jam dpal rdo rje zab mo ste/ /rdo rje blo gros khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje rgyu ste snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /rab bskor rdo rje
las skyes pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgyan khyod la/ /rdo rje smra ba rigs bzang mchog /rdo rje bzlas pa legs grub gsol/ /mi smra rdo rje dngos grub mchog /phyag 'tshal
rdo rje gsung khyod la/ /rdo rje las rab rdo rje mtshan/ /las kyi rdo rje kun 'gro mdzes/ /rdo rje don yod cher yangs pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje srung ba
brtan pa che/ /rdo rje chos te cher sra ba/ /'thab dka' shin tu dpa' ba'i mchog /rdo rje brtson 'grus khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po/ /rdo rje mche ba cher
'jigs pa/ /bdud rab 'joms pa'i rdo rje drag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gtum khyod la/ /rdo rje mtshams te legs bsnyen pa/ /rdo rje 'ching ba rab dgrol ba/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam
tshig mchog /rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /dge ba 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang la sogs/ /kun gyi dam pas dbang
bskur ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /mtshan 'di rnams kyis yon tan tshogs/ /rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod byed na/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs/ /mtshan brgya
rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /bdag cag rnams kyis mngon bstod pa'i/ /theg pa chen po mngon rtogs pa'i/ /tshul chen po ni rnam par spros/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba bgyid/ /
cho ga dam pa gsung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gi ni/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
@#/ /par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad rgyud gzhan las bshad pas
na| 'di mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje 'chang de bzhin
