de phyin chad ni nga dga' bo/ /dpa' bo chen po zhes su grags/ /skye ba med par ngas rtogs pa/ /tshig gi spyod yul rnam spangs shing / /nyes pa thams cad med pa ste/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin/ /
stong pa'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba/ /mun pa kun dang bral gyur cing / /shin tu dri med de kho na/ /ji ltar 'byung ba nga las byung / /kun mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas
mtshan nyid do/ /nga yi de nyid dam pa 'di/ /'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste/ /byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis ni/ /yig 'bru rnams su bstan nas su/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /
ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /ngo mtshar gyur nas mig gdangs te/ /thams cad mkhyen la mgo bo yis/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi thabs dang ni/ /shes rab bsam yas ngo mtshar che/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba yis/ /chos rtogs nas ni rang byung rnams/ /'jig rten kun gyi re ba kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par
byed pa ste/ /gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /bden pa gnyis la legs gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyis shes na ni/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchod gnas 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i
bdag po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mig mi 'dzum pa'i lta bas bltas nas cad mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la
gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ dogs pa dang ni bral ba ru/ /'jig rten mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing / /srid dang skye ba rnam
slangs pa'i/ /'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang du 'dod/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams
@#/ /skye ba dang / 'jig par rtogs nas mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir shin tu dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod de/ 'di ni/ nyan thos rnams kyi
ting 'dzin gyi tshul/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa rnams ni/ chos thams cad brjod du med
do snyam pa'i ye shes 'jug ste/ dag shin tu 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par reg par byed pa 'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag
po| gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang / las las 'byung ba'am ldog par rtog cing / /gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun tu skye bar 'gyur
te| 'di ni/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul/ /yin te de la gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas/ /
byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /nyan thos des pa sdig bcom par/ /grags pa gang dag yin pa dang / /'jig rten pa yi lha gang yin/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i cho ga'i tshul//
sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /dpa' bo de tshe 'chad par byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
po| gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni/ /tshig dang ming dang brda yis mtshan/ /tshig de dbang du gyur pas na/ /gsang sngags don rnams
thams cad sgrub/ /kha cig skul ba'i tshig dang ldan/ /kha cig rang ming thog mar smos/ /hUM dang phaT dang ldan pa ni/ /gtsug tor rnams kyi yin par bsgrags/ /zungs zo choms shig ces
pa dang / /snun song drol cig zer ba ni/ /phyag brnyan rnams dang khro bo yi/ /gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs/ /na maHswAhA/ la sogs ldan/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rtogs pas
mtshan| |zha bi'i yi ge rnam par dag /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa'i yin/ /nyan thos rnams kyi gsang
sngags ni/ /gcig pu gzhi ni gcig la gnas/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi'ang de bzhin te/ /khyad par dag ni bshad bya ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las/ /las tshe rnam par sbyong zhes bya/ /gsang
ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byed du ma bcug /rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni/ chos
@#/ /rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni/ ye nas gnas pa ste/ de yang 'di
ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs
pa 'jig rten du byang ba de'i tshe chos nyid de tshul sna tshog dang / dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshog sdang / yig 'bru sna tshogs
dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna tshogs su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te gsang sngags kyis tshul 'chad do/ /ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis rlob ce na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar
yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang dag
yin pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyi bsod
nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la skal pa
ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang gang zhe na/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir a ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /dgongs
pa dang bral ba'i phyir ka ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir kha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /'chi 'pho thams cad dmigs su med pa'i
phyir ga ni/ chos thams cad kyis go 'o/ /gcig tu 'phungs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir g+ha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /'chi 'pho thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir tsa ni/ chos thams
cad kyi sgo 'o/ /grib ma thams cad dang mtshungs pa'i phyir tsha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir dza ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /dri ma dmigs su med ba'i
phyir ga ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir Ta ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /bskyed pa dmigs su med pa'i Tha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo 'o/ /'khrug pa
@#/ /dmigs su med pa'i phyir Da ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /slu ba dang yongs su bral ba'i phyir D+ha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs
su med pa'i phyir ta ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir tha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'dul ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir da ni/ chos thams
cad kyi sgo'o/ /khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir d+ha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dbu ba 'dra
bar snying po med pa'i phyir pha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ngag gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir ba ni/ /chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /srid pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir b+ha ni/ chos
thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /'chi ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /theg pa chen po thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ya ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rdul
thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ra ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /mtshan nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir la ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i phyir sha ni/ chos thams
cad kyi sgo'o/ /rang bzhin gyis bem po'i phyir Sha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /bden pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rgyud dmigs su med

pa'i phyir ha ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ nga dang / nya dang / Na dang / na dang / ma ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bste/ mthu thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu myur bar
dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang sngags kyi tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don nges pa/ dus gsum las shin tu
'das pa/ nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa ste/ bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas/ /las dang bya ba dag las byung / /spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas/ /bsam yas 'bras bu smin par byed/ /
'di ni de nyid dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bstan/ /gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes na/ /sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog /gsang sngags
rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan/ /sngags pas yid la sems na ni/ /'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas 'thob bo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /de ni/ nyan thos
@#/ /dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang thun
mong ma lags pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sngags pa de yis su/ /me tog ser po dkar po dmar/ /yid du 'ong bas nan tan du/ /lha
rnams la ni mchod pa byas/ /pad+ma yang na ut+pa la/ /nA ga ge sar bun ga /tsam pa a sho ti la ka /pa ta la dang sa la'ang rung / /de la sogs pa'i me tog rnams/ /yid du 'ong zhing
blta na sdug /bkra shis pa la sngags pa yis/ /mkhas pas nan tan mchod pa bya/ /tsan+dan ta dkar spri ka dang / /gur gum dang ni ru rta'ang rung / /spos mchog rab tu bzang po ni/ /sna
tshogs yid du 'ong ba dbul/ /a ga ru'am sgron shing ngam/ /ga bur dang ni tsan+dan dang / /sA la'i thang chu bkra shis pa'am/ /shri ra bi sa ka yang rung / /gzhan yang bdug spos sna
tshogs pa/ /bkra shis 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /yid 'ong sngags pas cho ga bzhin/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che/ /lha bshes las kyi cho

ga nyon| |'o thug 'bras tshan zhor sbyar dang / /la du dang ni khur skya dang / /gor b+hod ka ra yid 'ong dang / /khaN+DA'i bca' ba bzang po dang / /pu ri ka dang ka ri ka /de bzhin ma thu shi ra dang / /phe na
a shog bar ti dang / /par pa ha yang dbul bar bya/ /de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang / /shing tog rnams ni sna tshogs dang / /hwags dang li kha ra rnams dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dag
dag dang / /btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /zho dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul/ /mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /gtsang zhing shin tu bzang po yi/ /'bru mar rab tu dri zhim pas/ /rab tu bkang ste
dbul bar bya/ /phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams/ /kha dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags/ /rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni/ /dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul/ /yang na yid kyi mchod
pa ni| |thams cad nan tan bskyed de bya/ /de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni/ /bcu drug rgyas par blangs nas su/ /sman dang rin chen thams cad blugs/ /spos kyi chus ni rab tu bkang / /ldum
bu dag gis kha brgyan te/ /de bzhin 'bras bus kha yang dgang / /me tog spos la sogs pas brgyan/ /shin tu bzang po srung ba byas/ /mgrin pa ras kyis bcings pa rnams/ /mkhas
pas rnam par dgod par bya/ /lha yi gtso bo rnams la ni/ /ras ni zung re zung re dbul/ /sems dpa' chen po phal pa rnams la/ /ya re dbul bar rab tu bsgrags/ /mchod pa de ltar byas
@#/ /nas ni| |slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste/ /sngags pas chu yis bsang gtor bya/ /dri dang me tog sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas/ /byang
chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug /de nas rgyal ba'i rigs dge la/ /thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcing / /chos
kyi 'khor lo 'ang bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dbas byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni/ /dam tshig sdom brtson can gyis bcings/ /de tshe sngags kyi cho ga bzhin/ /
ras la lan gsum gdab par bya/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su/ /de dag gi ni gdong yang dag /dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni/ /spyi bor yi ge ra zhes pa/ /klad kyi gor bcas
brjid dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi/ /kha dog dkar po gzhag par bya/ /skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /me tog gang la
bab de ni/ /sngags pas de la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo yi drung / /sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha/ /dkyil 'khor gyi na sgo gnyis kyi/ /bar du slob ma gzung bar bya/ /der gnas
pa la cho ga kun/ /rim pa bzhin du legs par bya/ /slob ma sdig dang bral ba kun/ /de ltar legs par bcug nas ni/ /de dag zhi bar byang ba'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya/ /snying
po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgyab rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/ /ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya/ /me thab khru gang tsam gyi ni/ /tshad du rab tu
bsgrags pa yin/ /kha ran sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag /de nas sngags pa'i g.yas logs su/ /sbyin sreg gi ni yo byad gzhag /g.yon gyi phyogs su slob ma
rnams/ /tsog tsog por ni 'khor du gzhug /sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du/ /ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug /yang na tshon rtsi dkar po mchog /rab tu bzang po blangs nas su/ /de yis
mi yi gnas rnams kun/ /sngags pas mdo ru bri bar bya/ /ku sha dag gis g.yas phyogs nas/ /thams cad khor yug dgram pa ni/ /mang pos bskor ba'i tshul du dgram/ /spos kyi chu
yis bsang gtor bya/ /de nas sems can phan byed pa'i/ /me ni thab khung nang bsams nas/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos dgang lugs mchog /gsang sngags 'di yis sbyin par bya/ /na maH
sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ag+na ye swAhA/ de nas slob ma re re nas/ /mkhas pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bong bzung nas su/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sbyin sreg bya/ /yid ni mnyam

par bzhag nas su/ /sreg blugs re re las kyang ni/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin zlos shing / /nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM mahA shAn+ti ga tA shan+ti ka ra pra sha ma
@#/ /d+harma nir dzA ta/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba d+harma sa ma tA prAp+te swAhA/ sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis/ /slob ma rnams la yon bslang ba/ /gser dang dngul dang rin
chen dang / /rta dang de bzhin glang po dang / /rnga ma pa dang ma he gos/ /gzhan yang dngos po ci yang rung / /de tshe slob mas gus par ni/ /dad pa rab tu ldan pa yis/ /sems la dga' ba
bskyed nas su/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul lo/ /yang na ci nas bla ma de/ /rab tu mgu bar 'gyur bar bya/ /de ltar byas nas bdag bsrungs te/ /slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni/ /'di ni bsod
nams zhing yin zhes/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis gsungs/ /rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /dge 'dun la ni kun gyis byin/ /dge 'dun la
phul 'bras bu che/ /skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag gis/ /dge 'dun la ni yon phul na/ /longs spyod chen po mi zad pa/ /'jig rten pa la skye par 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad mthun par ni//
sems dpa' dga' ba bskyed nas su/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la/ /ci nus par ni mchod ston bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa/ /rgyas pa ru ni bshad par bya'i/ /yid gcig
bsdus te legs par nyon/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar khru do bor nas phyi rol gyis la dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi ba la sgo gcig
pa bri bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi dgod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spros pa med par gnas pa dang / nam mkha' dri ma med pa dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / gos sna tshogs
gyon pa rnams so/ /dbus su pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bzhag ste 'dab ma bzhi la byang chub sems dpa' grogs su gyur pa/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu can du gyur pa
bzhi bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin can dang / phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can dang / snying rje can no/ /'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni/
phyag brnyan bzhi bri ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi khyad par la spyod pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs byed dang / ma chags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'o/ /dbus su ni/ chos
kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs gzhag go /de nas rin po che'i bum pa bzhi rin po che dang sman thams cad blugs pa/ kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song thams cad bong ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma 'dab ma de la ni/ /sngags pa bdag gis de bzhag nas/ /spos
@#/ /dang me tog gis mchod de/ /mar me mchod yon sbyin par bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /rnga sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / /bkra shis rgya chen snyan po
yis| |tshig gis legs par mngon dgar bya/ /skyob pa rnams kyi spyan snga ru/ /de ni bsgrims te dbang bskur ro/ /spos dang me tog bzang po yis/ /de la yang ni mchod pa bya/ /
de nas gser gyi thur ma ni/ /thogs te mdun du 'dug nas su/ /slob ma'i snying la dbab pa'i tshig /'di skad ces ni smra bar bya/ /sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten
ling tog bsal ba bzhin/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /de nas me long blangs nas su/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /chos rnams gzugs
brnyan lta bu ste/ /dwangs shing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las byung ba ste/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems
can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skyes/ /de nas rkang pa'i bar 'og tu/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag par bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yas par yang / /shin tu
bzang po'i dung byin te/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /kun tu rgyas par bus nas su/ /de ring phyin chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya
zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan thogs byas pa gzo zhes
bya| |rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang / /khyod la rnam pa kun tu srung / /de nas slob ma de bslang la/ /sngags pa snying rjer ldan gyur pa'i/ /yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni/ /de la dam tshig bstan
par bya| |de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis/ /dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/ /srog gi phyir yang de phyin chad/ /yongs su gtang bar mi bya 'o/ /khyod kyis ser sna dang ni gang / /sems
can gnod pa mi bya 'o/ /dam tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod la bshad/ /ji ltar rang gi srog srung ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis 'di dag srungs/ /slob mas bla
ma'i rkang pa la/ /dad cing gus par phyag byas nas/ /shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de dag thams cad khas blang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo
rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig la zhugs
par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig mngon par 'dus bgyis par rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la
@#/ /'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa ji
tsam de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod
kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin par rig par bya 'o/ /rigs
kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag phyogs gang na gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa des chen po dgongs mi dgos par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de dag la mchod par bya 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis de
dag la blta bar bya 'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis mgrin gcig
tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de rnams la rim gror bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su blta bar bgyi ba lags so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'jug pa/ rgya chen po las byung ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi nor bu dang 'dra
ba| re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rtogs pa la gnas pa/ dus gsum du chags pa med
pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang / thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i tshod la bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rnam par sprul bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu g.yogs nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi tog
@#/ /rgya chen po yongs su dag pa'i rtse mo la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas
'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings khyab pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongs su skyob pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo

stobs chen po srung ba chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le sar+b+ba thA ga te pu N+ya ni rdza te/ hUM hUM tra ta tra ta
a pra ti ha te swA hA/ sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags 'di gsungs mod la ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas zhing 'di dag /rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /byang chub sems
dpa' de kun gyis/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig gdangs nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smras pa/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /srung ba
rab tu stobs chen 'di/ /sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang / /bskyab cing sba ba'i phyir gsungs te/ /gang gis snying la srung gnas pa/ /de dag la ni 'jigs pa med/ /gsang
sngags mthu chen dran byas na/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ni/ /de dag thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom

ldan 'das kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi snying bo can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs ma thag tu dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags 'di byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sa me/ tri sa me/ sa ma ye swAhA/ de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags kyi sgra gang zhig thos na/ mkhas pa rnams chos thams cad las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgra grags par

gyur to| |de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byung ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+harma d+hA tu swA b+hA ba At+ma kony+haM/ chos kyi dbyings su byin

gyis brlab pa 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/ badzra At+ma kony+haM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/ badzra ka ba tsa hUM/ rdo rje go cha 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA

ga ta tsak+Shu r+b+h+ya a ba lo ka ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bi shud+d+ha gan+d+ho da b+ha ba swAhA/ byug spos kyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA me tri byung ga ta

swAhA/ me tog gi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga ta swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ra tsi s+pha ra Na a pa b+hA sa ga ga no t+ta re b+h+yaH
@#/ /swA hA| mar me'i sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na sa ma sa ma swAhA/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na nan+d+ha s+pha ra Na/ bi shud+d+ha

d+ha rma ni ra dza ta swAhA/ gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra dz+wa la bi spu ra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dz+wA la ma li na ta thA
ga ta ra tsi swAhA/ kun tu 'bar ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ma hA ta thA ga ta dzi hA sad s+ya d+harma bra tiSh+Thi ta swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor du dgong pa'i
gsang sngags kyi mdzod do// //bam po gsum pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ dkyil
'khor 'dri ba'i tshe na ni/ /bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba lags/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i tshe na yang / /log 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rnams kyang ji
ltar sgrub/ /de yi 'bras bu ci 'drar 'gyur/ /de skad gsol nas de yi tshe/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis/ /'di skad ces ni bka' stsal pa/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so
legs| |khyod kyis yongs su dris pa gang / /thams cad khyod la bstan par bya/ /sngon chad ser sna bsten pa'i phyir/ /bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung / /de yi rgyu ni gzhig
pa'i phyir/ /gang du sems dang sems byung ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad spong ba dang / /rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i/ /spros pa thams cad 'gag 'gyur ba'i/ /byang chub sems zhes bshad ba
yin| |sngags pas byang chub sems dran zhing / /mi g.yo ba ni yid la bzlas/ /de yi phyag rgya bcings na ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la
rlung bcing ba 'di nyon cig /a zhes bya bar bdag bsgyur te/ /haM zhes bya ba yid la bzlas/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /sa la spos kyi thig le dag /bdun nyid legs par byas nas
su| |kham phor gyis ni dgab par bya/ /kham phor ri rab chen po ru/ /yang dang yang du bsam par bya/ /de yi steng du a zhes pa/ /klad kor bcas pa rgyas par bsam/ /rlung bcing chen po de lta bu//
sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /sems dpa' chen po chu yi yang / /yid gcig bsdus te mnyam par gyis/ /sngags pas ra zhes bya ba ni/ /thams cad dmar po stobs chen bsam//
'bar ba'i phreng can mi zad pa/ /khro bo lag na ral gri thogs/ /sa la sprin gyi gzugs bris nas/ /ral gri phyag rgyas dbab par bya/ /phyogs kun nas ni langs pa'i sprin/ /de ma thag tu
'jig par 'gyur/ /yang na sngags pa mi g.yeng bas/ /de dag phur bus gdab bya ste/ /mkhas pa rdo rjer gyur nas su/ /thams cad rdo rje phur bus gdab/ /yang na bgegs rnams
@#/ /thams cad ni/ /zhi bar bya ba yang bshad de/ /sngags pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/ /mi g.yo stobs chen gsang sngags ni/ /shin tu mi zad bdag
nyid kyi| |dkyil 'khor dag la gnas par bsam/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bor gzer/ /'on tang de ni zhir 'gyur ba'am/ /dogs pa med par
'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /ske tshe dug khrag bsres pa yis/ /byugs nas sngags pas bskams na ni/ /gdon de myur du tshig par 'gyur/ /de ni me la
bskams pa dang / /dug gis bskus na nges par ni/ /tshangs pa'am 'on te brgya byin yang / /de yi mod la myur du 'tshig /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag gis 'di ltar mjal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la
gnas na/ lha rnams byin gyis rlob par bgyid do/ /de nyid du gnas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las kyang 'gal bar mi bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
'di ltar rang gi rigs la gnas pa de ni/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dam tshig lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
pa rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas la gnas nas don thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin
no| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang / gang gi kha dog gang gsungs pa/ /de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor te/ /lha yi gzugs ni de lta bur/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan/ /
de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can blo zhan pa ma dad pa gang bstan pa 'di la dad par mi 'gyur zhing yid gnyis dang so ma nyi mang ba/ thos pa tsam snying por
'dzin pa/ sgrub pa la mi phyogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ bdag nyid kyang ma rung la gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin no/ /'di skad du 'di ni/ phyi rol pa rnams la yod de/ sangs
rgyas kyis gsungs pa ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes smra bar 'gyur gyi/ mi blun po de dag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes pa/ sems can
gyi don rtogs par thugs su chud pa des sngon sems can rnams la phan par bzhed nas 'di dag thams cad bshad do/ /zhes bya bar ni mi shes so/ /chos rnams kyi ni chos kyi mtshan/ /
blun po des ni de mi shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /stong pa nyid du yang dag gsungs/ /sngags pa rtag tu der gnas nas/ /rab tu nges par las bya'o/ /bgegs zhi bar
@#/ /bya ba'i rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgo ji ltar rtogs pa
rang rang gi tshig tu brjod pa'i tshig gis gsang sngags rnams smra bar 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag la mi nyams pa'i chos nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs
pa bzhin sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smros shig /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi
yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa man+tA nu ga ti ba ra dza d+ha rma ni ra dza tA ma hA
ma hA swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byams pa chen po kun tu mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang

gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a dzi ta na dza ya/ sar+b+ba sa twa ya sha yA nu ga ta swAhA/ byams pa'i 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po rnam par dag pa'i yul
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ A ka sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsit+t+waM ba ra d+ha ra swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i 'o/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba snying rje chen po'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta
bud+d+hA nAM/ A sAd ta hr-i ta/ a byud ga ta/ trAM trAM raM raM swAhA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun tu sbyan ras

gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta ka ru NA mA yA ra ra ra hUM dzaH

swAhA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dzi dzaM sa swAhA/ mthu chen thob pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ku ru Nod b+ha be tA re tA ra Ni swAhA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o/ /na maH

sa man+ta bu d+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba b+ha ya twA sa ni hUM s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta bi sha ya saM b+ha pe/ pad+ma mA li ni swA hA/ gos dkar can gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta
@#/ /bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM kha da ban+d+ha s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ rta mgrin gyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po rdo rje mi shigs pa rtog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha su tA nu swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i 'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he he/ ku mA ra ka/
pi muk+ti/ sa thi r+tha ti/ sma ra sma ra/ pra ti ha na swAhA/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAn/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ phyag na rdo rje'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzra NA na/ tri Ta tri Ta/ dza ya na ti swAhA/ mA

ma kI'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ badzrod b+ha be sarba tra a pra ti ha te swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAn/ hi hUM phaT swAhA/

khro zla gtso bo'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrI NAn/ sar+b+ba d+ha rma nir b+he da ni/ badzra su tsi ba ra de swAhA/ rdo rje rtse mo'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ dzaM dzaM swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin

pa kun gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ he he kiny+tsi ra yA si gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ khA da khA da/ pa ri bU ra ya sa pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/ phyag brnyan thams cad kyi'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub

pas rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ sar+b+ba kle sha ni shud+d+hA na sar+b+ba d+harma

ba shi prA p+ta ga ga na/ sa ma sa ma swA hA/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ba ra de bar prA p+te hUM/ mdzod spu'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ baM baM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ gtsug tor thams

cad kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+h+riM d+h+riM/ riM riM/ dzri dzri swA hA/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa ces bya ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pa ri dza ta/ dza la na ti/ dz+ha Ti te swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi

thub ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ pri the bye swAhA/ sa'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ biSh+Na be swAhA/ khyab 'jug gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ru drA ya swA hA/ drag po'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA

nAM| bA ya be swAhA/ rlung lha'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ swA ra swA t+yai swAhA/ dbyangs can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ rak+ta sA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ bden bral gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bai

ba sa twA ya swAhA/ gshin rje'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA NAM/ mr-i ta ye swAhA/ 'chi bdag gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ kA la rA tri ye swA hA/ dus mtshan gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ mA hri
@#/ /b+h+yaHswAhA/ ma mo rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sha kA ya swAhA/ brgya byin gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a paM pa ta ya swAhA/ chu lha'i 'o/ /na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a da t+ye'o ya swAhA/ nyi ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ pra dzA pa ta ye swAhA/ tshangs pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsan+d+ra ya swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA
nAM| me g+ha sha ni ye swA hA/ dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo'i 'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bstan pa don yod par grub par bzhed nas sangs rgyas dang byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na bar la k+Sha Ne ga ga na sa ma sa r+b+bod ga ta ti sa ra saM b+ha be dza la na mo a mo
g+ha nAn swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum nam mkha'i spyan gyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i
phyir gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bgegs chen po 'joms pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro

Sha na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ twa ga ha mA/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ ha ha ha/ bi sma ye/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te bi Sha ya saM b+ha ya tre lo kya bi dza ya hUM dzaHswA hA/ khams gsum

rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he tu pra t+ya ya bi ga te d+hA rma ni rA dza ta hUM/ nyan thos rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA

nAM| sar+b+ba bud+d+hA bo d+ha si twa hr-i da yA na be sha ni na maHsarba bid+yA swAhA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ lo ka lo ka ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba

de ba| nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan+d+ha rba/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin na ra/ ma ho ra ga hr-i da yA na/ n+ya ka ri Sha ya bi tsi tra ga ti swA hA/ lha la sogs pa spyi'i snying po 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA/

bI ma ti/ baM ki ra Na/ d+harma d+hA tu nir dzA ta saM saM ha swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ durdan+ta ma hA ro Sha NA khA Da ya sa rbAn ta thA ga A dz+nyAM ku ru swAhA/ sgo srung

gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he ma hA bra tsaN+Da a b+hi mu kha gr-ih+Na khA da ya/ kany+tsi rA ya sa sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ sgo srung mngon du phyogs pa zhes bya ba'i 'o/ /na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba tra a nu ga te/ ban+d+ha si maM/ ma hA sa ma ya nir dza te sma ra Ne/ a pra ti ha te/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da sha di shan sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a nu ga te/ pra brta d+harma laM d+ha bi

dza ye b+ha ga ba ti bi ku ri bi ku le le lu bu bri swA hA/ mtshams chen po gcod pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ a/ byang chub kyi'o/ /A/ spyod pa'i 'o/ /oM/ rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'o/ /a/
@#/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ hA/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NA na/ hAM/ 'phags pa mi g.yo
mgon gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/

pa| phyag na rdo rje'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ maM/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga/ nam mkha'i sbyan gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ram/ chos kyi dbyings kyi'o/ /na

maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ khaM/ dpa' bo chen po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dzaM/ chu'i dbang po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ taM/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hrIHkhro nyer can

ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ paM/ gos dkar can gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saM/ mthu chen thob pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM/ rta mgrin gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/

yaM| grags 'dzin ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saM/ phyag na rin chen gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dra ba'i 'od kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ b+ha/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /nA maH
sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hAM T+yaM ruM/ gtsug tor gsum gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ laM/ gdugs dkar po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ shaM/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta

bud+d+hA nAM/ saM/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ triM/ gzi brjid phung po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM/ rnam par 'thor ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/
hUM| gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bI/ sa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ki li/ skra can ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ di li/ nye skra can ma'i 'o/ /
na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ mi li/ sna tshogs ma'i'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hi li/ nor ldan ma'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hA sa nA na/ do mtshar can gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta
bud+d+hA nA na/ ra sa nA na/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ d+hAM sa nA na/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/
bi ha sa nA na/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ ShaM/ byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ yaM/ snying rjes gdungs
pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ i/ gdungs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ aM/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros can gyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA

nA| traM/ rin chen 'byung gnas kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ ShaM/ phyag na rin chen gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ TaM/ sa 'dzin gyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ aM/ gzungs
@#/ /thob pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ D+haM/ phyag na rin chen phyag rgya'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ NaM/ bsam pa brtan po'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA
nAn/ haM/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ raM/ nam mkha'i blo gros kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ ga taM/ blo gros rnam par dag pa'i 'o/ /na maHsa

man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ d+hIM/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ hUM/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ d+h+rIM shriM haM braM/ phyag brnyan rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa

man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ k+Sha da ha ra yaM kaM/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ na mo mA ye d+ha rma saM b+ha be bi b+ha be ka T+ha ne saM sa ne/ gnas gtsang ma
pa rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ kraM ke ri/ srin po rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ hrIHha/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ yak+Sha bIR+ya
d+ha ra| gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ mi tsi mi tsi/ sha za mo rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ guM guM/ iM iM/ 'byung po rnams kyi'o/ /na maHsa

man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ra TaM ra TaM/ braM TaM braM TaM/ lha ma yin rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ga ra laM pi ra laM/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ ha sa nAn
bI a sa nAn/ mi 'am ci rnams kyi 'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a ta tsi lA raM ma no me/ mi rnams kyi 'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ des de la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags
ngas bshad de/ de la gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /snying po des pas mnyan par gyis/ /a zhes bya ba sngags kun gyi/ /snying po yin par yang dag bshad/ /de la gsang sngags
kun gnas te/ /de ltar sngags rnams rnam par nges/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ spyi'i gsang sngags kyi
mdzod rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang sngags
ji ltar bsgrub pa dang / /bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin nyon/ /yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar/ /de bzhin gzhi las gzhir gyur pa/ /shin tu bsdams pas yid la ni/ /bzlas brjod
'bum phrag gcig bya 'o/ /yi ge byang chub sems yin te/ /gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /bzhi ni rang gi lhar bzhag pa/ /rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya/ /gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs
sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis mchog tu shes par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa/ /sngags pas de la gnas par bsam/ /yi ge rnams ni go rim bzhin/ /de yi dbus su
@#/ /legs par dgod/ /slar sdud pa yi tshig gis non/ /srog dang rtsol ba rnam par sbyangs/ /srog ces bya ba rlung du bshad/ /rtsol ba dran pa zhes bya
ste| |de gnyis bsngams pa byas nas su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya/ /de nas sngags pa zla gcig tu/ /shin tu bsngams te bzlas pa byas/ /gsang sngags sngon du
spyad pa ni/ /gzhi gcig nas ni gcig tu 'jug /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngar spyad pa zhes bshad pa yin/ /de phyin chad ni gang cung zad/ /me tog spos la
sogs dbul zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bya'i phyir/ /de tshe byang chub tu yang bsngo/ /sngags pas 'jigs med de lta bur/ /zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i
tshe| |mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas/ /de bzhin 'bab chu'i mdo dag dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo mtshan gcig dang / /ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /dkyil
'khor nan tan bri bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje'i khang par byas/ /des ni der gnas bsrungs byas nas/ /sgrub pa la ni nan tan bya/ /der ni mtshan mo nam phyed dam/ /yang na nyi ma 'char

ba'i tshe| |'di lta'i ltas rnams 'byung 'gyur te/ /blo dang ldan pas de shes bya/ /hUM zhes pa dang rnga sgra dang / /de bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig kyang rung / /de ni nam mkha'
las grags nas/ /mtshan ma dag ni de rnams kyis/ /yid bzhin rjes grub shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/ /de yi 'bras bur yang dag bshad/ /de ltar sngags
kyi tshul gnas pa/ /de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /sngags nyid rtag tu dran par bya/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /de ni dran par bya ba'ang
bshad/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'o// //
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ dus gsum mtha' yas
pa'i sgo nges pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig rnams gsungs so/ /mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa/ /rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed/ /ngo bo
nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid/ /rkyen la rag las zab cing blta bar dka'/ /khyad par 'gro ba rnams la rtag pa ru/ /rnam par bsam pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed/ /ji ltar nam
mkha' chags med spyod yul can/ /'gro ba kun gyi gnas su gyur pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid 'di/ /srid gsum ma lus 'byor par 'byung bar byed/ /mchog skyes mkhas
@#/ /pa gang zhig 'dir spyod na/ /rgyal ba kun dang spyod yul gcig par 'gyur/ /rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni/ /shin tu rnam dag thams cad snang
byed pa| |de las go 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan med do/ /yangs pa'i chos ni zab la 'grib med cing / /mnyam med 'jig rten phan byed de la ni/ /rnam rtog rnam par spangs te spyad
par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor tshogs pa la gzigs nas phyag na rdo
rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ gang gis na sems can rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na la dga' ba dang mgu ba thob nas bde ba la reg par 'gyur
ba| rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs su gyur pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig rnams ston cig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi rjes bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag la thugs
brtse ba'i slad du dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag cag rang gis rtogs pa bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshad pa de ni/ rab tu dka' ba lags so/ /de lta lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
kyi bu dag /legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la phan yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa'o/ /ngo tsha shes
pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo ni/ mthong ba'i chos 'di la chos gnyis rab tu myur bar 'byung ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ mi bya ba'i las mi byed pa dang / dam pa rnams
kyis bsngags pa'o/ /yang gnyis te/ khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /yang gnyis
te| tshul khrims la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /de lta bas na/ legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang / 'di lta ste/ sgrub par
sbyor ba'i tshig gang rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags rnams las myur du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub
@#/ /thob par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par sbyor ba'i tshig rnams bshad do/ /de la re zhig dang por dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ bla mas gsang
sngags sgrub par gnang ba/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dad pa can/ ser sna med pa/ snying rje can/ dul ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa/ sdom
ba gzung ba/ rang gi bslab pa la gnas pa/ /thabs la mkhas shing rab tu brtan/ /dus dang dus ma yin pa'ang shes/ /'jigs pa med cing mkhas la gtong / /bzod dang ldan
zhing byams pa'i yid/ /gsang sngags spyod la rab tu brtson/ /gsang sngags de nyid don la mkhas/ /bsam gtan byed la dga' ba yi/ /sgrub pa po ni sgrub la shis/ /gsang ba
pa'i bdag po/ de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod do/ /des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad myos pas brgyal bar byed
cing me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba rnams kyang ston la/ yongs su spyad pa dang nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyang mngon par sprul nas
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod do/ /'di lta ste/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de/ des
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi dgos pa byed cing / nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa thams cad kyang mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs
kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang sbyin la/ bdag nyid kyang kun tu spyod do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig 'phrul mkhan ni/ gsang sngags rnams kyis kun dga'i ra ba dang / mtsho dang / 'bab chu dang / mi
la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha ma yin rnams ni/ gsang sngags kyis sgyu ma rnams ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gsang sngags dag gis ni/
dug dang rims la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ ma mo zhes bya ba'i lha mo rnams ni/ gsang sngags kyis sems can rnams la nad 'go ba gtong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gsang
sngags kyis ni/ me'i tsha ba med par byas nas grang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /dpe'i tshig 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthu la mngon par dad par bya'o/ /gsang sngags
kyi mthu de yang gsang sngags rnams las byung ba yang ma yin/ rdzas las 'jug pa yang ma yin/ sbyor ba pos las dmigs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu dag /'on kyang gsang
sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos nyid 'byung ba las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te/ dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las
@#/ /mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ chos nyid kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi
'chad par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi gzhi byin gyis rlob pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de
nas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ji snyed yod pa de dag rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs/ yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mos pa las byung ba/ gnas skabs gzhi dbyangs gcig las byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byas te nam mkha' dang
mnyam par gyur nas byung ba/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a A aM aH/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po de dag byung ma thag tu de
nas yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nges par sgrog pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po tshig gis mtshan pa rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra
gcig nas gcig tu mngon par grag go /byang chub sems dpas de thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig phye ste/ kun mkhyen snyun dang bral ba la/ /tshig snyan 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
e ma'o gsang sngags spyad pa las/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis/ /gang gis 'di kun khyab pa yi/ /ye shes yangs pa chen po 'byung / /de bas rnam pa thams cad du//
sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i snying po la/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po 'di rnams kyi sgrub pa
'byung ste/ skyed mos tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang mam/ phug gam/ yid gang du dben pa der byang chub kyi sems sgom zhing mtshan mam byung gi bar de srid du 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas
snying po de dag las gang yang rung ba gcig bzung ste the tshom med par gyur gyi bar du gzhi bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar bzhag nas yid bsgrub par bya ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/
dri ma med pa/ brtan pa/ rab tu mi g.yo ba/ rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu/ rab tu phra ba la mngon du blta zhing rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus rang gi lha'i lus su mthong gi bar
du bya 'o/ /gzhi gnyis pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me long gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi nang na pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhugs pa/ phug na bzhugs pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
@#/ /snyoms par zhugs pa/ thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan can/ 'od zer mtha' yas pas bskor ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ nam mkha'
bzhin gzod ma nas zhi ba ste/ de la sgra gnas par bsam zhing / mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig tu bya bar bshad//
de nas zla ba gnyis pa la/ /me tog dri la sogs pa dbul/ /sems can rnams la rnam mang po'i/ /phan pa nye bar sgrub byed cing / /rnyed dang ma rnyed rnam spangs te/ /zla ba gzhan
la bzlas brjod bya/ /de la de ru sbyor ba 'di/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsam par bya/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /thams
cad nad kyang med par shog /yang na de bzhin gshegs bsngags pa'i/ /'dod pa phun sum tshogs gyur cig /yang na sems can thams cad kyang / /re ba thams cad yongs
rdzogs pa/ /sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /ma thogs par ni grub par shog /dung 'gro gcig la gcig za ba'i/ /sdug bsngal nam yang 'byung ma gyur/ /yi dwags rnams
la zas skom sogs/ /thogs pa med par 'byung bar shog /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gang / /mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis
ni| |de dag myur du zhi bar gyur/ /sems can sdug bsngal thams cad la/ /snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni/ /bsgrub pa de dang gzhan dag kyang / /des ni yang dang yang du bsam/ /ji ltar bsam
pa 'grub bya'i phyir/ /byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis/ /de dag thams cad byin brlab cing / /yid la sngags kyang bzlas brjod bya/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis su/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /don rnams gang dag bsam pa kun/ /sems can khams ni ma lus 'dir/ /
de dag thams cad ci rigs par/ /thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nam mkha'i mdzod
'byung ba gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ut+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ 'dir lan gsum bzlas na/ ji ltar bsam pa'i don thams
cad thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe/ /mi de sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas/ /chu mdo 'am yang na dur khrod dam/ /lam gyi
gzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung / /ma mo'i gnas sam zhig gnas su/ /bgegs rnams thams cad myos 'gyur ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor nges pas mnyan par gyis/ /kun tu gru
@#/ /bzhi lham pa ste/ /sgo gcig pa la mu ran can/ /thams cad kha dog ser bo la/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bris nas/ /rdo rje sbrel ba'i tshul gyis su//
rdo rjes phan tshun 'brel bar bya/ /sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri ba/ /gdul dka' dang ni mngon phyogs gnyis/ /mig dmar khro dang bcas pa la/ /khros shing sdigs par byed ba bri/ /
mdung rtse gsum pa gra rnams su/ /nan tan du ni bri bar bya/ /dbus su rdo rje'i gdan yid 'ong / /kha ni kun tu blta ba bri/ /de'i steng pad+ma chen po ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa za bar bcas//
rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ /smon lam nye bar sgrub byed cing / /phyag na rdo rje blo can gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /de nas bsrungs byas der 'dug ste/ /sbyang ba'i rdzas ni
blangs nas su/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /mtshan gcig thal byung bzlas brjod bya/ /der ni nam gyi phyed dus sam/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ /rdzas de yongs su 'gyur ba
ni| |'bar phreng can gyis gzi brjid bzhin/ /sngags pa rang gis de blangs na/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che/ /rgyal sras de ni
'dod na 'chi/ /'jig rten khams ni gzhan du 'ang 'gro/ /gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba/ /rdzas las byung ba'i sngags bsgrubs pas/ /dpal ldan mchod par rab tu
byed| |'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub yin par bshad/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la brtag pa 'di rgyu mtshan du mdzad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par thugs su chud pa rnams kyis rtag pa de nyid
rang bzhin gyis stong par mkhyen kyang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'dus ma byas pa gdags par brtags te/ yongs su bsgyur ba'i tshul du mthong ba'i chos la bde
bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs po che sems can rnams la nges par ston to/ /des de rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing tshe ring po yang rab tu thob nas
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gi rtse dga' yongs su spyod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di 'grub
par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga thugs dgyes bzhin du 'chad
do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bskal pa du mar rtsol zhing 'bad de bya dka' ba rnams brtsams kyang thob bar mi 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
@#/ /chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe 'di gcig kho na la thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang
sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod bas de bzhin du rgyal mtshan nam/ ral gri 'am/ gdugs sam/ mchil lham mam/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ lig
bu mig gam/ gi wang blangs te bzlas brjod sum 'bum byas la de ltar bsgrubs na/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo thabs dang ldan pas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams bsgrubs na/ de dag rang gi sems kyi dbang tsam kho nas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
gang dag rgyu las 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu
ni byed par ma gsungs te/ 'bras bu 'ang de la yod ma yin/ /rgyu ni rgyu yis stong pas na/ /de ni ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur/ /de bas gsang sngags 'bras bu ni/ /rgyu dang las bral
shes par bya/ /gang tshe mtshan ma med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin ji lta bzhin reg pa/ /de tshe sngags pas dngos grub ni/ /yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dngos grub tu sgrub pa'i tshig gang gis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
mo rnams mthong ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dga' zhing bde ba la reg par gnas la chos kyi dbyings las kyang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings lags te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa rtogs par
khong du chud par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ legs so legs so/ /gsang ba pa'i
bdag po/ gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa da ni yang legs so/ /de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad
do| |bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
@#/ /to| |gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la a zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa byung ste/ gtsug lag khang dam/ phug gam/ gnas gang yang rung ste/ yan lag thams cad
a zhes bya ba bzhag la bzlas brjod sum 'bum bya 'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'am/
'jam dpal lam/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba zhig 'ong ste mgo la nyug gam/ legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul
na/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems yang ba dang / lus yang bar goms par bya zhing bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i lus rnam par
dag pa dang / sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a zhes bya ba rnam par bzhag ste bzlas brjod byas na/ rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'on te srog gzung bar 'dod na/
a zhes bya ba srog dang lhan cig tu byas la dus gsum du bsam pa byas na/ yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi steng du klad kor bzhag na/ gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i
dug thams cad 'byin to/ /de nas gzi can dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ a zhes bya ba bdag tu byas/ /pa las de bzhin mi dbang po/ /gcig la pad+ma gzhag par bya/ /gzhan la
yang ni dung bzhag ste/ /gcig la gcig ni gdong bltas na/ /de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus
pa la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs las byung ba zhes bya ba las dang bya bas rnam par rol
pa| spyod pa'i rol mo rim par phye ba rgyas pa/ khams bzhi yang dag par bsdu bar bsdus pa/ sems kyi rgyal po la gnas pa/ nam mkha' ltar kun tu khyab pa/ mthong ba dang ma
mthong ba'i 'bras bu mang ba/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon sum pa/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar byed pa/ las sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa yod kyi/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs
shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /lag na rdo rje/ de la spyod pa'i rol mo las dang bya ba mngon par 'grub pa'i 'bras bu phal che ba lus can kun gyi mngon sum pa gang zhe na/ cho ga shes
pas thog mar ni/ /bdag gi de nyid rim bzhin bya/ /sngags pa snga ma bzhin 'dug la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas te/ /bdag nyid a zhes bya ba ni/ /klad kor bcas dang rgyas byas
@#/ /pa| |thams cad shin tu ser zhing bzang / /gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan byas te/ /sngags pas der gnas rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bsam/ /'di
ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bdag gi de nyid yin par gsungs/ /nam zhig sngags pas bdag gis ni/ /de nyid dogs pa med 'gyur ba/ /de tshe 'jig rten thams cad la/ /
phan pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar sna tshogs ngag dang ldan/ /mig 'phrul can gyi gnas la 'dug /sngags pa nam zhig mnyam bzhag na/ /srid pa rab tu dogs pa na//
thog med dus nas mi shes pas/ /bsags ba'i las de kun zad 'gyur/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /sems de nam zhig sgom byed pa/ /de'i tshe'ang sngags pa rnal
'byor pa/ /chu yis pad+ma lta bur ni/ /dge dang mi dge 'bras 'byung ba'i/ /las kyi rtog pas mi gos na/ /'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu/ /bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos//
bam po bzhi pa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bdud bzhi las rgyal ba rdo rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig
bdud bzhi las rgyal bar byed pa/ rgyud drug las rnam par grol bar byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di rnams gsungs so/ /na maHsa
man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ A bI ra hUM khaM/ de nas yang dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang / thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig mi 'dzum par thams cad mkhyen pa la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/ /byang
chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig /'dis ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang nyan
thos pa| |mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'dir/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa/ /dpe med ye shes thob nas su/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pas/ /sa steng kun tu rnam par
spyod| |de bas 'di dag so so yi/ /cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las/ /sna tshogs dgod pa thams cad kyang / /bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol/ /des ni gsang sngags spyod pa yi/ /theg
chen bla na med pa la/ /sems can rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /mthong ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/ /de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis/ /'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal
pa| |khyed rnams mthun par rtse gcig tu/ /mnyam par zhog la 'di nyon cig /de'i chos gzhi rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs te nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po can nye bar bstan par
@#/ /bzhed nas gsungs pa/ a ni mchog tu shes bya ba/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa ste/ /phyi rol dang ni nang du yang / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya/ /der
'dug nas ni thams cad bsam/ /rnal 'byor gnas shes bshad pa yin/ /a ni srog gi dam pa ste/ /'gugs par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /nam zhig klad kor gyis mnan na//
lus can kun gyi sel bar 'gyur/ /sngags pas nam zhig zla gcig tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rgya bcings nas/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /mi shes grong khyer 'joms par
'gyur| |lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang / /mi phyed shin tu brtan par 'gyur/ /bdag gi rnyed pa grub bya'i phyir/ /rgyas pa'i las ni gang cung zad/ /de kun rtag tu sngags pa yis/ /
dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su bya/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /thor tshugs dbu brgyan 'chang ba yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bzhugs/ /dbang chen gyi ni gzhi
zhes bya| |rdo rje pad+ma ral gri dang / /de bzhin dang par bshad pa dang / /gser dag dang ni sa dag dang / /yang na yid bzhin nor bu'ang rung / /de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dbang chen
du ni bsgoms te bsgrub/ /mnan pa dag kyang bshad par bya'i/ /'di ni khyed kyis mnyam bzhag nyon/ /sngags pas mdor na ri rab ni/ /rtse mo brgyad pa bsam par bya/ /de yi steng du
pad+ma gzhag /de yi rjes la rdo rje'o/ /de'i steng rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /yi ge dam pa gtso bo ste/ /de yis spyi bor mnan na ni/ /de ni mi g.yo gnas par 'gyur/ /sman la yang ni lan brgya ru/ /bzlas
brjod byas te mis 'thungs na/ /sngon gyi las las byung ba yi/ /de yi nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang des pa yis/ /ba zhes bya ba dam pa nyon/ /gangs dang 'o ma dung 'dra
ba| |lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste/ /pad+ma dkar por 'dab ma ni/ /de yi dbus na rab tu gnas/ /mgon po dam pa rab tu zhi/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /de yi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar
can| |rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /kun tu dkar por bsam par bya/ /khyud khor rim pa dgus kyang bskor/ /gdung pa thams cad zhi byed pa/ /smug zil 'dus pa'i nang
na gnas/ /'o ma mu tig phreng dkar dang / /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /chu rgyun rnams kyis 'khor yug tu/ /kun nas rab tu 'bar ba bzhin/ /sngags pas yid la bsams na ni//
gdung ba kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dngos 'di rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya/ /mar gsar 'o ma mu tig phreng / /de bzhin khyu mchog shel
kyang rung / /'o ma 'am yang na chu yang rung / /de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dngos grub sna tshogs grub phyir bsgrub/ /tshe ni ring bar 'gyur ba dang / /gzugs ni ngo mtshar cher 'gyur
@#/ /dang / /nad rnams kun las thar pa dang / /skal ba bzang po mchog 'gyur dang / /yid rno 'dzin par nus pa dang / /shes rab shin tu dri med dang / /sgrub pa'i
rdzas ni 'di rnams kyis/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa 'dis/ /zhi bar byed par bshad pa yin/ /klad kyi 'khor dang bcas byas na/ /
sel bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog /'od can rnams kyi 'od ces bya/ /des ni las rnams gang cung zad/ /mtshams med lnga las byung ba yang / /
rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam bzhag nas/ /bsams na de kun zad par 'gyur/ /yid 'ong thams cad rab tu dmar/ /gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas/ /zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng
bas 'khrigs/ /sum mdo'i ris mtshan snying gar gzhag /rnal 'byor pa ni der 'dug nas/ /ra ni klad kor bcas par bsam/ /mi 'jigs pas ni ci rigs par/ /dngos
po 'di dag des bsgrub bo/ /nyi ma dang ni gza' kun dang / /de bzhin bsgrims te me dang ni/ /dbang du bya ba'i rdzas rnams dang / /yang na 'khon par 'gyur ba dang / /bskam pa dang
ni gsad pa dang / /de bzhin dgar dang gnod pa dag /me dang lhan cig 'di sbyar na/ /de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /rlung ni thams cad yang dag
'byung / /rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang / /gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba/ /'di ni klad kor bcas sbyar na/ /de dag thams cad 'jig par byed/ /de yi gzugs kyang bshad pa ni/ /kha
dog nag la 'od po che/ /mi bzad 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /kun tu yang ni rnam par 'phro/ /mkhas pas smin ma'i mtshams su ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni gnas par bsam/ /de
ni mthing ga zla gam 'dra/ /rtog dang bcas par ba dan g.yo/ /yi ge rab tu mi 'gyur ba/ /sngags pas der gnas bsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /gang gis mthong
ba kho na la/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i/ /dngos grub rnams ni de tshe bsgrub/ /mkha' la 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ /yang na rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / /lha yi mig dang rna ba dang / /
sngags pas de bzhin 'thob pa dang / /mi snang ba la sogs kun dang / /dbye ba dag kyang gang gsungs pa/ /sngags par mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gnas na de kun
byed| |'di ni snying po byang chub 'dir/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /rgyu kun dmigs su med sgo nas/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /rgyu med pas na 'bras
bu'ang med/ /las kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /dngos po de gsum med pas na/ /stong pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu chen gyis/ /de'i gzugs yang dag
@#/ /bshad pa ni/ /klad kor bcas par ldan pa ste/ /khams ni stong pa'i mchog ces bya/ /ral gri phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /bsgrub par bya ba nges par bsgrub/ /
ral gri zhags pa 'khor lo dang / /lcags mda' de bzhin tho ba ste/ /rdzas de rnams dang ldan na ni/ /go 'phang dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ nam byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub
sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas bdag nyid a zhes bya ba'i rang gi ngo bor bsgyur nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gyur cing / bong ba dang /
rngo ba dang / gser du mtshungs pa la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i las rnam par spangs pa/ de tshe de ni dag 'gyur ba/ /thub pa
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/ /des na las rnams thams cad nus/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de nas gzhan sngags rnal 'byor la/ /gzhol zhing cho ga shes
pa yis| |sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /ba zhes bya ba'i las bya'o/ /snying rje las byung sems kyis ni/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal la dmigs nas/ /mgon po
de yis bdag nyid kyi/ /lus ni thams cad nyid du yang / /gangs dang ba yi 'o ma ltar/ /dkar ba'i rgyun gyis yongs su dgang / /de tshe nges pa bskyed nas su/ /yan lag rnams ni thams
cad kyi| |ba spu'i bu ga kun nas kyang / shin tu dri med chu rgyun 'byung / /chu yis sa ni ma lus pa/ /'di dag yongs su dgang bar bya/ /gang gis chu de 'thungs pa yang / /lag pas kyang
ni reg kyang rung / /de kun nges par byang chub tu/ /'gyur te 'di la dogs pa med/ /yan lag kun tu ra zhes pa/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba zhi bas 'khrigs/ /kun tu rnam par 'phro ba ni/ /
shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsam/ /de tshe rnal 'byor pa yis phyir/ /'bar ba kun tu snang byed pa/ /btang na ra yis rnam sprul pas/ /sngags pa 'dod pa bzhin du byed/ /ra
zhes bya ba ro stod du/ /ba zhes bya ba lte ba khung / /'bar ba dang ni chu 'bab pa/ /de tshe gcig car ston par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba grang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /ras ni shin tu zhi bar byed//
sngags pa sngags kyi tshul gnas pas/ /bas kyang tsha la sogs pa bzhi/ /ha zhes bya ba ba dan bcas/ /ra zhes bya ba'i 'og tu gzhag /sdig dang ldan pa'i mi rnams kyang / /de yis las
rnams myur du sgrub/ /sngags pa dbang chen la 'dug nas/ /chu yi las ni brtsams par bya/ /sel ba la sogs thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rlung ni kun tu 'gro
@#/ /bar gsungs/ /thams cad 'jig par byed pa'ang de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /las rnams dbye ba las byung ba/ /gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus
su ni| |cho ga 'di yis rab tu bya/ /yid yongs su sbyong zhing bzlas brjod byas na/ yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lus yang bar goms par byed cing 'chag bzhin du
bzlas brjod byed na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsog pur 'dug la a zhes bya ba rna bar bzhag ste zla ba gcig tu bzlas na/ lha'i rna ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang
ba pa'i bdag po/ dngos grub kyi go 'phang de lta bu la sogs pa dag ni/ yid las byung ba yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnam par bsam pa tsam kho nas dngos po gzugs
can ma yin pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs rnams las thams cad pa'i sa bon gyi bya ba tshig tu brjod pa tsam las 'byung ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
po| gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mthun pa/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par mgu
bar mdzad pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' las thams cad dang / gsang sngags spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi mdun na gzugs brnyan lta bur bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/
rnam par mi rtog cing yid kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ dus dang / yul dang / bya ba dang / las dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa rnams spangs kyang / gsang sngags spyod
pa las byung ba'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang stsol/ /de bas kun mkhyen dngos grub dang / /go 'phang mchog kyang bsgrub par bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /ngo mtshar gyur nas
mig bgrad de/ /de tshe rdo rje 'od zer ni/ /me stag 'phro ba 'dra gsor zhing / /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'di thams cad/ /kun tu snang bar byas nas su/ /chos kun dbang phyug thub pa la/ /tshig
snyan 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngags kyi 'jug pa bshad lags na/ /'jug pa de yang ma rtogs na/ /gsang sngags gang nas 'ong ba dang / /gang du 'gro ba gtso khyod kyis/ /de kun
bdag la bshad du gsol/ /go 'phang dam pa khyod las med/ /khyod ni ji ltar chu rnams kyang / /rgya mtsho bzhin du chos kun gnas/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gnas ni yid ces bshad pa yin/ /snying ni gsang sngags gnas
yin par/ /shes na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /dkar po ser po dmar po gang / /yid kyis sems par byed pa ste/ /de la yongs su gcod pa gang / /de ni sems kyis byed pa yin/ /
@#/ /sems ni mgu nas nges gyur pa/ /de ni snying zhes bshad pa yin/ /der gnas pa yi gsang sngags rnams/ /'bras bu rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/ /de ru pad+ma bsam
pa ni| |'dab ma brgyad par ze bar bcas/ /a zhes bya ba 'bar phreng 'khrigs/ /bzang po de ru gnas pa ni/ /zhi ba kun tu rnam par g.yo/ /gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba/ /
glog stong dag ni 'khyug pa bzhin/ /snang ba kun tu ston pa ni/ /me long phug na gnas pa bzhin/ /chu yi zla ba'i rnam pa bzhin/ /thams cad na yang mdun na gnas/ /sngags pa gsang
sngags gnas 'dug pas/ /yid ni de ltar shes nas su/ /de nas sngags pas stong du yang / /klad pa'i rgyas kyi dbus su ni/ /klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan ma can/ /aM zhes bya ba der
bsams te/ /shel dang zla ba gangs 'dra ba/ /dri med dag pa mthong ba ni/ /zhi ba chos kyi rang bzhin sku/ /thams cad kyi ni gzhi zhes bya/ /de las gsang sngags dngos grub ni/ /sna
tshogs gzugs can thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas mthong na/ /mtho ris dang ni byang grol thog /ra zhes bya ba mar me bzhin/ /'bar ba mig tu bzhag nas
su| |mgrin pa cung zad dgu bor byas/ /lce yang rkan la sbyar nas ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su rnam blta zhing / /mnyam par bzhag ste yid la blta/ /dri med shin tu rnam dag pa/ /rtag
tu me long bzhin du gnas/ /de nyid yid kyi yang dag par/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /yid kyis snang byas lam la ni/ /rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur/ /de nas sngags
pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong sngags pas dngos grub ni/ /rab tu rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gong du bsgyur nas su/ /yi ge yongs su
bsam pa ni/ /la zhes bya ba klad kor bcas/ /mig gi gnas su bsam par bya/ /'di kun stong par mthong na ni/ /go 'phang mi nyams thob par 'gyur/ /ye shes rlabs po che 'am ni/ /
yang na mngon shes lnga po dang / /rig sngags 'chang 'gyur dngos grub dang / /tshe ring gzhon nur 'gyur ba gang / /gal te thob par 'dod na ni/ /ji srid 'di ni ma bsnyen par/ /de srid thob par
mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags ye shes las byung ba/ /'di ni de nyid ye shes mchog /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' dang / /nyan thos nges pa dag dang ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes dpe med thob nas su/ /de yi sa steng thams cad du/ /gnas shing de ni gtam yang zer/ /rnam
par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan
@#/ /'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha'i gzugs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lha'i gzugs la dmigs nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgyur nas the tshom ma mchis par dngos grub thob
par 'gyur ba'i lha'i gzugs byin gyis rlob pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang khyod nga la don 'di yongs su 'dri ba ni/ legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs
shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la lha'i gzugs ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ yi ge dang / phyag rgya dang / gzugs so/ /de la yi ge yang rnam pa
gnyis te/ sgra dang / byang chub kyi sems so/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ gzugs dang bcas pa dang / gzugs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i
bdag po/ lha'i gzugs kyang rnam pa gnyis te/ yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la yongs su dag pa ni/ rtog pa'i ngo bo ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /yongs
su ma dag pa ni/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs te/ kha dog dang / dbyibs so/ /de la lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis kyis dgos pa rnam pa gnyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma
dang bcas pas ni/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pas ni/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyi/ /
dngos grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed/ /mtshan ma med la gnas pas ni/ /mtshan ma can yang sgrub tu rung / /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan ma med pa bsten par bya/ /rnam par snang
mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ lha'i ting nge 'dzin gtan la dbab pa rim par phye ba'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa sbyod pa mtshan ma
med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsam par bya'o/ /mtshan ma rnams gang nas byung / ci bdag gi lus sam/ bdag gi sems sam/ bdag gi yid las byung / de la
@#/ /lus ni| las las skyes pa ste/ rtswa dang shing dang bong ba lta bu ngo bo nyid kyis bya ba med pa/ blun pa'am/ phyi rol gyi rnam pa lta bu la bzos byas pa'i gzugs
