lta bur brtag par bya'o/ /'di ltar bzos byas pa'i gzugs de la mi zhig gis khros te me'am/ dug gam/ mtshon tam/ chu'am/ rdo rjes bshig gam/ bsregs sam/
bcad kyang mi dga' ba cung zad kyang med la/ bza' ba'am/ btung ba'am/ bkru ba'am/ byug pa'i spos sam/ phreng ba'am/ gos sam/ tsan+dan nam/ ga pur la sogs pa lha
dang mi'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod kyang mi de la dga' bar 'gyur ba yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i gzugs de la rang gi nga rgyal kun
nas bslang pa'i phyin ci log gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'am/ gnod par byed pa'i ming gang yin pa de ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can yin no/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang sems ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa/
mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bsam par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sems la ni/ dus gsum med do/ /dus gsum dang bral ba gang yin pa de
ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma dang bral ba'o snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yid mtshan ma dang bcas par rtog ste/ 'di ni/ yang
dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma skyes pa'o/ /zhes bya bar ni rab tu mi shes so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems
dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de ltar bsams na/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ nam mtshan
ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsang sngags rnams mngon du phyogs shing gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang
mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'o// //gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
gzhan yang bzlas brjod gsang ba bshad par bya'o/ /gcig pus gcig gam gcig gis gcig /yid kyis bzlas brjod bya ba'am/ /yang na shu ba bu rnam gnyis pa'o/ /rnal 'byor
mchog gis brtag par bya/ /sngags pa yan lag nyams sbyar bar/ /bzlas brjod gzhan du mi bya 'o/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag bzhi pa ngas bshad pa/ /de yang 'jig rten
@#/ /pa yi ste/ /dmigs pa can ni bla med pa/ /slar sdud pa yi tshig gis non/ /lha yi rjes su song ba'i yid/ /bshubs te bzlas brjod byed pa'i mchog /
dmigs pa can la bstan pa yin/ /yid kyi 'jig rten 'das shes bya/ /slar sdud la sogs rnam par spangs/ /lha dang gcig tu byed pa dang / /tha dad ma yin 'dzin pa yis/ /yid
kyis rang bzhin dbyer med bya/ /gzhan du bya ba ma yin no/ /gsang sngags grangs ni sum 'bum du/ /phal cher ngas ni bshad pa dag /lus can sdig dang bral ba yi/ /sngags pa rnam
par dag pa la/ /bzlas brjod grangs 'di bstan pa ste/ /gzhan du bya ba ma yin no/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
pa las/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs te bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yan lag thams cad nas dus gsum du ma chags pa'i stobs can zhes

bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo byung ngo / /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na sa me/ a pra ti sa me/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA na ga ga te ga ga na pa ra la k+Sha Na swAhA/ rigs kyi bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul can te/ 'di yis byin rlabs sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /gang du sdug bsngal
'gag 'gyur ba'i/ /chos nyid chags med 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dgongs nas bdag
nyid dang / phyag na rdo rje gnyis ka gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te phyag na rdo rje la sags pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /byang chub
sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor nye bar gnas pa yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
'khor spyad pa rim par phye ba rgyas pa nyon cig /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje pad+ma'i stan de las rdo rje 'bab pa'i tshul
gyis babs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ phyag 'tshal byang chub sems khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal byang chub 'byung khyod la/ /spyod gzugs khyod dang sa dang ni/ /pha rol
@#/ /phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal thog mar byed khyod la/ /stong pa nyid la 'dud phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
de skad ces mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rje bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang dag dang ldan na/ bdag
cag rnams sems can gyi don bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gsang sngags spyad pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga ni 'jig rten dang po yi/ /'jig rten mgon zhes
bsgrags pa yin/ /bla med gzod nas zhi ba ni/ /mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas byin gyis rlabs gang gis
byin gyis brlabs na/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa/ nam mkha' bzhin du spros
pa med pa spyod pa la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyi yan lag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bsam pa dang / bsam
gtan du bya ba dang / dngos grub sgrub par mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa/ srog dang 'dra ba/ yi ge thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa/ skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du
gyur pa 'di phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor nye bar gnas pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni/ a zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go/ /gsang
ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par
'dod pa/ byang chub kyi sems mngon du bya bar 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi don bya bar 'dod pa/ dngos grub mngon par 'dod
pa| rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po 'di la brtson par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
@#/ /snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang / lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul
pa dang / gsang sngags spyad pa dang / bsam par bya ba gsungs pa/ de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la gnas te srad bu blangs la sangs
rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas srad bu shar phyogs logs su bres te g.yas su bskor la/ byang phyogs su kha bltas nas srad bu bres te nub phyogs su kha bltas la bsgyur
te thig gdab bo/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya'am/ yi ge ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te nang du zhugs la snying po'i dkyil 'khor
bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la yang 'di ltar bdag nyid gzod ma nas zhi ba/ gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snying
po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing srad bu bres la phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de las sum gnyis lha'i gnas su
bzhag ste sum cha 'khor sar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du rnam par phye la lha'i gnas bshams par bya'o/ /de nas yang bdag nyid bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te thog mar tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la 'di ltar byin gyis
brlab par bya'o/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyong ba/ /'dir ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de ltar blo
can gyis bsams nas/ /der ni ra zhes bya ba yang / /zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng can mdog /dung zla kun da 'dra ba bsam/ /de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni/ /dmar po blangs nas nan tan du/ /
yi ge a zhes bya ba ni/ /'bar ba klad kor bcas par bsam/ /rgyal ba thub dka' dam pa ste/ /nyi ma dang po 'char ba bzhin/ /de nas sngags pas tshon gsum pa/ /kha dog ser po
blang bar bya/ /mkhas pas de nas ka zhes pa/ /de tshe cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /de bzhin gser 'od thub pa ni/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom
pa| |kun tu rnam par snang ba yin/ /de nas margad 'dra ba yi/ /tshon rtsi 'khor ba las sgrol ba/ /ba zhes bya ba de ru gzhag /byang chub snying po'i thub chen de/ /dpa' bo kha dog ljang
'dra ba/ /kun tu 'jigs pa med par byed/ /de nas tshon rtsi nag po de/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su/ /der ni ha zhes bya ba bsam/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /dus
@#/ /mtha'i me ltar mi bzad pa/ /lag na rdo rje rtse phran brgyan/ /bdud sde sdang ba thams cad la/ /rnam pa kun tu sdigs par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad de'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas mtha' yas par rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms
par zhugs ma thag tu thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba 'di byung ngo / /
na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yeH/ sar+b+ba mu She b+h+yaH/ a sa me pa ra me/ a tsa le/ ga ga ne/ smar Ne/ sar+b+ba trA nu ga te swAhA/ de nas tshon gyi cho ga byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan
'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags sam phyag byas te rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas langs te dkyil 'khor bskor la nang du
zhugs nas byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis sgrub pa po la dmigs te/ bdag nyid ba zhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje
dam pa sbyin pa dang lhan cig tu snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba 'di'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa ni/ 'di yin te/ dbus su bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa/ dbu thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan can/ dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/
gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa/ phyag rgya'am/ gzugs sam/ yi ge'i 'brur bri'o/ /a/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku'i ngo bo
a zhes bya ba klad kor dang bcas pa'o/ /aM/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das ma nam mkha'i spyan bri'o/ /yang na yi ge ga zhes bya ba
bri'o| |ga /me'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'am yi ge ka zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ka/ byang phyogs su lag na pad+ma 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag dang lhan cig tu pad+ma'i phyag rgya'am yi ge sa zhes bya ba bri'o/ /sa/ lho phyogs su cha gsum bor te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas
pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge ba zhes bya ba bri'o/ /de'i cha gsum bor ba la rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni/ hUM/ de nas bden bral gyi phyogs
su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og logs su mi g.yo ba pha bong gi steng na 'dug pa/ lag na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa/ bgegs
@#/ /thams cad sdigs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de'i yi ge'i 'bru ni/ haM/ rlung gi phyogs su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba
bgegs chen po 'joms pa/ gyen du 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i dus kyi me'i gzugs 'dra ba/ 'jigs pa yang 'jigs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i
'od 'phro ba can thogs ba de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni/ 'di 'o/ /ha/ de nas phyogs bzhir srung ba chen po bzhi dgod do/ /de la shar phyogs su mi 'jigs
pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ gos dkar po gyon pa/ yid tsam khro ba'i gdong / lag na dbyug pa thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi
ge'i 'bru ni/ 'di'o/ /tsa/ byang phyogs su 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba kha dog dkar mo/ lag na ral gri thogs shing gos dkar po gyon pa
'bar ba dang bcas pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni/ 'di 'o/ /pa/ nub phyogs su gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i
srung ba a sho ka dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba/ gos dmar po gyon pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o//
de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ /sa/ lho phyogs su ma thul ba rdo rjes 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo kha dog nag mo/ bzhin khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ smad g.yogs nag mo gyon pa/ thor tshugs
dang cod pan can/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi 'bar bas mngon par snang bar byed ba/ lag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ bgegs chen po med par byed pa de'i
phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la de'i yi ge'i 'bru ni/ 'di'o/ /k+Sha/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas pa phyag brnyan dang bcas par pad+ma dkar po la 'dug par bri'o/ /de ltar
blo can gyi bkod nas/ /sngags pa sngags la gzhol ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du phyir byung nas/ /gnyis pa'i cha ni nges pa la/ /shAkya'i rigs ni dga' byed pa/ /thub pa'i rgyal po bri
bar bya| |mgon po na bza' ngur smrig mnabs/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /bstan pa yi ni don mdzad lha/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags pas phyag
rgya dgod pa ni/ lhung bzed chos gos la sogs pa'am/ /yang na mkhas pas yi ger gzhag /de'i cho ga dam pa 'di'o/ /b+ha/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos
kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlabs la/ byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa'i yid kyis cha gsum por te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par
@#/ /byas nas tshon de nyid blangs te shar phyogs kyi cha gsum par rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal mthing ga'i steng
na rdo rje can thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi smad g.yogs gyon pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog gur gum lta bu/ spyi bo zur phud lnga pa de'i
phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de'i sngags ni/ 'di'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ maM/ de'i g.yas phyogs su dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
dang ldan pa/ lag na rin po che'i dra ba'am lcags kyu thogs pa phyag rgya'am yi ge'i 'brur bri'o/ /de la yi ge'i 'bru ni/ 'di'o/ /tsha/ de nas lho phyogs su byang chub sems dpa'
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ thor tshugs dang cod pan can/ lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /re la
yi ge ni/ 'di'o/ /A/ byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po zhes bya ba kha dog ljang gu /lag na pad+ma thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi
ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge ni/ 'di'o/ /i/ nub phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gos dkar po gyon pa/ 'bar
ba dang bcas pa/ lag na ral gri thogs pa de'i phyag rgya'am yi ger bri'o/ /de la yi ge ni/ 'di'o/ /I/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yi/ /sngags ba de nas 'dug nas su/ /chos
kyi dbyings su rang bzhin gyi/ /byang chub sems su gyur pa'i yid/ /shar phyogs kha bltas gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyi rgya bcings nas/ /de nas las kyi rdo rjer gyur/ /nan tan du ni mchod
pa bya| |kun tu khyab pa'i yid kyis su/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig ces bya'i rgya bstan nas/ /gsang sngags lan gsum bzla bar bya/ /slob ma gtsang ma chog
bzhin| |bos te dkyil 'khor mdun du ni/ /de dag gsum la skyabs su gtang / /de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /phyag rgya de dag kun la bcing
de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bcing / /yid kyis de yi gzugs bsgyur te/ /ras kyis gdong ba bkab nas ni/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su/ /byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /
lag ba stong bar mi bya 'o/ /dam tshig gi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /de dag kun gyi rna bar bsgrag /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig ni/ /de nas de la bdag gis bcing / /byang chub
sems gyur yid kyis su/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /me tog gang du bab gyur pa/ /de ni sngags pas de la sbyin/ /lus can kun la dam tshig phyir/ /cho ga de ltar rab tu bya/ /
@#/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo de la yang zhus pa/ /mgon po smra ba'i mchog gyur pas/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga gsungs/ /de skad gsol nas
bcom ldan 'das/ /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs/ /chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i phyir/ /cho ga'i mchog ni ngas bshad kyi/ /yid gcig
bsdus te cho ga nyon/ /gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de la slob dpon gyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su de'i sngags sam phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas slob
ma rnams bos la chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhag ste yan lag kun 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcings la byang chub sems dpa' chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs
pa| rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /a ni klad kor bcas pa ru/ /mkhas pas spyi bor bzhag nas ni/ /a zhes bya ba snying gar gzhag/
ra zhes bya ba brang du gzhag /yang na a ni kun tu gzhag /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan can/ /pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rgyal
pa'i mchog gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /yi ge'i 'khor lo rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan du gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rim par phye ba rgyas pa gang gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe 'gro ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mtshan mas btab pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams 'byol bar 'gyur zhing de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag nyan par 'gyur pa yod
kyi| de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de'i dus la bab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de'i tshod la bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe stobs thogs pa med pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs can/ /mi mnyam pa dang
@#/ /mnyam pa'i stobs can/ dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa stobs gsum dang ldan pa byung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sa mai tri sa me/ sa ma ya swAhA/ gsang
ba pa'i bdag pos rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par ston par byed pa/ chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las mi 'da' bar
byed pa| sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yin te/ de'i phyag rgya ni/ 'di yin no/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ngo / /rgya
'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa kun gyi yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas/ /lag pa dag ni gnyis ka yang / /blo dang ldan pas khu
tshur bcangs/ /mthe bo gnyis ni nang du gzhug /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /chos dbyings rnam par spyod pa'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta
bud+d+hA nAn/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad ldog ste bsnol la mthe bong gnyis sprad do/ /phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'di/ /chos kyi
'khor lo zhes su bsgrags/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi/ /'khor lo rab tu 'di bskor ro/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin du
lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar la/ mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bzhag ste ral gri lta bur bya'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya chen po ral
gri'i rgya/ /'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /'jig tshogs lta ba gtsod par byed/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA NAM/ mahA khaD+ga bi ra dza d+har+m+ma san+d+ha ri sha ka sa ha dza sad ka ya

d+h+r-iSh+Ti ts+tshe da ka ta thA ga tA d+hi muk+ti nir dza ta bi rA ga d+har+m+ma nir dza ta hUM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bong dkris la dung lta bur bya'o/ /phyag
rgya dpal ldan dam pa 'di/ /chos kyi dung zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /'dis ni 'jig rten 'di dag na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba/ /rdul dang bral
ba'i chos 'chad do/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA NAM/ sar+b+ba thA oM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo kun thal mo sbyar ba las brkyangs ste dril bu ltar byas la mthe bong
gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse gcig tu sprang de mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sprad do/ /pad+ma dam pa dpal ldan 'di/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan
yin te| |der ni 'dren pa 'tshang rgya zhing / /rgyal ba sras rnams thams cad ni/ /'di las skye dang byang chub 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
@#/ /khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos gnyis su bzhag la rdo rje ltar bya/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u
chung gnyis bsgrengs te bzhag /srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du gzhag go/ /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya/ /mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di/ /
nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan/ /gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM hUM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gshibs te bsgreng / mdzub mo
gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar ro/ /gtsug tor phyag rgya rgya chen te/ /gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba
yin| |'di'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM hUM/ lag pa g.yas par khu tshur bcangs pa smin mtshams su gzhag go /rgyal ba dam pas phyag rgya 'di/ /mdzod spu zhes ni rab
tu bsgrags/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a haM dzaHblo ldan rnal 'byor tshul gnas te/ /lag gnyis
lte ba'i thad kar ni/ /lhung bzed 'dzin ba'i tshul du bya/ /lhung bzed phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags/ /rgya 'di shAkya thub pa'i ste/ /lhung bzed chen po zhes bya'o/ /'di'i sngags ni/
na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ b+ha/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgrengs la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur bya'o/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa/ /de yis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur/ /

gang gis rgya chen de bcings na/ /mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgrags so/ /'di'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba thA dzi na dzi na b+hi kA ya nA shA na swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa smad de
dam pa sbyin pa ltar bya'o/ /'di ni dam pa sbyin rgya zhes/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsgrags/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /rgyal mchog dam pa stsal bar 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang

sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ba ra da badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM swAhA/ lag pa g.yas ba khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyangs la dpral bar khro gnyer lta bur bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'di/
sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /bdud ni rnam par bsdigs zhes bya/ /phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su/ /bdud sde shin tu mi zad dang / /bgegs

dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang / /the tshom med par rab tu 'byer/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA ba la ba ti da sha ba la te dzod b+ha be ma hA mai t+r+ya b+h+yud ga te swAhA/ de bzhin
du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis brkyangs te mthe bo'i drung du gzhag go /'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyis/ /thugs rje las byung spyan yin te/ /
@#/ /mig gi steng du mkhas pas gzhag /de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na ba ra la k+Sha Na ka ru Na
mA ya ta thA ga ta tsak+ShuHswAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol ba'i khur tshur bcangs te/ mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la bkug ste sprad la
zlum por bya/ 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags/ /sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /sngags pas 'di bcings de yi tshe/ /rtag tu sdang ba bcings par 'gyur/ /'di'i gsang

sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he mahA pA sha pra sa ro d+hA R+ya satwa d+hA tu bi mo tsa ka /ta thA ga ta a d+hi muk+ti nir dza twa swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te khu tshur
bcangs la mdzub mo bsgrengs te tshigs gsum pa bkug la/ lhag ma rnams gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par bya 'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi/ /lcags kyu zhes ni 'di bshad
de| |byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa dag /sdang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang / /thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed/ /'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba thA/ a pra ti ha ta ta ta thA ga ta/ aM ku sha bod+hi ts+tsha R+ya pa ri pU ra ka swAhA/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid du sbyar ro/ /'di ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dz+nyA nod b+ha ba swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bsgrengs la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du gzhag
go |de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis kyang bsgrengs la lhag ma
rnams de bzhin du gzhag go /rked pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ti saM b+ha ba swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo
gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug /srin lag gnyis kyang de bzhin du bya/ /mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad bkug /gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ngo / /'di ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ raM raM raM swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis phyung la bsgrengs te gzhag go /mtshams
chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ be lu pu ri/ bi ku ri bi ku le swAhA/ mtshams chen po gcad pa'o/ /de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug

la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ngo / /srung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga te b+h+yo sar+b+ba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yo bri shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba thA haM khaM rak+Sha
@#/ /ma hA ba le sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya nir dza ti hUM hUM tra Ta tra Ta/ a pra ti ha te swAhA/ mi bzod pa zhes bya ba srung ba chen mo'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyangs la
mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug go/ /kun tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dz+wa la mA li ni ta thA ga ta artsi swAhA/ kun tu 'bar
ba'o| |de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis ngos nas dkri'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags
la| na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra dza ya bi s+phu ra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar ro/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta dzi hwA sid+d+hi d+har+m+ma pra tiSh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags so/ /
phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis dang / srin lag gnyis bkug la nang du sbyar/ mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs la cung zad bkug ste rtse mo gung mo la phyogs par bya/ /mthe'u chung
gnyis brkyangs la mthe bong gnyis ni/ /snga ma bzhin no/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA gA ta mahA
bAk+t+re bi dz+nyA na ma ho da ya swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkrol la nang du bcug ste dgu bor byas la gtod de gzung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta mahA daM Sh+TA sa ra sa ra gra sa ma pra b+ha ka sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi Sha ya saM b+ha ba swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mche ba'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te bzung la tshigs gsum pa dgug go /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang
sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin+t+ya ad b+hu ta rU pa pA pa ga saM pra ti bid+yA bi shud+d+hA sa ra swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
gcig tu thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mthe bong gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug la gcig tu sprad do/ /'di ni/ stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA
nAM/ da sha ba la ga d+ha ra hUM saM dzaM swAhA/ stobs bcu'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mor mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyar ro/ /dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta smr-i ti satwa ti ta a b+hU ga ga na sa ma sa ma swAhA/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /
@#/ /phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis mthe bo'i steng du gzung ngo / /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA prA p+ta ta thA ga ta a nu ga
ta swAhA/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyi gung mo gnyis
dkris la lhag ma rnams ni/ de bzhin du gzhag go /kun tu bzang po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa man+ta nu ga ta bi rA dze d+hArma
nir dza ta ma hA ma hA swAhA/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi nang du bkug la gzhag /lhag ma rnams ni/ snga
ma bzhin no/ /'di'i gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a dzi tany+dza ya sar+b+ba satwA sha yA nu ga ta swAhA/ byams pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las
mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ A kA sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsi traM bar d+ha ra swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so//
phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis dang lhan cig tu sbyar ro/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha
nAM| ata satwa hi ta a b+h+yud ga ta traM traM raM raM swAhA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// //bam po lnga pa/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig
tu sbyar la sor mo thams cad dril bu 'dra bar kha dbye/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig tu sbyar/ lhag ma rnams ni/ pad+ma lta bur bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maH
sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te ka ru NA mA ya ra ra ra hUM dzaHswAhA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis

thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ pad+ma kha ma phye ba lta bur bya'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dzaM dzaM sa swAhA/ mthu chen po thob pa'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang
gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo can du bsgrengs te/ mthe bong gnyis kyang de'i drung du gzhag go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta
bud+d+hA nAM/ tA re tA re Ni ka ru Nod b+ha be swAhA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gcus te bsgreng / lhag ma rnams ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba b+ha ba san trA sa ni hUM s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ khro gnyer ma'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug
@#/ /go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta bi Sha ya saM b+ha ba pad+ma mA li ni swAhA/ gos dkar can gyi'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis
gyen du bsgrengs la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo de'i drung du par nas gang tsam gyis chod par gzhag go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM khA da b+hany+dza s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ rta mgrin
gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gyen du bsgrengs la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs pa'i tshul du gzhag
go /de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha su na ta nu swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la gung
mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis dkris te mdzub mo gnyis kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bkug ste bzhag /lhag ma rnams ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta

bud+d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra ka bi muk+ti ba the sti Sh+Tha ta/ sma ra sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swAhA/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dgug go/

dra ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra ya ga ta swa b+hA ba s+thi ta swAhA/ dra ba'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de

nyid las sor mo thams cad dgu bor bya'o/ /gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ut+pa la'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ra bi tsi tra ga ti ku mA ra/ pra ti dz+nyA na ma nu sma
ra swAhA/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gshibs te gyen du bsgreng ngo / /skra can gyi

phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he ku mA ri kle sha ts+tshe da ya a dz+nyA nAM/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swAhA/ skra can gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa

khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gyen du bsgrengs te mdud rtse gsum lta bur bya/ nye ba'i skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ban+d+ha ya adz+nyA te ku ma ri ke
swAhA| nye ba'i skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags so/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te gung mo gnyis brkyangs la mdzub mo gnyis ngos su sbyar/ sna tshogs ma'i dbyug

pa'i phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he ku mA ri ke Adz+nyA nA pu ra bi d+hA na sa ni swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis

bsgreng ngo / /nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he s+phu ra dz+nyA na ke tu swAhA/ nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa
@#/ /g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgreng ste rtse mo dgug go /'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ A kaR+Sha ya
sar+b+ba na ku mA ra s+ya swAhA/ 'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te tshigs gsum pa dgug
go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a bi sma ya ni ye swAhA/ phyag brnyan ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te
gung mo bsgrengs la tshigs gsum pa dgug go /ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bi ma tits+tsha da ka swAhA/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i
phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa bstod la lag pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur bya/ /mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags
la| na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+ha yan+da ta swAhA/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid mas yar gyen du 'dren pa'i tshul du bya 'o/ /ngan song

spong ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+h+yud d+ha ra satwa d+ha tu na swAhA/ ngan song spong ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid brang du gzhag

go /yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he mahA mahA sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swAhA/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang
sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid me tog 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ satwe badzrod b+ha ba swAhA/ byams pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /
lag pa de nyid snying gar bzhag la gung mo nang du dgug go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ka ru Nod b+ha ba swAhA/ snying rjes brnyan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de
bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya 'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he bar da pa ra prAp+ta swAhA/ gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o/ /lag pa de
nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+bA shA pa ri pU ra ka swAhA/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyag
rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis phyung ste brkyang ngo / /sa'i snying po'i me tog gi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na
maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha bisma ye swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la sor mo gsum brkyang ngo / /rin chen 'byung ldan
@#/ /gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ he he ma hA ma hA swAhA/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa de nyid
las srin lag brkyangs te gyen du bsgreng ngo / /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ rat+nod b+ha ba swAhA/ phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du
lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung 'khyud de/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas kyang g.yon pa 'khyud la lhag ma rnams
rdo rje lta bur bya'o/ /sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+ha ra Ni prAp+ta swAhA/ sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag na rin chen gyi

phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ rat+na nir dza te swAhA/ phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya de
nyid las sor mo rnams dgod par bya'o/ /bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badzra saM b+ha ba swAhA/ bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang
sngags so/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bya ba ni/ nam mkha' snying po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na nAn+ta tsa ra swAhA/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i

snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni/ nam mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsakra brti swAhA/ nam

mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags so/ /dung gi phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni/ rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma saM b+ha

ba swAhA/ rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni/ /spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/

pad+ma mA lA ya swAhA/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /ut+pa la'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin las kha ma bye bar byas pa ni/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags

la| na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dz+nyA nod b+ha ba swAhA/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /rdo rje sna ma bzhin du byas pa ni/ /brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/

maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badzra kA ra swAhA/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la gung mo dang / mthe bong
gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng ste mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i ngos su bkug la bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzhag go /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje'o/ /gsang sngags la/
@#/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go /mA ma kI'i phyag rgya
ste| gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ Ti Ta Ti Ta dza yan+ti swAhA/ mA ma kI'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te gcus la bsdams
te g.yon pa'i mthe bos g.yas pa'i mthe bong mnan la bsdam mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NI/ hUM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ badzrod

b+ha be/ sarba trA pra ti ha te swAhA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis cung zad bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyang de la phyogs par
bya'o| |rdo rje khro zla gtso bo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ khro zla gtso bo'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub

mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ngo / /rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma nir be di na badzra su tsi ba ra de swAhA/ rdo rje rtse mo'i 'o/ /de bzhin du lag

pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la snying gar bzhag /rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ s+pho Ta ya badzra saM b+ha be swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o/ /lag pa
g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gyen du bsgreng la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng ste khros pa bzhin du sdigs par bya ba ni/ gdul dka'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang
sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ dur dan+ta Sha ma hA ro Sha Na khA da ya sar+b+ba na ku ru ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na swAhA/ gdul dka'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la brdab pa'i thabs

su bya'o/ /mngon phyogs kyi tho ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ he a b+hi mu kha mahA tsaN+Da gr-ih+Na khA da ya kin tsi ra ya si sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swAhA/ mngon phyogs

kyi'o| |snga ma bzhin du lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ shAkya thub pa'i lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sar+b+ba kle sha ni su da na sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma ba
shI ta prAp+ta ga ga na sa ma swAhA/ shAkya thub pa'i 'o/ /mdzod spu'i phyag rgya ni/ snga ma bzhin du'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo kun sbyar te spyi bo'i steng du gzhag go /gtsug
tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ baM baM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i khu
tshur bcangs pa la gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis bskyang ste srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi rtse mor mthe bo bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthil du
@#/ /gzhug /mthe bong gnyis kyang snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya ral gri shubs su bcug pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ni/
rdo rje ste| snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng la/ mdzub mo gnyis
bkug ste gung mo'i tshigs gsum par bzhag /mthe bong gnyis mig lta bur bya/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi phyag rgya ste/ gtsug tor ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyang
la kha phub ste lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mos gdugs lta bur gzung ngo / /gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya ste/ gdugs so/ /khaM/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i ni/ ral gri ste/
snga ma bzhin no/ /shaM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i ni/ 'khor lo ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /siM/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ni/ lcags kyu ste/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste
gzhag go /hUM| gzi brjid phung po'i ni/ gtsug tor te/ snga ma bzhin no/ /trIM/ cher byung ba yi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya zhes su grags/ /uM/ gyen du 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma bzang
po snga ma bzhin/ /tuM/ mtha' yas pa yi dbyangs sgra ni/ /dung yin par ni ngas bshad do/ /ruM/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su bzhag pa ni/ mdzod spu'i phyag rgya
yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o/ /spyan gyi ni/ gtsug tor snga ma bzhin te/ bye brag tu rdo rjes mtshan pa'o/ /ga/ lag pa g.yas pa pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thabs su snying gar bzhag la lag pa g.yon pa thal
mo bsnun pa'i thabs su brkyang ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /gsang sngags ni/ d+hiM d+hiM riM riM dzi ri dzi ri/ lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba
las dgug go /gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i kha'i phyag rgya'o/ /a pa ra dzi ta dza yan+ti Ti te swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa 'gram par bstan pa ni/ dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de

nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gcus pa lta bur gzung ngo / /kun tu me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug go/ 'od kyi phreng ba can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag
rgya de nyid las mthe bong nang du gzhug go /'od kyi phreng ba can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis me tog 'dzin pa lta bur bya'o/ /yid mgyogs kyi phyag rgya'o//
lag pa g.yas pa'i srin lag gi steng du mthe bong bzhag la/ mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung gsum brkyang ste rnam ba'i steng du gzhag go /lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bya'o//
sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad de zlum por bya'o/ /sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo dgug pa ni/ bum pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du
@#/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la mthe bong nang du bzhag pa ni/ mi gnyer ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa de nyid mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur
byas la mthe bo mthe chung gi tshigs gnyis par gzhag go/ drang srong rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste/ go rim ni/ ji ltar rigs par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la
mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsdus la bstod de bzung ba ni/ gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa kha phub ste dril bu
'dra bar byas pa ni/ 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya ste/ dril bu'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni/ dus mtshan mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /

phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni/ drag mo'i phyag rgya ste/ tri shU la'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las pad+ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las
mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs gsum par sprad pa ni/ gzhon nu ma'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mor gzhag go /khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo'i

phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gyen du bsgreng ngo / /phag mo'i phyag rgya ste/ tho ba'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa snod lta bur bya'o/ /tsa muN+Di'i phyag rgya ste/ thod pa'o/ /bden bral gyi
phyag rgya ral gri ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya 'khor lo yang snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lag pa gnyis g.yon phyogs nas bstod de bskor ba ni/ dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i sprin

gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo gsum gyen du bsgreng ba ni/ bde byed kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo de dag drang por byas pa ni/ u ma pa ti s+ya'i phyag
rgya'o| |zla ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad+ma snga ma bzhin te/ khyad par du dkar por bya'o/ /lag pa de nyid gnyis ka gshibs te bkan la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis ngos su dgug go /nyi ma'i phyag

rgya ste| shing rta'o/ /lag pa de gnyis ka gcig tu thal mo sbyar la gung mo dang srin lag gnyis gzhu 'dra bar bya'o/ /rgyal pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /ba dan gyi phyag rgya ni/ snga ma
bzhin te/ rlung gi'o/ /de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa lte ba'i phyogs su bkan la sor mo gnyis bsgreng ste gzung ngo / /lag pa g.yas pa de la phyogs par byas te pi wang len pa lta bur byas

pa ni| dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste/ pi wang ngo / /chu lha'i phyag rgya ni/ /zhags pa ste/ snga ma bzhin no/ /dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dgug go /lha ma yin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/

gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ra la yaM swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag brkyang ngo / /dri za'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ bi shud+d+hA swa ra ba hi na swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub
@#/ /mo dgug go /gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ yak+Sha shwa ra swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sbyar ro/ /
gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ yak+Sha bid+yA d+hA ri swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ngo / /sha za rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ bi shA rtse ga
ti swAhA/ gung mo de nyid bkug la gzung ngo / /sha za mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ mi tsi mi tsi swAhA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong gnyis

gyen du sgreng ste gzung ngo / /gza' thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ gra he shwa R+ya prA p+ta dz+yo tirma ya swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang mthe bong
gnyis ldog ste sbyar ro/ /rgyu skar thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ nak+Sha tra ni ra na da na ye swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug
ste lag pa'i mthil du gzhag go /gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ rAk+Sha sid+d+hI pa ta ye swAhA/ srin po rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/ /lag pa g.yas pa
khar bzhag ste lce la reg par bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hIHha/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bu la sogs pa ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab 'byams rnams te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
'on kyang ji tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o/ /ji tsam du lce bskyod pa de tsam du de dag kun kyang gsang sngags bstan par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba
pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan du byas na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub kyang bslus par 'gyur te/ dam tshig
las 'das pas nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ phyag rgya rim par
phye ba rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ thams cad du 'jug pa'i chos kyi sgo'i
chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /de la byang chub sems dpas a zhes bya ba la gnas te dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a/

@#/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ ba/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ nga nya Na na/ na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sA/ na maHsa man+ta badzra nAM/ bA/ kA khA gA g+hA/ tsA tshA dzA dz+hA/ TA ThA DA D+hA/ tA thA dA d+hA/ pA phA bA b+hA mA/ yA rA lA wa/ shA ShA swAhA/ dA nyA NA nA/

na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ aM/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saM/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ baM/ kaM khaM gaM g+haM/ tsaM tshaM dzaM dz+haM/ TaM ThaM TaM D+haM/ taM thaM daM d+haM/ paM phaM baM b+haM maM/ yaM raM laM waM/ shaM ShaM saM haM/ ngaM nyaM NaM naM/

na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ aH/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saH/ na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/ baHka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ nga nya Na na/
i i/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ltar na/ 'di ni/ yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul la rnam par dag pa gnas
pa'i cho ga /lha yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i rol mo ste/ 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad 'chad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsang
ba pa'i bdag po/ ngas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byams gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'chad pa ma mthong / gsang ba pa'i
bdag po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga shes par 'dod na/ thams cad du 'jug
pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /ka dang / tsa dang / Ta dang / ta dang / pa rnams thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs la 'jug
pas byang chub dang / spyod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas pa thob par byed do/ /de bas na/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga la dang po la
sogs pa'i tha snyad dang ldan par 'gyur bde dag nyid thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ji ltar 'dod par nges
par sbyar bar bya'o/ /blo yis rnam par rtogs na ni/ /de dag bla med gnas mchog ster/ /de ltar 'di ni/ 'khor lo gcig ste/ 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor ba ni/ yi ge'i 'khor
lo'o| |sngags pas yi ge'i 'khro lo de shes na/ rtag tu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad
@#/ /cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can gyi khams
thams cad la gzigs nas chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i bkod pa bstan pa dang / gsang sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus
pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu rlabs de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa'i snying po can
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung
bar byed pa'i sgo ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las dang / tshe dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang / zar 'jug pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog
dang | dbyibs dang / nga ro dang / 'gro ba dang / spyod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par
bskyed pa'i sku rnams byung bar gyur to/ /byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab
par rnam par rig par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrog par gyur to/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni/ /chos rnams dag ni thams cad
dang | |sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal skyob pa rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams dang / /sems can snod kyi
'jig rten dag /btags pa rim pa bzhin 'byung zhing / /chos rnams skye dang gnas pa dag /gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan gyur cing / /yid gnyis
som nyi dang bral ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa bshad pa'i/ /lam 'di khyod kyis sgom par gyis/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi
dbyings thams cad rang gi sku rnam par rig par byed pa sprul pa'i sprin gyis yongs su bkang nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis ba spu'i bu ga thams
cad nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas byin gyis brlabs te rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa/ lha rnams kyi gnas yang dag par gnas par bsam pa
@#/ /sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyi/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang | gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dang por sngags pas dkyil 'khor de/ /rang gi
lus la dgod byas te/ /rkang pa nas ni chu so la/ /thug gi bar du sa yir bsam/ /de nas gong du snying ga'i bar/ /sdom brtson can gyi chu yir bsam/ /chu yi yan chad me yi ste/ /
ma yi yan chad rlung yin no/ /bsams nas de nas mkhas pa yis/ /sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku
dang | gsung dang / thugs kyi sa la bzhugs nas chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po the tshom thams cad gcod

par byed pa 'di smras so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sa ma ba ti d+harma d+h+wa tu kAR+ya ga tiM ga tA nAM/ sarba thA/ aM khaM aM a/ saM sa/ haM ha/ raM ra baM ba swAhA/ hUM ma hA swAhA/ raM ra swAhA/
gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste phyag na rdo rje'i sbyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam
par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis la bzhugs nas thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang
bar bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa legs so legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par spyad cing bdud bzhi pham par byas nas chos kyi dbyings
las byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste bdud sdig can rnams btul bar gyur te/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas nam mkha'
tshad med pa'i phyir sku tshad med pa brnyes par gyur/ /de bzhin du gsung dang thugs tshad med pa yang brnyes par gyur to/ /de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la
dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag nyid las brtsams te chos 'chad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
@#/ /mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pas na/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang ngo / /thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs
rgyas/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /sngags sbyang tshig mchog zhus shig dang / /cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal to/ /nged kyang sngon ni 'di rnams kyis/ /bla med byang chub
rtogs nas su/ /mya ngan 'das lam 'gro ba yi/ /mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad pa/ /'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dbang du gyur/ /de
nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bsam pa mchog rab mgu gyur pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs pas/ /'di skad ces ni tshig tu smras/ /chos 'di rnams ni mtshan
nyid med/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /las dang tshe las rnam par grol/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'dod/ /thugs rjes mnga'i na mdzad pa yi/ /mgon po rnams kyi
thabs kyis ni/ /rnam par sprul nas chos kyi ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
de smras nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'gro ba rnams la bltas te snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rnam
par snang mdzad la zhus pa/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /kun mkhyen snyun dang bral ba po/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /'dren pa khyod la zhu ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni
sngon rol du/ /ci zhig bgyi ba 'dren pas gsungs/ /thub pa chen po slob dpon dang / /slob ma'ang rnam pa du ru bshad/ /sa gzhi ji 'drar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /de yang ji ltar sbyang
bar bgyi/ /ji ltar sa ni dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar de ni brtan pa lags/ /slob ma'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi/ /sbyang ba'ang 'dren pas bka' stsol cig /dag pa'i mtshan ma ci 'dra
dang | |gang gis de dag bsrung bar bgyi/ /sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlab/ /der ni dang por gang gis brtag /sa yi cha las thig gdab pa'i/ /srad bu rnam du 'tshal bar bgyi/ /mchod
pa rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi/ /me tog bdug spos ci 'dra dang / /me tog dang ni bdug spos dag /ji ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsungs/ /lha bshos sbyin sreg las rnams kyang / /gang
dag la ni ji ltar bgyi/ /lha rnams kyi ni gdan dag kyang / /gang la gang gis bgyi ba gsungs/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang / /go rim bzhin du mgon pos gsungs/ /
lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang / /gdan gyi tshad kyang bshad du gsol/ /phyag rgya rnams ni gang nas byung / /ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi/ /dbang bskur rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi/ /dam
@#/ /tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi/ /sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / /thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar
bden pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi/ /grub pa'i dus kyang bka' stsol cig /grub nas nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / /ji ltar mi snang 'gyur ba dang / /gtso
bo lus 'di ma bor bar/ /ji ltar lha yi lus thob 'gyur/ /sprul pa rnams ni sna tshogs la/ /de la gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla me dang phyogs rnams dang / /rgyu skar
gza' dang skar ma dang / /yud tsam dang ni thang gcig dang / /rga dang 'chi dang rgud pa dang / /ltas ngan dag ni thams cad kyang / /de la ji ltar 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rkang gnyis
gtso bo sangs rgyas dang / /sngags pa ji ltar 'bral mi 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las dang me dag dang / /tshim par bgyi ba dur 'tshal bgyi/ /lha rnams kyang ni so so yi/ /ngo bo
nyid ni 'dren pas gsungs/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /tshad dang 'bras bu grangs rnams dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang //
las kyi rnam pa gang du smin/ /ji ltar rnam par smin mi 'gyur/ /sngags pa rnams ni nam zhig na/ /las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur/ /de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs
rgyas| |bcom ldan snyun dang bral ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs/ /snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung / /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dgod pa/ /lha rnams kyi ni gnas
nges pa| |theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba/ /dpa' bo cher 'byung khyod kyis gang / /yongs su dris pa de legs so/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
chen la| |mdor ni bsdus nas bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du/ /bya ba rnams ni nges pas nyon/ /so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis/ /tshul shes pas na ci rigs
par| |rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te/ /rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che/ /yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba/ /go rim bzhin du bzlas brjod bya/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs
shes pa'i/ /slob dpon rnam pa gnyis zhes bya/ /zab dang mi zab bye brag las/ /de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /zab mo rgya cher shes par bya/ /lus can rnams ni yid mi rton/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste/ /mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs/ /gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /myos par gyur pa dmigs pa can/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog
rnams kyis/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor kun/ /de yis bri bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur/ /dus dang dus min bye brag las/ /slob ma rnam bzhir shes bya
@#/ /ste| |gcig ni de yi mod la sgrub/ /gnyis su sgrub dang gnyi gar min/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis/ /slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog /sa ni
dang por shes par bya/ /sems kyi sar ni bshad pa yin/ /sbyang ba sngar ni bstan pa ste/ /de yis de ni yongs su sbyang / /nam zhig nyes dang bral ba na/ /sems kyis sa ni mi
'jigs pa/ /de tshe de ni dag pa ste/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mngon par byang chub mthong bas na/ /de ltar de ni brtan zhes bya/ /de las gzhan dus sbyong ba/ /de ni
dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su/ /gang zhig sa spyod byed pa ni/ /byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pa/ /gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag /de bas rtog pa
rnam spangs nas/ /sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni/ /cho ga rgyas par gang bstan pa/ /de dag thog mar bstan pa ni/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis mi
shes te| |rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba/ /ji srid ma spangs bar du ni/ /'jig rten 'di nas sangs rgyas min/ /kun mkhyen ces kyang mi bya'o/ /slob ma rnams la nan tan du//
byang chub sems kyi sbyang bar bya/ /srung ba mi g.yo mgon po'am/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya/ /slob ma nam zhig dmigs pa yis/ /nam yang g.yos par mi 'gyur ba//
de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur/ /sa byin brlab pa dang po ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad/ /gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te/ /'dir ni gzhan du
mi bya'o/ /srad bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /nag po zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /lnga pa nam mkha' lta bur bshad/ /bar snang la ni bzung nas su/ /der ni dkyil
'khor brtag par bya/ /srad bu dag ni gnyis pa yis/ /sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang / /de'i sras blo can rnams kyi gdan/ /pad+ma yid las byung ba'i
mchog /bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsngags/ /rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa/ /phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa/ /de dag stan du shes bya ba/ /pad+ma las byung 'dab ma'o/ /
'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang / /tshangs la sogs pa 'jig rten grags/ /de dag stan ni pad+ma dmar/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/ /phal pa rnams ni ci rigs par/ /sa yi bye
brag dag las bsam/ /mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang / /de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang / /me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i/ /sor mo las
byung me tog rnams/ /skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya/ /yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni/ /bcings nas byang chub sems bsgoms te/ /sor mo mgon po thams cad dang / /de'i sras
@#/ /rnams la nan tan bya'o/ /'di ni skyon med me tog ste/ /rab tu bsung zhim rnam par mdzes/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ljon shing rnams/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir
byung ba/ /ting 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi/ /sngags kyis de dag byin brlabs na/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /sprin mang rgya cher dam pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar
ni| |de tshe rtag tu char bzhin 'bab/ /lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni/ /me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste/ /rang gi sngags rgyud rgyas shes pas/ /ji ltar rigs par dbul bar bya/ /
de bzhin me tog bdug spos rnams/ /ji ltar rig par rnam par bsam/ /mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni/ /bkra shis pa zhes bshad pa ste/ /de yis me tog de blangs nas/ /rang gi
snying ga'i phyogs nas dbul/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams la/ /lte ba'i thad ga nas zhes bya/ /bdug spos rdo rje'i khu tshur ram/ /yang na pad+ma'i phreng ba yis/ /bar snang la ni bzung nas
su| |'jig rten mgon skyob rnams la dbul/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i/ /lha rnams la ni go rim bzhin/ /phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis zhes
bya| |las dang tshe las rnam par grol/ /slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste/ /las 'dod pa yis sbyin sreg bya/ /nang gi sbyin sreg ces su bshad/ /phyi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing / /gnas
gsum dang ni gsum la gnas/ /las gsum gyi ni las grub pa/ /'jig rten pa yi sbyin sreg mchog /sbyin sreg las ni mi shes pas/ /gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni/ /sngags kyi shes la
spangs pa ste/ /glen des 'bras bu mi thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags dang / /de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /dkar dang ser du shes par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje thams
cad pa| |'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni/ /las kyi bye brag dag las dkar/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa dang / /go rim bzhin du zlum po dang / /gru gsum dang ni zla ga ma 'dra/ /dbyibs ni
legs par bshad pa yin/ /gzugs ni gnyis su shes bya ba/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid/ /yang na kun tu thams cad kyi/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te/ /bsam yas ye shes
las byung bas/ /de bas de rnams bsam yas te/ /ye shes mkhyen gyi ye shes ni/ /sems can don phyir tha dad gyur/ /yid kyi rgya ni ji tsam pa/ /bstan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni/ /lha yi tshad kyang go
rim bzhin/ /de tsam du ni shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba nas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung / /chos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams/ /chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /de bas
mdor na chos kyi dbyings/ /mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste/ /de bas nan tan nyan par gyis/ /phyag rgyas gang zhig dbang bskur ba/ /las dang bya ba
@#/ /spangs pa ste/ /skyob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur pa/ /de ni mchog ste dang po yin/ /gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis/ /kun nas bslang bar yang dag bshad/ /
gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste/ /yul dang dus ni spangs pa'o/ /bla ma legs par mgu byas nas/ /phan par byed pas gang smras pa'i/ /dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par/ /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni/ /dam tshig can rnams lngar bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las/ /dam
tshig shes pa gcig ces bya/ /de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing / /sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi bye brag las/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /dkyil
'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di/ /dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong / /las dang bya ba la yang sbyar/ /bla mas lung ni ma byin pa/ /de yang dam
tshig shes par bshad/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams/ /de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan/ /gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yin/ /
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba/ /dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya/ /dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya/ /brtul zhugs bzang po byang
chub phyir/ /gang zhig sems ni sgom pa na/ /sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su/ /sems can don
la sbyor pa na/ /dmigs su med pa'i spyod 'thob pa/ /rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya/ /thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos/ ngo bo nyid ni med pa la/ /gang gi sems ni ri rab bzhin/
gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong / /'di bden 'di ni yang dag pa/ /de bzhin du ni mi slu ba/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa/ /de bzhin sngon ni ngas mthong ba'i/ /byang chub sems
thob gang yin de/ /dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos/ /de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni/ /rnam pa dag ni sngar 'dod de/ /spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang /
'jig rten mngon shes lngar 'dod dang / /sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no/ /rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi/ /las ni ji srid mnyams shing / /rnam smin rnam par ma smin te/ /dngos
grub dag gi dus su 'dod/ /mdor na gang tshe dus gcig tu/ /las dang skye ba 'phangs gyur pa/ /de tshe'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni/ /yid las yang dag byung ba 'thob/ /bam po drug pa/
grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni/ /ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin/ /sngags kyi drangs rmongs byed pa/ /ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin/ /gang la lus dang dgra med pa/ /dri za'i grong khyer
@#/ /ji bzhin te/ /de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya/ /de ni de na gnas pa yin/ /ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin/ /lus kyang spangs
pa ma yin la/ /de nyid kyis kyang de ma song / /de bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang / /sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag /bsod nams bya ba'i las rnams kyis/ /'ja' dang
'dra ba'i lus kyang 'thob/ /lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra/ /de las rnam par bsams pa'i don/ /ma brtags par yang 'byung
bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i phyogs rnams su/ /'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis/ /mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang / /rtog pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so/ /'di
kun 'du shes tsam du ni/ /nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing / /rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'/ /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo
yis| |sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni/ /phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste/ /de yang tshim par bya dang bcas/ /lha rnams kyang ni so so yi/ /rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su/ /'jig
rten pa yi sngags rnams kyis/ /tshad dag legs par gsum pa ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams/ /bkur ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa/ /de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i/ /
sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams/ /'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ster/ /tshad ni bshad pa de yin no/ /'on kyang skye dang 'jig pa yi/ /chos can de dag brtan pa med/ /'jig rten
'das pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o/ /las dang skye ba kun bcad pa/ /nyes pa gsum bral rgyal ba dang / /rang rgyal bse ru lta bu dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan
thos dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa/ /dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das/ /rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba/ /mthong dang ma
mthong 'bras bu'i tshad/ /ngag yid lus las byung ba'o/ /'jig rten pa yi 'bras bu'i tshad/ /bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa yin/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsang
sngags 'bras bu bskal pa 'das/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni/ /mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o/ /'jig rten pa yi mtshan mar bcas/ /rnam
par smin pa 'di nyid la/ /las kyi 'bras bu smin 'gyur ba/ /nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na/ /de tshe las kyang ldog par 'gyur/ /sems ni ngo bo nyid med phyir/ /rgyud dang 'bras bu rnam
spangs shing / /yang dang tshe las rnam grol na/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ba yin/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod pa rim par phye ba/ lha rnams
@#/ /gnas par byin gyis rlob pa/ ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa chos kyi
dbyings rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus par bsgral bar yi dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sngon gyi sangs rgyas
rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyon la legs par rab tu yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /zhes
gsol nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dang por yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa rim par phye ba gang las 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa byung ba/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang
ba/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod kyi de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /sgo gcig pa ni stegs bur bcas/ /bzang po rdo rje rnams kyis mtshan/ /
dbus su rdo rje rtse brgya pa/ /de steng pad+ma bri ba ni/ /sa bon dang bcas rgyas par byas/ /de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che/ /phyag rgya klad kor gyis mdzes byas/ /'dab ma brgyad rnams legs par
rdzogs/ /ze bar bcas pa shin tu bzang / /'dab ma rnams ni thams cad la/ /yan lag bcu gnyis tshig bkod pa/ /de rnams dbus na mgon bzhugs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rkang gnyis gtso/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi 'khor rnams kyis/ /kho ra khor yug yongs su bskor/ /snying rje las byung dkyil 'khor 'di/ mchog tu shes par bya ba ste/ /lung bzhin
dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /las dang lus dang dngos grub dang / /dgod pa rnams kyang des pa yis/ /'di las 'byung bar shes par bya/ /gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ gzhan yang de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing mdog /dung lta bu yi dbus na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i steng na
gnas| |klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /dbyad mi dgos pas kun nas ni/ /'od zer dag ni gnyis byas pa/ /gsang sngags mgon las
byung nas su/ /de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang / spyan ras gzigs dbang dkyil 'khor ni/ /nges pas nan tan mnyan par gyis/ /kun tu
gru bzhi lham pa la/ /dbus su'ang dung 'dra gzhag par bya/ /de yi steng du'ang pad+ma na/ /sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri/ /de yi steng du'ang rdo rje che/ /rdo rje las kyang pad+ma che/ /thams cad
@#/ /sa bon rnams kyis mtshan/ /rang gi sa bon legs par sbyar/ /sgrol ma dang ni khro gnyer can/ /de bzhin gos dkar can dang ni/ /rig sngags longs
spyod can ma dang / /mthu chen thob pa'ang nan tan bya/ /dpal rnams kun dang phyag brnyan ma/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su ni/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dbang thob rnams/ /khyad par
du ni bri bar bya/ /rta mgrin can gyi bya ba ni/ /gru gsum tshul du 'dug pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan ma bzang po sa btab/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /rig sngags rgyal dang
bcas par ni/ /mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par bya'o/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /rdo rje'i
mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan/ /thams cad ser po yid du 'ong / /dbus na pad+ma rab tu gnas/ /de yi dbus su bya ba ni/ /bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis
mtshan| |klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan/ /de yi steng du'ang rlung chen ni/ /dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog /ba dan g.yo bar sngags par bya/ /klad kor gyis kyang rnam par
brgyan| |de yi steng du 'ang gru gsum pa/ /rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can de/ /'jigs par byed pa'i me 'dra ba/ /sum mdo ris mtshan mtshan gyis btab/ /'bar phreng 'khrigs
pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i gzugs 'dra ba'o/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /dus mtha'i me 'od 'dra ba'o/ /pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba can/ /hUM
zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan/ /dam pa sa bon rnams kyis mtshan/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /rgyal ba'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs/ /mA ma kI ni lu gu rgyud/ /de bzhin rdo
rje rigs las byung / /rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje rtse/ /rig sngags rgyal mo mthu chen dag /dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni/ /kun kyang khongs su chud par bya/ /las rnams shin tu 'grub
bya'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sa bon dang / /kha dog khyad par go rim bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar rigs par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin/ /chen po gtsor bshad 'di rnams

te| |nam mkha' dri med rdo rje 'khor/ /rdo rje mche ba des pa dang / /rnam par grags pa skal chen dag /rdo rje mgon po mchog 'dzin dang / /rdo rje zhi ba rdo rje che/ /rdo rje mthing ga de bzhin gzhan//
rdo rje pad+ma yangs pa'i mig /rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid/ /spros pa med par gnas pa dang / /nam mkha' mtha' yas 'gro ba'o/ /de rnams dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ /dkar po ser po
dmar po dang / /nag po yin par yang dag bsgrags/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs/ /rtse gsum pa dang rtse gcig dang / /gzhan yang gnyis dang gnyis ma yin/ /phreng ba
@#/ /lta bu de bzhin gzhan/ /kha dog bye brag las shes bya/ /'di rnams kun kyang mthu chen te/ /rnam par rgyal dang ldan pa'o/ /mi g.yo mgon gyi dkyil
'khor ni/ /rlung dang me yi yin par 'dod/ /nga yi drung ni 'og logs su/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs char bri/ /rang gi sa bon mtshan mar ldan/ /ral gri phyag rgya legs par sbyar/ /
yang na zhags pa bya yang rung / /blo ldan de yis bri bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyi'ang / /bye brag tu ni rlung gi dbus/ /rdo rje can gyi mtshan dang mtshan/ /gnas gsum dag
la 'dug pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum gyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa 'byung ste/ de la re zhig dkyil 'khor ni/ /gser
gyi kha dog gru bzhi pa/ /rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang lha mo'i gzugs/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /thams cad
ser po 'bar dang bcas/ /de yang gtsug tor bzhag pa ni/ /cha gsum la ni gnas par bya/ /dbus ma'i cha ni bor nas ni/ /der yang spyan ni bri bar bya/ /rang gi 'od 'bar
dbus na gnas/ /mdor ni sa bon ldan par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu rgyal bas gsungs/ /de yi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ /chu yi yin te
thams cad sgro/ /shin tu dri med rab tu zhi/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de nas shAkya seng+ge yang / /nges pas dkyil 'khor mnyan par gyis/ /der ni dbang chen zhes bya ba//
kha dog ser pos nye bar brgyan/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /dbus su rdo rje snga ma bzhin/ /de yi steng du pad+ma ni/ /kun tu kha dog ser po gzhag /de steng lhung bzed chen po ste/ /rdo rjes
mtshan pa 'bar dang bcas/ /yang na chos gos 'khar bsil dag /go rim bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /gtsug tor lnga po gang bsgrags pa/ /de rnams phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ /gdugs
