zad ci yod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bsangs te g.yas rol du gzhag go /g.yon rol du ni/ mchod yon gyi snod gnyis rtswa ku sha dang spos chus sbyar ba blugs
te bzhag la gcig ni/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bzlas so/ /gcig ni/ rdo rje mchog gis bzlas so/ /zhugs thab kyi kho ra khor yug tu rtswa ku sha bskor ba'i thabs su dgram mo/ /
bdag rang gar 'dug pa'i gzhir yang rtswa ku sha bskor ba'i thabs su gding ngo / /shing u dum wa ra dang / a shwat+tha'i dgang gzar dang / blugs gzar dang / mar bzhus pa yang
mdun du gzhag go /de nas me'i thab khung tsan+dan gyis bskus te me tog dkar po dri zhim po'i sil ma yang bkram la bram ze'i khyim nas me blangs la khro bo'i rgyal pos bsang gtor
@#/ /byas te shing blag sha dang / u dum ba ra'i bud shing la rlung g.yab kyis me sbar ro/ /der kha byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa gnyis byug spos kyis
bskus te dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa bcings la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
kyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas thab khung gi zhabs su chu'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ chu'i dbus su yi ge snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa las me'i gzugs su gyur pa dung dang /
me tog kun da dang / zla ba'i mdog dang 'dra ba/ thor tshugs can/ mig gsum pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na bgrang phreng dang / gun+d+hi dang / be con thogs shing mi 'jigs pa sbyin
ba| gos dkar po bgos pa/ srad bu dkar po se ral khar thogs pa/ snying ga'i sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ me lce dkar po 'phro ba/ ye shes kyi rang
bzhin can/ de lta bu'i me lha bsams la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bsngags pa'i chu sngar bshams pas me la bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor bya'o/ /rdo rje mchog sbyin
gyis kyang lan gsum du bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM maM swAhA/ rdo rje mchog sbyin gyi'o/ /de nas me la rang gi gsang sngags kyi byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dbul lo/ /de
nas mngar gsum las sreg blugs gsum byin te dgang gzar chang bas bzung la mar gyi dgang blugs gsum sbyin no/ /de nas shing u dum ba ra'am/ a shwat+tha'i rtse mo'i yam shing
rtse gnyis mar la smyugs pa bdun bsreg go /de nas yang mar gyi gang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA naM/ oM bar dA ga na ye shAn+tiM

ku ru swAhA/ de bzhin du lha thams cad la yang so sor sbyin sreg byas la bsang gtor bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ hUM a mahA shAn+ti ga ta/ shAn+ti ka ra pra shA ma d+harma nir dza ta/ a b+hA ba
swa b+hA ba d+harma sa man+ta prAb+ha/ a mu ga s+ya swasti shAn+tiM baM ku ru swAhA/ zhi ba'i gsang sngags so/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dran par byas la bdag nyid kyis nang rnam par dag
pas ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi sems bsgom mo/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi rig sngags bzhag ste rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings la rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgom
mo| |de nas yang snga ma bzhin du dgang blugs gsum la sogs pa phul te bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor yang byas la bdag gi rgyud las byung ba'i rdzas rnams ji srid mi
skyo ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /skyo bar gyur na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bltas te yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom mo/ /de nas mchod yon phul la lha rnams la phyag byas
@#/ /te slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams gos gsar pas g.yogs la phyi de nyin yang snga
ma bzhin du lha rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsams te cho ga'i rim pa de nyid nam zhi bar gyur gyi bar du bya'o/ /gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su/ /cho ga shes pa'i
sngags bsgrubs pas/ /le lo med par zhi byas na/ /zhi ba myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed kyi khams ris gcig /nges pa nyid du zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po la ni zhag bcu
gnyis| |yul phyogs su ni zhag bcus so/ /de la zhi ba'i cho ga'i las byed pas cho ga 'di ltar spyad par bya'o/ /gos dkar bgos shing gtsang la zhi/ /byang chub sems la rab
tu gzhol/ /ku sha bting ba'i stan la nyal/ /de las byas pa'i gsang byed thogs/ /nas btsos pa'ang 'o ma 'thung / /yid kyis sbyin sreg byed la 'jug /dus gsum sbyin
sreg bzlas brjod kyis/ /zhi ba'i cho ga spyad par bya'o/ /zhal bsil rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis/ /bsang gtor mi g.yo mgon gyis so/ /'di ni re zhig mdor bsdus na/ /sbyin sreg cho gar
bsgrags pa yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o/ /(skal pa chen
po de nas gzhan/ /shin tu rgyas byed sbyin sreg kyang / /ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis/ /sngon gyi sngags la mkhas pa yis/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/ /phan par 'dod
pas bshad par bya/ /)de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga spyad par bya/ /grong ngam yang na ljongs dag gi/ shar gyi phyogs su gnas bcas nas/ /snga ma bzhin du nges pa yi/ /sa
gzhi legs par brtag par bya/ /ri yi rtse'am phyugs lhas sam/ /mchod rten ring bsrel can dag tu/ /rgyas pa'i las ni sgrub byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/ /mkhas
pas las kyi cho ga yis/ /sa ni legs par brkos nas su/ /dbus su rin chen bzhag pa ni/ /sman dang 'bru rnams bcas pa'o/ /der yang sa ni ser po yis/ /sa gzhi legs
par dgang bar bya/ /mnyam zhing legs par bcags nas su/ /de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bri/ /'dir yang sngags pa mkhas pas rdo rje mchog sbyin rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas
pas de'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs la 'phags pa mi g.yo bas mtshams gcad pa dang / yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /zla ba yar ngo'i tshes gsum
mam| lnga'am/ bdun nam/ yang na zla ba nya la yang rung ste/ gza' ba bzang po gza' lhag gam/ phur bu'am/ rgyu skar gro zhin dang / mon gru dang / snron dang / snar ma la
@#/ /bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs te srad bu ser po blangs la grangs dang tshad sngar bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi thig
gdab bo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bskor te nang du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags la phyag byas te/ yang rnam par snang mdzad du bdag
byin gyis brlabs te tshon rtsi ser po blangs la/ der ni yi ge ka bzhag pa/ /de tshe thub pa gser thub ni/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ /ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig
bcom pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rta babs can du bril nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag tu dbye'o/ /phyi rol tu ri mo gru bzhi pa gsum gyis bskor la dkyil 'khor du lha rnams
dgod pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /de la khyad par ni/ 'di yod do/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya yi ge sa dang
bcas par gzhag go /sa/ mdzod spu'i gnas su ni/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la shing tog pa'i dza pu ri'i phyag rgya dang / yi ge dza bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid can dang bcas par gzhag go/
dzaM| 'phags ma khro gnyer can gyi gnas su grags ldan ma me tog pri yang ku'i phyag rgya yi ge ya dang bcas par gzhag go /ya/ 'phags ma gos dkar mo can gyi gnas su
ni| dpal chen mo 'phags ma dkar mo zhes bya ba pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang yi ge'i 'brur gzhag go /shri'i/ 'phags pa gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni/ dpung bzang rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi
ge'i 'brur gzhag go /hUM/ bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor gnas su ni/ rdo rje'i sde ste/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge'i 'brur gzhag go /sa/ gnas gtsang ma ba rnams kyis gnas su ni/ brgya
byin dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgod do/ /de nas phyi rol gyi ma mo gnyis kyi nang logs kho ra khor yug dang gra thams cad du rdo rje bri'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas logs
'khor sa'i nang du me'i thab khung bya ba ni/ gru bzhi lham pa kha ran can/ /rgyar ni khru do'i tshad du bya/ /rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis bskor/ /zabs su khru gang tsam gyi tshad/ /kha ran
mtho gang tshad du bya/ /'jim pa ser po'i skyang nul bsku/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya mdzub gang ba/ /'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /dus gsum du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bsku'o/ /de nas
snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i lha la sogs pa rnam pa dang mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te byug spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o/ /de la khyad par ni/
'di yod de/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gnas su bzhugs su gsol pa dang / byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pas mchod pa de'i tshe bdag nyid rdo rje mchog
@#/ /sbyin du byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ /'dir byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ste/ gur gum ga pur bsres pa ni/ /rgyas pa dag la byug
spos mchog /dri zhim kha dog ser po dang / /de ma rnyed na sbyar bar bya/ /me tog tsam pa rab tu bzang / /yu ti sna ma ser po dang / /de las gzhan pa'ang dri zhim pa/ /ser po dag ni dbul
bar bya| |gur gum a ga ru dang sbyar/ /sha kha ra dang sbyar ba dag /rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir/ /bdug spos mkhas pas dbul bar bya/ /gu gul dang ni tsan+dan yang / /
mar dang sbyar ba bdug spos mchog /gan+d+ha ra sa gur gum bsres/ /bdug spos sngags la mkhas pas dbul/ /mar me snod ni gser gyi bzang / /yang na kham pa ser po'ang rung //
mkhas pas ras ni ser po yi/ /me mar snying po ser po dbul/ /spos kyi 'bru mar bzang po yis/ /de yi snum ni dri zhim bya/ /yang na til gyi 'bru mar gyis/ /mar me gtsang ma dbul
bar bya| |'bras chan ser po sran tshod tsam/ /mar dang bcas pa shin tu bzang / /tshod ma rnams kyang ser por bya/ /shing tog bag tshos de bzhin no/ /spos chu me tog ser po dang / /de
bzhin 'bras dang dur ba'i rtswa/ /snod kyang ser por blugs pa dag /rgyas pa la ni mchod yon shis/ /de ltar mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de nas rdo rje mchog sbyin du bdag
byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no/ /de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te me'i thab khung gi drung du bsreg par bya
ba la sogs pa sngags kyi gsang ba rnams snga ma bzhin du bzhag las la rtswa ku sha bting ba'i steng du pad+ma'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i
skur bsams te khang pa'i nang byug spos ser pos zhugs thabs bskus te me tog ser po'i sil ma yang bkram la rtswa ku sha bting ste rgyal rigs kyi khyim mam/ rgyal po'i pho brang
nas me blangs la bsang gtor byas te shing blag sha dang / u dum pa ras me sbar la de nas me'i thab khung gi zhabs su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der yi ge ya
klad kor dang bcas par pad+ma la gnas pa bsam mo/ /yaM/ yi ge ra las thab khung gi nang nas me byung bar bsam pa ni/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i thor tshugs can/ mig gsum
pa| gdong bzhi pa/ lag na bgrang phreng dang / gun+d+ha thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gos ser po bgos pa/ srad bu ser po se ral khar thogs pa/ sor ris gsum gyis byugs
pa| sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ me lce 'bar ba kun tu 'phro ba/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i 'od
@#/ /zer las byung ba de lta bu'i me bsams te/ de nas bsang gtor bya ba dang / kha bkru ba dang / mchod yon dbul ba byas la byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa
rang gi sngags kyis sbyin no/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ag+ne ye swAhA/ de nas 'o thug sprad rtse dang mar la sogs par sbyar ba'am/ til nag po mar dang sbyar ba'i sreg blugs
gsum byin te/ de nas shing bil ba'i dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin no/ /de nas shing blag sha'am/ u dum ba ra'i dbus kyi cha las
byung ba'i yaM sreg shing sboms su chang ba gang la srid du khru gang ba mar la myugs pa'i sbyin sreg gsum byin la/ yang dgang blugs gsum sbyin no/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du
lha'i gzugs rnams bsams te snying po de dang des sreg blugs gsum dbul lo/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bsams te byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la bdag gi lha'i
gzugs su bsams te snga ma bzhin du sreg blugs gsum phul nas bdag gi dngos grub sgrub pa las bshad pa'i rdzas las sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thog mar oM zhes brjod la
mjug tu grags pa dang / dpal dang / longs spyod dang / dge ba dang / nor la swAhA zhes bya ba sbyar ro/ /yang na bdag gis ji ltar bsam pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas la swAhA zhes
bya zhing bsreg blugs dbul lo/ /de ltar de ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin sreg byas nas byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rim pa de nyid snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /'dir yang sgrub pa pos cho ga spyad
pa ni/ gos ni ser po bgo bar bya/ /gtsang byed ser po gtsang ma thogs/ /sems ni brtan zhing mthu yang che/ /shin tu mi smra ser sna med/ /byang chub sems la rtag tu dga'/ /dus
gsum cho ga thog mar byed/ /nas chan btsos pa'o ma 'thung / /rgyas pa'i las ni brtsam par bya/ /gang gis de ltar rgyas pa yi/ /las ni legs par brtsams pa ni/ /de yis yid la
gang bsams pa'i/ /rgyas pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /ldong ros mig bsku gi wang dang / /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa gos/ /nor gyi char 'bab lham dag

dang / /gdugs dang shing rta bo zhan pa dang / /de bzhin khang pa brtsegs pa dang / /pad+ma bum pa mdung rtse gsum/ /bgrang phreng be con gun+d+he dang / /pi wang mdung thung mda' yang rung / /lhung bzed
dang ni gseg shang dang / /yang na rdzas ni gang 'dod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis
rlob pa las/ rgyas pa'i las kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// //de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg 'di/ /dbang gi las ni rab sgrub pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa yis//
@#/ /brtse bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis gsungs/ /de ni ma lus bshad par bya'i/ /'byor bar 'dod pas nga la nyon/ /thog mar sa gzhi brtag pa ni/ /grong ngam yang
na ljongs dag gi /me yi phyogs su gnas bcas te/ /'gro ba med pa'i khang stong ngam/ /shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod dam/ /yang na bde byed gnas su'am/ /ma mo'i gnas
sam phug kyang rung / /sngags pas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes dgu la/ /dbang gi las ni brtsam par bya/ /gza' ni nyi ma'am mig dmar la/ /sgyu skar rgyal dang
smin drug dang / /mchu dang sa ga dag la ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de la dang por sngags pas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la sa kha dog dmar po la sbyang
ba dang / yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa byas te/ de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bzlas pa'i srad bu le brgan du
btsos pa blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa ni/ gru gsum pa la sgo shar phyogs su gtod pa/ sgo khyud dang / rta babs dang / mu ran gyi cha legs par phye ste/ de nas
tshon rtsi blang ba ni/ /dmar po shin tu bzang po la/ /yi ge 'bar ba gzhag pa ni/ /ra yi yi ge klad dang bcas/ /nyi ma 'char ba 'dra ba ste/ /shin tu gdul dga' rgyal ba'i mchog
de ltar tshon rtsi byin brlabs la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dran byas te/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar ni/ /gru gsum yang na gru lnga'am/ /yang na bdun nam dgu yang rung / /gsang sngags dngos
grub rjes mthun par/ /rnam pa gsum du dbye bar bya/ /lha rnams dgod pa snga ma bzhin/ /mkhas pas rigs kyi bdag pos byas/ /lhag ma rnams ni ci rigs par/ /mkhas pa yis ni dgod
par bya/ /de la nam mkha'i snying pos gnas su skra can dang nye skra can gnyis be con dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni rdo rje lcags kyu mda'i phyag rgyar gzhag
go /spyi bo skyes kyang mda'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /phyi rol tu ni phyag brnyan ma gzhi zhags pa'i phyag rgyar bri'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /byug spos dang me tog la
sogs pa yang dmar po dbul lo/ /me'i thabs khung yang snga ma'i gnas su bya ste/ srid du sor nyi shu'i tshad la/ kha ran sor gnyis pa kha phar blta bar bya'o/ /zabs su mtho chung ngu gang
la dbus su rdo rje sor brgyad pas dmar pos bskus pa bya'o/ /me'i thab khung de ni gru gsum la zur gsum du bya'o/ /de nas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu gtor ma
sbyin no/ /de nas btso blag mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor bya ste/ seng ldeng shing ngam/ a sho ka'am/ shing kA ra bI ra'i me bus la de bzhin du
@#/ /bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te me'i thab khung gi zhabs su me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la yi ger gzhag go /yi ger de yang 'bar
ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsams pa ni/ nyi ma 'char ba 'dra ba/ gdul dka' ba/ mig gsum pa/ thor tshugs can/ dbu skra kham pa/ lag pa
bzhi pa| lag na be con dang / zhags pa dang / bgrang phreng / gun+d+he thogs pa/ gos dmar po gyon zhing srad bu dmar po se ral khar thogs pa/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ me lce
'bar ba dmar po'i 'od 'phro ba de lta bu'i me bsams te bsang gtor byas la mchod yon phul te rang gi gsang sngags kyis byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa sbyin la/ de nas
shing kA ra bI ra'i yam sreg shing yungs mar dang tsan+dan dmar po la myugs pa'i sbyin sreg bdun sbyin no/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha rnams la sreg blugs bdun
phul te snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lha'i gzugs bsams la gzhag ste/ de bzhin du sreg blugs phul la cho ga las byung ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mjug tu'ang byang chub
kyi sems sgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du bya'o/ /cho ga 'di yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bya'o/ /me'i gnas kyang dus gsum du tsan+dan
dmar pos byug cing me tog dmar po'i sil ma dgram mo/ /dpal ldan gos ni dmar po bgos/ /byug spos phreng ba dmar pos brgyan/ /srad bu dmar po'i se ral thogs/ /byang chub
sems kyi bye brag shes/ /zas su sran chung ci tshe za/ /yang na zas su shing tog za/ /dga' zhing 'dzum tshul mi smra thub/ /sems dang sems ni rjes su sbyor/ /rtag tu bzlas dang
sbyin sreg byed/ /lha yi gzugs ni sems pa yi/ /mi yis dbang du bya ba yi/ /dngos grub ma lus brtsam par bya/ /gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su/ /cho ga shes pas las
brtsams na/ /gzi brjid can nam de yi bu/ /zla ba gcig gis dbang du 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg zla ba gnyis byas na/ /phyag brnyan pho mos gnod sbyin ma/ /de bzhin sa 'og bu mo dag /sngags
pas myur du khugs par 'gyur/ /'di ni re zhig mdor bsdus te/ /dbang gi sbyin sreg bsgrags pa yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul
pa'i byin gyis rlob pa las/ dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'o// //da ni drag shul spyod pa yi/ /cho ga ma lus bshad par bya/ /gnod sbyin lto 'phye yi dwags
gtum| |lha min dri za mi'am ci/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed dang / /de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang / /'byung po ma mo srin po dang / /mkha' 'gro dang ni lus srul
@#/ /dang / /mi yang rgyags dregs mthu ldan zhing / /drag po'i las byed sdang ba'ang rung / /de dag gdul phyir sngags shes pas/ /drag shul las ni brtsam par
bya| |nyes pa chung ngu dag la ni/ /drag po'i cho ga mi brtsam mo/ /grong gi lho yi phyogs su ni/ /brtul bas sa gzhi nag po la/ /dur khrod dben pa'am dgon pa'am/ /skyed mos tshal
rnying zhi gnas su/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dam/ /yang na tshes ni bcu bzhi la/ /gza' ni spen pa mig dmar dang / /rgyu skar rlung las byung ba dang / /me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang //
tha skar dang ni de bzhin dbo/ /nab so dang ni sa ri dang / /rgyu skar de dag drag po ste/ /de dag gang yang rung ba la/ /sngags pa khros pa gshin rje'i bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs
pa bri ba ni/ /dgra yi srog ni gcod byed pa'i/ /sngags pa bdag nyid rang gi rgyas/ /rdo rje sems dpar byin brlabs te/ /sngags la 'jigs pa med pa yis/ /sa gzhi snga ma bzhin
du sbyang / /de nas mi g.yo mthu chen gyis/ /yongs su bzung la sogs byas nas/ /rang gi yi ge phyag rgya yis/ /de nas rnam snang mdzad du bya/ /bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba
yi| |srad bu sngon po der blangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor nan tan thig gdab pa/ /gru gsum phyi rol zlum por bya/ /khru bzhi khru lnga khru brgyad dam/ /de bzhin bcu gnyis
bcu drug khru/ /ji ltar las kyi rjes mthun par/ /mkhas pas tshad ni brtag par bya/ /de nas dur khrod thal ba'am/ /mkhas pas tshon rtsi nag po la/ /yi ge ha ni der gzhag la//
me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro/ /dus mtha'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog /kha ni mche ba gtsigs pa la/ /lag na rdo rje cod pan
can| |bdud kyi sde ni thams cad dang / /sdang ba thams cad bsdigs byed pa/ /tshon la mkhas pas tshon de la/ /de 'dra'i yi ge bzhag nas ni/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor
bri| |ba dan mang po'i mtshan mas mtshan/ /rta babs dang ni sgo khyud bcas/ /sgo yi cha ni legs par phye/ /lha yi gtso bor bzhag pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du brtag par bya/ /byang phyogs
sgo ni phye nas su/ /lhag ma'i sgo rnams gcad par bya/ /de la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal ba gshin rje'i gshed gsal shing gi phyag rgyar bri'o/ /
mdzod spu'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje dang dgra sta'i phyag rgyar bri'o/ /mthu chen thob dang / 'phags ma khro gnyer can
dang / 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams su don yod zhags pa dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / rta mgrin rnams zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya
@#/ /rnams su go rim bzhin du gzhag par bya'o/ /gnod mdzes kyi gnas su khro zla gtso bo'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /'phags pa mi
g.yo ba yang be con gyi phyag rgyar gzhag go /sgo drung du ni/ gdul dka' ba dang / mngon du phyogs pa gnyis be con gyi phyag rgyar gzhag go /gnas gtsang ma
ba rnams kyi gnas su gshin rje'i 'chi bdag dang / dus mtshan mo dang lhan cig tu gzhag go /bden bral yang ral gri'i phyag rgyar gzhag go /'khor
sa'i dbus su me'i thab khung sgo la phyogs par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khor khor yug tu ba dan rnams bri'o/ /me'i thab khung ni/ dbang gi
las kyi me'i thab khung bzhin du bya ste/ bye brag tu ni phyi rol gyi mu ran zlum por byas la ba dan mang pos mtshan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
snga ma bzhin du so so'i gzugs bsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas de nas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin
gyis brlabs la phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin du sbyin no/ /de la byug spos la sogs pa'i khyad par ni/ tsan+dan dmar po dang / du ru ska dang
sol ba bsres pa'i byug spos nag por dbul lo/ /me tog ut+pa la mthing ga dang / a ba rA dzi ta mthing ga'am/ gzhan yang me tog sngon po rnams dbul lo/ /bdug
spos ni/ sra rtsi bog bu ram dang sbyar ba dbul lo/ /mar me ni/ yungs kar mar tsha ba snying po sngon po can mar me'i snod nag po'i nang du dbul lo/ /bshos ni /kri sa ra dang / gzhan yang
tsha ba dang / kha ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang / tshod ma kha dog nag po rnams dbul lo/ /sran chan dang / kri sar dang / sha dang / nya sha btsos pa dang / rjen pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar
sbyin no| |gtor ma'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas gdol pa'i khyim mam/ dur khrod nas me blangs te khro bo'i rgyal pos bsang gtor byas la dur khrod kyi shing ngam shing bal ta
ka'am/ ba ru ra'i shing gis me bus la rnam par snang mjed chen por bdag byin gyis brlabs te me'i thab khung gi zhabs su rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams la der yi ge hUM gzhag go /yi
ge hUM de las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsams pa ni/ kha dog nag po shin tu mi bzad pa/ mig gsum pa/ gdong bzhi pa/ mi g.yo ba dud kha'o/ /blta dka' ba kham pa thor
tshugs dud ka can/ char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdangs can/ gsus po che gos sngon po gyon pa/ srad bu sngon po'i se ral khar thogs pa/ kha nas
@#/ /mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas shing kha gdangs pa/ lag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / be con dang / gun+d+he thogs pa/ snying ga na
sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gdong khro gnyer bsnyer ba dang / hUM dang bcas pa 'bar ba nag cing rtsub pa dang / zangs lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba can/
'jigs pa'i dus mngon du byung ba bzhin du 'dug pa de lta bu'i me bsams nas bsang gtor byas te byug spos la sogs pa rang gi rig sngags kyis dbul lo/ /oM ag+ne
ye dzA hi tra tra hUM phaT/ de nas yungs mar tsha ba dang sbyar ba'i kri sa ra'i sreg blugs gsum byin la dug dang / khrag dang / ske tshe'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin no/ /yang na shing
ba la ta ka dang / ba ru ra'i shing gi yam shing rtse mo rnon por gzhogs pa yungs mar tsha ba dang / ske tshes byugs pa sbyin no/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa'i lha
rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams te rdzas de dag nyid las rang gi rig pas sreg blugs dbul lo/ /de nas rang gi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams te bzhag la/ rang gi rig
pa las byung ba'i rdzas ji lta ba bzhin du mdzub mo dang mthe bos bzung ste khro bo dang bcas par gsang sngags zlos shing phaDa dang bcas par ji srid 'dod pa de srid du sreg blugs
dbul lo/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la sogs pas ngal bso bar bya'o/ /sngags pa gang zhig 'di lta bu'i/ /rab tu drag po'i las byed pa/ /de ni sum cu
rtsa gsum gyi/ /gnas kyang rtswa mchog bzhin du sreg /'dir yang cho ga 'di ltar bya'o/ /dpal ldan gos ni sngon po bgos/ /byug spos phreng ba sngon pos brgyan/ /srad bu sngon
po'i se ral thogs/ /byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol/ /tsha dang kha dang bska ba dang / /kri sa ra yi kha zas za/ /lha rnams dgod pa'i don la mkhas/ /gtsang zhing mchog tu
tshul khrims ldan/ /spro ba che zhing dpa' snying can/ /khros pa 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin/ /lho phyogs kha bltas mi smra zhing / /'dug pa'i thabs ni tsog pur 'dug /sbyin
sreg bzlas la rtag tu 'bad/ /srung dang bskyab pa dag la mkhas/ /mtshan mo sbyin sreg byed pa yis/ /drag shul spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ drag shul spyad pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po
@#/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'i rgyu spros pa thams cad dang bral pa/ gsal zhing dag pa/ yid kyis bsgrubs pa/ yongs su
rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang phyug de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba
pa'i bdag po/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba/ gnas med
pa| mtshan nyid med pa/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid las 'das pa/ theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul
la rnam par gnas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rnams kyis ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ston pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la lta ba snying rje chen po byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de bdag la 'dri zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan
'das| 'gro ba la phan par byed pa/ theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ mtshan nyid med cing gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshul gyi
dngos grub stsol ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung bar
byed pa| stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi spyod yul gyi chos bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mdzad pa/ rnam par
rtog pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba/ sems can thams cad la dgongs pa/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba/ bgegs thams cad skrag
par mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs med pa/ sgra med pa/ dri med pa/ ro
@#/ /med pa| reg med pa/ gnas med pa/ yid med pa/ rnam par shes pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spyod yul med pa/ brjod du med pa/ sbros pa med pa/
ma 'dres pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chos gang rgyu las byung ba rnams/ /de'i rgyu'ang de bzhin gshegs pas
gsungs/ /de rnams kyi ni 'gog pa'ang gsungs/ /de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong mchog /gzhan dbang yod pa ma yin zhing / /yongs su grub pa'ang gzhan yin
no| |gnyis po'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /rnam shes brgyad po de nyid mtshan/ /de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de rnams so so'i ye shes mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdzu
'phrul gyi mthus bsam pa tha dad pa dang / blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rjes su mthun par khong du chud nas byang chub
sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das/ legs so legs so zhes gsol nas legs par phul lo/ /gsang sngags tshul la legs gnas pa/ /rdzogs
sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa yis/ /yang dag nyid ni sgom byed do/ /de dag sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnam
par rtog pa las 'das pa'i/ /ma 'dres sems ni nyid kyis kyang / /bzlas pas dngos grub thob 'gyur na/ /chos kyi 'dus byas ci zhig smos/ /rta dang 'dra ba'i sems
de ni| |mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/ /byams dang snying rje brtan byas na/ /dngos grub brtan pa 'phral du 'thob/ /nam zhig chos rnams ma skyes pa/ /de yi sa
bon a yi mchog /rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /oM ni stong pa nyid ces bya/ /yi ge'i phyi mo phyi mo kun/ /de bzhin 'dren pa gnyis dang ldan/ /mi 'gyur
yi ge dang yang ldan/ /de bas bsam par bya ba yin/ /a dang u zhes pa dang ni/ /r-i dang r-I dang oM du ldan/ /a dang ldan pa snang ba'i mchog /'di las thar pa 'thob
ces gsungs/ /ka yi ris dang tsa yi ris/ /Ta yi ris kyang de bzhin gzhan/ /ta yi ris dang pa yi ris/ /ma dang ldan pa lnga pa'o/ /ya ra la wa sha la sogs/ /thams
cad rgyal mchog yongs su rdzogs/ /de dag rgya chen don gyi mchog /rnam pa mang po'i don rnams byed/ /a ni byang chub thob par byed/ /ni ni de bzhin dgug par
@#/ /byed| |u ni gsod pa 'grub par byed/ /ri ni dbang gi las byed pa'o/ /o ni srin po gsod par byed/ /bi ni 'chi ba yin par 'dod/ /oM ni klu
yi snying po yin/ /kun kyang gzhan na ldan na mchog /yi ge mthu can thams cad ni/ /ra dang klad kor bcas gyur cing / /chos kyi dbyings dang rtag ldan par/ /bsam
gtan bzlas byas dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la sems dpa' chen po/ /legs so legs so/ /sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud/ /bde gshegs yang dag mi zad pa/ /de nyid thams cad
khyod kyis bshad/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa yi/ /rab tu gsang ba khyod kyis rtogs/ /zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i
bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dpa' bo chos dbyings rang bzhin ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal ba mchog /'jig rten dpa' bo'i phyag rgya dang / /
mi skye ba yi yi ge yis/ /de bzhin bdag nyid bsams nas su/ /byang chub sems kyis shin tu bsdams/ /stong pa gnyis su med sbyor bas/ /las rnams thams cad
bsgrub par bya/ /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag /sa bon yi ge dang ldan par/ /dad cing bzlas brjod mnyam bzhag pas/ /bsams na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /khrus
dang bshags la sogs pa dang / /rab tu dben la sogs pa dang / /phyag rgya bgrang phreng sems pa yi/ /zlos pa'i dngos grub brtan pa 'thob/ /chos kyi dbyings dang ldan 'gyur
bar| |sngags 'di rnams kyis bsgrubs na ni/ /'gro dang mi 'gro'i khams gsum na/ /'grub par mi 'gyur dngos de med/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rang gi dkyil 'khor la
gnas pa'i bzlas brjod byas la dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba bzhag par bshad do/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa
rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ sgom pa'i yi ge dgod pa dbang bskur ba rim par phye ba'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa sems kyis las 'das pa nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la thabs sna tshogs kyis bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad lags kyi/ yang bshad du gsol/ de la thog mar cho ga 'dis sdig pa so sor bshags
@#/ /par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bdag la
dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid
du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyan sngar so sor bshags so/ /de ltar lan
gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba gzung bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhi ba bla na med pa so sor rang gis rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bzhi'i
byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas bdag gi
lus dbul ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi
snying po la mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dus thams cad du yong ye dbul gyi/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag bzhes su gsol/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la gsang
sngags brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a sa me tri sa ma ye swAhA/ de nas chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab bo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+ha rma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma
kony+haM| de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab bo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dngos po thams cad
dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa'i phyir rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes
@#/ /pa| stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed
pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sems bskyed do/ /de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas gang ba'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i 'khor thams cad du spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i sbrin bsams te rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+hi sma ra ye

snga ra Na hi mAM ga ga na khaM/ d+ha rmA d+hA tu A kA sha sa ma tA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri sho d+ha na maN+DA la/ ma ma pra Ni d+hi pu n+ya dz+nyA na pa le na/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba la na/ d+harma d+hA tu a d+hiSh+ThA
na ba le na tsa swA hA/ gang pa'i phyag rgya ni/ sbyi bor pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ gang ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye
ba'o|| //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyad pa rnam par rol pa bstan nas yang yul bsam gyis mi khyab
pa bstan par bzhed pas dbu'i gtsug nas chos kyi mdzod ces bya ba sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sems thibs po snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ngo //
de nas 'od zer chen po'i dra ba bkod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rgya chen po rnam par rol pas nam mkha'i dbyings rgya chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi pho
brang na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bskor ba byas nas sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang bar byas te/ sems can gyi
khams ma lus pa yongs su bskyabs pa la sbyar nas sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags kyi 'gro bar skyes pa rnams kyang tshim par byas te lha dang mi'i gnas
rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stug po bkod pa'i khongs su gtogs par byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs
pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa rgyu mthun pas byin du brlabs so/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dgos pa ma rdzogs pas snying rje chen
po'i snying po 'byung ba'i mdzod ces bya ba sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su skyob pa'i snying po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa snyed la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
@#/ /bu dag /sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su skyob pa'i snying po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
'khor rgyas pa gang la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung dus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob par gyur cing chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi
khyab pa yang mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba yod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab
dang mnyam pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor
chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa bshad pa de'i dus la bab cing bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab ste legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi
dbang phyug /chos kyi bdag po thar byed pa dang bral ba/ ye shes chen po mnga' ba/ ston pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug gcig pu/ don grub pa/ tshig grub pa/ srid pa'i mtha'
las rgal pa/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/ /'gag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i
mtha' spros pa med brtogs par khong du chud pa/ skyong ba gnas gsum du gyur pa/ gling du gyur pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ zhi bar gyur pa/ grol ba thar pa/ rims nad
med pa| rdul dang bral ba/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ smra ba dang kun tu smra ba med pa/ dngos po thams cad rnam par 'dzin par mdzad pa bshad du gsol/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin
de dag thams cad rtag tu yid la rab tu dga' bar gyur pas mtshan legs par bsgrags pa byas nas rnam par 'dren pa la gsol ba btab bo/ /de dag gis gsol
ba btab pa mkhyen nas dpa' bo chen po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa/ rims nad dang bral bas snying rje chen po'i 'byung pa'i dkyil 'khor yang bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bka'
stsal to| |de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na
rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa'o/ /de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par gnas so/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ nam mkha' la ni/ skye ba'ang ma mchis/ 'gag pa'ang ma mchis so/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang skye ba yang ma mchis/ 'gag pa yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du 'di
ni| sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i
bdag po/ gang gi tshe sbrul pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis brlabs pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /gang na sems can
'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / the tshom gyi bsam pa can/ mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs
par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dka' ba bgyid par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni/ sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskrun par rig par bya'o/ /chos snang ba'i sgo'i tshul gsum las kyang 'byung ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje'i tshul gyi sgo snang ba'i tshul dang / chos zab
mo'i tshul gyi sgo'i snang ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang bkur sti byed pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di gsum dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig /de la re zhig slob dpon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/
@#/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa/ snying rje can/ dad pa che ba/ chos zab mo la gnas pa/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas shing nus pa/ gtsang zhing bag yod pa/ gsang sngags spyad pa dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi las
rnams bslabs pa/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya ba la bla ma las lung thob pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /gang zhig yid gnyis med gyur cing / /sems can
khams ni ma lus pa/ /yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir brtson pa/ /mkhas pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar rigs/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs
rdzogs brtan/ /shes rab rno la dpa' snying can/ /bdag gam slob ma rnams kyi'ang rung / /bgegs ni zhi bar byed par nus/ /yang dag bden pa'i don rtogs la/ /gang
gis mos pa rgya che zhing / /bzod dang ldan la nga rgyal med/ /rlabs po che yi las byed cing / /de ni rlabs po che la dad/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang / /sangs rgyas
rnams kyi smon lam dag /thos nas phyi phyir dga' ba dang / /rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / /gsang sngags spyod la brtson pa dang / /bzlas brjod byed la gang 'bad dang //
gcam sgyu thams cad mi sems la/ /'jig rten chos la mi lta zhing / /sngags la gzhol pa'i sngags pa ni/ /yon tan de la sogs ldan na/ /slob dpon ston pas bkur ba yin//
yang na chos rnams thams cad ni/ /rnam par dben la gang gnas pa/ /der yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par 'os/ /yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyis| |sngags pa'i dam tshig gsum shes pas/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /de la gnas pa'i sngags pa ni/ /yon tan kun dang mi ldan yang / /de la dkyil 'khor 'bri
bar 'os| |de ltar yon tan kun ldan na/ /'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor dang / /'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang / /las kyi cho ga mthong bas bya/ /de la slob dpon la gzhan
gyis bskul na slob ma don du gnyer ba shes shing de la dad par shes na/ de ltar shes na slob dpon des/ /sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya/ /mtsho dang kun dga' skyed mos
tshal| |rdzing bu rnams kyis kun brgyan pa'am/ /'bras bu me tog dang ldan pa'i/ /ljon shing sdong bu de bzhin te/ /grel ba dam pa nyams dga' ba/ /'bras bu me tog ldan pa dang / /
dang mo khrung khrung rma bya dang / /sa ra ne tso sha ri rnams/ /gang gi yul na yod pa yi/ /yul der nan tan bskyed de bsnyen/ /me tog 'bras bu ldan ri dang / /gnas shing yid 'ong
@#/ /chu yi gnas/ /'bab chu'i chu ni zhim pa dang / /chu gling g.yas nas 'khor ba can/ /der ni sngags pa blo ldan gyis/ /dkyil 'khor longs spyod 'phel bar
bri| |yul ni shin tu snum pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang khang pa dang / /lha yi gnas dang phyugs lhas dang / /shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdor yang / /zhi ba'i las la
zhi ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/ /khang pa stong pa'am dur khrod dam/ /snum med rtsub pa'i las can dang / ngan cing gtum la 'jigs pa can/ /de bzhin
thibs po 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /drag por drag po'i las rnams bya/ /zhi bar zhi ba'i las
bya'o| |rgyas par rgyas pa nyid yin te/ /cho ga de ni rgyas pa la'o/ /yang na yid ni gang dag tu/ /nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ /yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yis/ /
las ni legs par bya bar 'os/ /gang gi sems ni rnam dag cing / /the tshom la sogs rnam spangs pa/ /de la las rnams thams cad ni/ /'grub par 'gyur ba dogs
pa med| |rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yi/ /rnam par mi rtog byang chub yin/ /de yang rnam rtog spangs pa yis/ /thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis min/ /de bas rnam pa
thams cad du/ /blo ldan yid gnyis spangs nas su/ /'jig rten kun la phan 'dod pas/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /yul med dus kyang yod ma yin/ /bya ba med
cing byed pa'ang med/ /chos rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /chos nyid 'ba' zhig yod ma yin/ /byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis brgyal bas na/ /stong pa'i
chos ni ma rtogs pas/ /rtag tu bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/ /de ltar ye shes dbang gyur pa/ /ston pa sbros pa med rtogs pas/ /rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/ /mnyam
pa med pa'i chos bshad do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa dang smin mtshams nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo / /byung nas kyang kun tu snang
bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snang bar byas nas kyang gang gi rnam pa dang yon tan gyi mtha' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang rtogs par mi nus pa lha'i sgo
khyud kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par smin pa las gyur pa/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po bkod pa'i rgyan 'di thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam
@#/ /par gyur to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer de dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po
phyag na rdo rje'i sbyi bor mi snang bar gyur to/ /'od zer de dag mi snang bar gyur ma thag tu phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis rlob pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis rlob pa nyon cig /bcom ldan
'das| de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la slar mnyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ de
la ji skad du bsgrags pa'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi tshad khru gang yan chad dpag tshad gcig man chad du bya'o/ /dpag tshad gcig pas lhag par ni/ mi bya'o//
de la sa gzhi mnyam la 'jam/ /byug spos dag gis legs par bskus/ /yang na 'jim pa gtsang ma yis/ /sngags pas nan tan bsku bar bya/ /de nas phur bu
sor brgyad pa la las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du btab ste gra bzhir mnyam par btab na/ dkyil 'khor kun tu cis kyang mi tshugs par
byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM haM ko Ta ya sa me ma hA tsaN+Da li hUM phaT/ de nas sta gon du gnas pa byas la phyi de nyin dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad
rnams bsags la las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ 'phags pa mo g.yo bas srung ba byas te dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su gzhag go /yang na bdag gis
byin gyis brlabs la gzhag go /de nas phyi de nyin slob ma dad pa che ba/ gtsang sbra che ba/ chos la 'bad pa/ cho rigs btsun pa/ mos pa rgya che ba/ gcig gam gnyis sam gsum
mam| ji snyed 'dod pa rnams gzung ngo / /las thams cad byed pa'am/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'am/ mi bzod pa'i gsang sngags kyis bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa'am skud pa
gzhan la btab pa dang / yang na rtsa ku sha la mdud pa gsum bor pa yang rung ste/ de nas sngags kyis bsngags pa ni/ /brgya 'am yang na lhag kyang rung / /slob ma rnams kyis las
'grub phyir/ /dbung ba g.yon la bcing bar bya/ /u dum ba ra'i so shing ni/ /me tog dri la sogs pas bskus/ /shin tu bzang pos srung ba bya/ /sor brgyad pa la rtse gcig gshibs//
@#/ /dge ba yid du 'ong ba dag /de nas mkhas pas sbyin par bya/ /shar ram byang du kha bltas te/ /so shing dag ni bca' bar bya/ /de nas blo ldan mi ltos shing / /
dpyad pa med par dor bar bya/ /gang du ltung bar gyur pa las/ /de bzhin der ni grub par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /mdo sde'i chos ni mnyan du gzhug /slob
ma skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi gtam ni bzang po bya/ /gal te rmi lam bzang po'am/ /ngan pa dag ni mthong gyur na/ /bdag gi skal pa brtag pa'i phyir/ /bla ma la ni de dag
bsnyad| |mchod rten kun dga' gtsug lag khang / /glegs bam dang ni lha rnams dang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gos/ /yang na me tog 'bras bu rnyed/ /ral gri 'khor lo bi
wang dang / /grub pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs rnams/ /gang gis rmi lam thob gyur na/ /de yis dngos grub yid bzhin 'gyur/ /nyi zla me dang tshod dag gam/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho rgal
ba dang / /glang po che dang rta yang rung / /de ni dngos grub thob mi dka'/ /de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni/ /bzang pos dngos grub dam pa brtag /rmi lam ngan pa mi bzad pa/ /'jigs
pa mthong na mi 'grub bo/ /bong bu rnga mo khyi dang bya/ /stag dang byi la wa rnams dang / /mi ni 'bru mar lus bskus dang / /gcer bu rtsub la mi sdug pa/ /de la sogs pa'i rmi ngan
rnams| |blo dang ldan pas spang bar bya/ /yang na dngos rnams rmi lam dang / /dri za'i grong khyer bzhin shes nas/ /blo dang ldan pas rmi lam rnams/ /snying po med par bshad par bya/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams
'di lta bu'i chos rnams la dang po nas blo brtan par 'gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni/ gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu
de dag ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das par mthong zhing so so'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang phyin ci log tu shes nas mtshan
nyid dang bral ba zhig tu shes te/ de bas na de dag chos thams cad la blo brtan zhing nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab
ba rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa nyon
cig /de la dang por slob dpon gyis gtsang sbra byas te bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas la dkyil 'khor gyi sa la rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /thams cad la phyag byas te chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang dran par byas te mtha' yas pa/ rgya che ba/ rab 'byams bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs
la blta'o/ /bltas nas kyang bdag rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la/ tshon sna lnga yi srad bu'am/ /yang na mkhas bas blos kyang rung / /lha yi gnas rnams nges pa ni/ /
shes rab can gyis rnam par dbye/ /kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la/ /sgo bzhi rta babs dang yang bcas/ /sgo khyud rab 'byams rgya che ldan/ /rnam par dag pa sems kyis bris/ /rin
chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na sA lu'i phye ma'ang rung / /yang na spos sam thal bas kyang / /dkyil 'khor sngags pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /nub kyi sgo ni
dbye bar bya/ /de nas rig sngags rgyal mo ni/ /mi bzad srung ba chen mo 'am/ /yang na mi g.yo dran par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran byas nas/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs
su 'gro/ /de nas srad bu bres nas su/ /bskor ba byas te slar log na/ /de nas blo dang ldan pa ni/ /byang dang nub kyi phyogs su 'gro/ /der yang shar du kha bltas nas/ /shar
gyi phyogs su srad bu bres/ /de ltar srad bu'i tshul shes pas/ /rtag par thog ma nyid du bya/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /mgon po ngan song kun spong dang / /mi mchog
'od dpag med pa dang / /de bzhin sgrib pa kun sel dang / /thub pa me tog kun rgyas dang / /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / /thub chen bdud las rgyal ba dang / /de bzhin mi 'khrugs
zhes bya dang / /sangs rgyas rnga yi sgra dbyangs can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas/ /der yang dka' thub can gyis ni/ /nan tan bskyed de cha gsum brtag /de ltar las la mkhas
pa yis| |sa ni legs par brtags nas su/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yang bklag /yang na zab mo'i mdo sde gzhan/ /sa rnams gtan la 'bebs
pa bklag /bklags nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ /kun tu bdug spos bskor nas su/ /rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams dang / /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs sam/ /phyag
rgya mkhas pas bri bar bya/ /yang na gzhan ni gang yang rung / /de dag thams cad bri bar bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sbyor ba gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams tshegs chung ngus
sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yod do/ /de skad ces bka'
@#/ /stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgrub pa'i tshig gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams cho ga thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par bgyid
ba'i sgrub pa'i tshig de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya chen po byin gyi rlabs sgrub
pa'i gzhi rgya chen pos byin du brlabs nas sbyor ba bzang po bshad do/ /gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ /de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dpag tshad gcig tsam
bri bar bya ste/ gnas tsan+dan bzang po sbrul gyi snying po dam pa las byas pa'i khang pa dril bu dang rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ lha'i a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdugs
pa| dzam+bu nA da'i gser gyi srad bus bskor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas steng brgyan pa/ rnga sgra snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grags pa/ phyogs bzhin rta
babs bzang po mu tig gi phreng ba btags pa/ tshon sna tshogs kyi ras bting ba/ bkod pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyis kyang rnam par
gsal bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa'i nang na 'dug bzhin du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'am/ de'i rnam pa la dmigs par byin gyis
brlabs la/ de'i chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang byang
chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhug go /de nas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig bstan par bya'o/ /de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni/ 'di
rnams yin no/ /shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa pad+ma'i steng na 'dug par bri'o/ /de'i gsang sngags ni/ 'di'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a
sarba tra Na ki swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bri'o/ /de'i gsang

sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta a mr-i te dz+wa la swAhA/ de'i 'og tu kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya ral gri dang gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu bri'o/ /gsang sngags ni/
na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA bo d+hi satwA nAM/ badzra rA dza mA la swAhA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon logs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya lhung bzed dang chos gos bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su nam mkha'i spyan gyi phyag rgya spyan gyi gtsug tor 'dra ba
pad+ma'i steng na 'dug par bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og logs su rdo rje mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ut+pa la'i steng du rdo rje bzhag pa bri'o/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i
byang phyogs su byams pa'i phyag rgya gun+d+he bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya pad+ma bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi byang phyogs su
mtha' yas par 'phro ba rgya chen po mi g.yo ba rgyal po'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lho phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya bri'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi
dkyil 'khor cha gsum du byas pa la 'khor sa'i snam bu bor te shar phyogs su pho nya'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bri'o/ /de dag gi shar lho'i mtshams su pho nya mo thams
cad kyi phyag rgya bri ste/ pho nya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ lcags kyu'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ zhags pa'o/ /lho dang byang gi ngos gnyis su bran pho dang / bran mo rnams kyi
phyag rgya bri ste/ de la bran pho rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ ral gri'o/ /bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ khang+ga ri dang rdo rje'i khab bri'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bklag go /bklags nas langs la dkyil 'khor bskor bar byas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag kyang byas la slob ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gtsang
sbra can| yi dam la brtan pa/ sdom pa bzung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje che ba/ gdong ras kyis g.yogs pa lag pa mi gtong ba de la
sems rtse gcig tu dmigs pa rnams dkyil 'khor bskor bar byas te dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khar 'greng la gang ba'i phyag rgya'am/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am/ dam
tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te dam tshig brjod la dkyil 'khor du gzud do/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug go /me tog gar babs pa de'i lha yin no/ /de ltar dam tshig brtan
bar byas te slob dpon la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed do/ /slob dpon gyis kyang bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas sems kyi rgyud rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la bltas nas
gsang sngags spyad pa la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga sbyin no/ /de ltar byas na/ dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa 'dir dam tshig mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung ste dam tshig tu zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs shing
@#/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su bskyab pa yid la byed
pa des gsang sngags spyad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis gzigs nas zhal cung zad 'dzum zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i
so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa bstan par bzhed pas gtsug tor chen po'i dkyil nas srid pa'i
rgya mtsho thams cad las bsgral bar yi dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa chen po mdzad do/ /thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya
ba'i 'od zer byung ngo / /'od zer de byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni/ snang bar byas/ chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i yul ni/ bstan/ sems
can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la ni/ bltas/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa ni/ dmigs par byas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa'i chos mnyam
pa nyid rnam par bstan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par rol pa'i sogs rnam par rol nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon
par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las mngon par grub pa/ mos pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnam pa bcus rab tu brgyan nas nam
mkha'i ngos la bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs bsham par byas te gnas par gyur to/ /'od zer chen po de dag de ltar gnas par gyur ma thag tu gsang ba pa'i
bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i sems la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par bkod pa snang ba sngon ma
byung ba 'di dag bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nam mkha'i ngos ni/ khebs par byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa chen po rnams ni/ bstan nas de bzhin gshegs
pa'i zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /de bas na nges par deng bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i nub rnam par dag pas mnyam
@#/ /pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed do/ /de'i phyir bcom
ldan 'das la bdag zhu'o snyam mo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
bdag rtag tu zham 'bring na mchis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar bzhad pa chen po sngar mdzad nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil nas 'od zer ngo mtshar du gyur
pa bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed byung nas 'od zer de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mthas klas
pa snang bar bgyis pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de la bdag nyid 'di snyam du gyur te/ deng bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul sgrub
pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bzhed pa ni/ bdag cag gis
rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ bdag lag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par
dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad na/ de ni/ dus slad ma'i 'gro ba rnams la snang
ba bgyis par 'gyur te legs kyi/ bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ legs so legs so/ /khyod don 'di 'dri bar sems pa de yang legs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs
shig dang ngas khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i
gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol
nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ stong pa nyid kyi
@#/ /gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o/ /mtshan nyid
med pa'i gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o/ /de ltar mngon par byang
chub pa'i gzhi 'di dag byang chub sems dpas bsgom par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la
'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings
rgya chen po rab 'byams mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs nas nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i rgyal po rnam par smin pa nam mkha' ltar rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul snang ba yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab 'byams
ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po dbu'i gtsug nas byung ngo / /byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rjes su mthun par bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
mjad la bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa bcur snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas te steng gi nam mkha' la gnas nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyis snang
bas 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa snang bar byas nas sems can gyi khams rnams la dam tshig chen po gsum gyi myu gu skye bar byin gyis brlabs te 'od zer
de dag nam mkha' la lhags nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ngo / /'od zer de dag phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin chen po thob par gyur te/ de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnyis su med par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i
bdag po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dga' bas snying tshim par gyur nas mig gnyis mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yud tsam zhig
bltas te bzhin cung zad 'dzum zhing bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis zhus pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags/ /ji ltar rgyal ba dam pa lags/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
lags| |ji ltar sangs rgyas zhes kyang bgyi/ /mgon po bdag gi the tshom 'di/ /thub pa chen pos bsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /the tshom yid
@#/ /gnyis spangs nas su/ /spyad pa'i rgyal po theg chen la/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni spyod par 'gyur/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang
ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ khyod don 'di lta bu 'dri ba de legs so legs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos kyi
tshul sgrub pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ dkon no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni/
sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas
na| byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas thog ma nyid du theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tshegs chung ngus gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub
par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas
khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid gcig /gnas ni rnam pa bcus rtogs pa/ /de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya/ /'du shes tsam yang spangs gyur
cing / /rang bzhin nyid kyang bstan du med/ /ye shes kyis ni rang rig pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs/ /byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
gang zhig de ni rtogs 'dod pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sa bcu yongs su rdzogs byas nas/ /dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud/ /chos rnams stong pa sgyu ma bzhin/ /gang
gis 'dir ni kun rtogs shing / /'jig rten gyi ni rgyud shes pa/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas skabs rnam
par gzhag pa ni/ de dag yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi sems rnam par gzhag pa sgrub pa ni/ med par
@#/ /rig par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par
bshad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu de dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na
'khor ba'i tshe ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am/ bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa'am/ mi khom par skye ba'i 'jigs pa ma mchis par bdag smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa la gnas pa ni/ 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mi gtong zhing sems can
yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang ston to/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas
yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba chen po snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang
po la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i
bdag po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o/ /de yang re zhig slob dpon dam tshig gsum
rnam par dbye ba la mkhas shing bdag kyang dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la dam tshig gsum po de gang zhe na/ chos kyi khyad par gsum ste/ chos
kyi khyad par gad ba dus gsum du gtogs pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa de ni/ dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /chos kyi khyad par de yang
gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sems ni/ chos kyi khyad par ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa
de ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'o/ /'di la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /gang lus
dang ngag dang yid 'jug pa de ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ dam tshig gsum yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang
@#/ /ma rtogs na/ mu stegs can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byis pa mi shes
pas bsgrings pa/ /tshul 'di shes par ma gyur rnams/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol bar byed/ /'di na gnas par yongs ma rtogs/ /'jig rten khams gzhan gang nas
kyang / /sangs rgyas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du ma bstan to/ /de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas/ /rtag tu yid gnyis
spangs nas ni/ /sems kyi khyad par rnam gsum brtag /de nas dam tshig gsum shes 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas
gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la slob dpon dam tshig gsum shes par bya ba la mkhas pas bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings
su mos par byas la de la dmigs pa'i spyod pas sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ltar des sa gzhi rnams sbyangs nas nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu la yang dag par
gzhol bas bdag ni/ chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi yul yin no snyam du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de ltar bdag nyid byin
gyis brlabs la chos kyi dbyings rnam par ngag pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi lus dkyil 'khor yin pa'am dkyil 'khor bdag gi lus yin par byin gyis
brlabs te/ rang gi sems kyis byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i phye ma dang / gzhan yang rung ste cho ga snga mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de nas sems can
sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gsang ba'i snying po'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyi rlabs
pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus thob
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams
la gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa'i gzhi gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par dka' ba yang bsod nams ma byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha rol gyi rgyud la yang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ba chos kyi
@#/ /dbyings kyi byin gyi brlab kyi gzhi nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i khyu mchog /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa rnams
kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di 'dra
ba'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i bskal par yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang bzod par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta
bas na/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ legs lags kyi/ bdag
cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab kyi gzhi de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag
po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /chos
kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang dag ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
ba spyod pa na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bsgoms shing lan mang du byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlab kyi gzhi yin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas
na| de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ de yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa na yang 'di dag sems sems
pa las rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thob par gyur to/ /sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo dang /
bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas med pa/ nam mkha' spyod yul/ mtshan nyid med pa/ 'gro ba po med pa/ byed pa po dang tshor ba po
med pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa yang thob par gyur to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo mtha' yas shing rab 'byams rgya

che ba bstan par bya ba de dag gang zhe na/ na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM bud+d+hA ga te pa tiSh+Thi te b+h+yo/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/ ma hA kr-i de b+h+yaH/ ga ga na a ma la rU pa d+hA ra Ni ta thA rU pa bi b+ha ba bi
@#/ /b+ha rje na| pa ra rU pa d+ha re ma hA kr-i pe bi ma le/ sarba ga te bi sho d+ha ni/ de la 'di ni/ rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /a ma hA bisma ye hUM khaM/ phyag na
rdo rje| 'di ni/ nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlob pa/ sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di mi 'chad cing mi brjod pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing de ngas ma mthong ngo / /gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas rgyal po 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams
gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ji ltar ston/ chos thams cad la thob pa'i bar du ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po
phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas slob
dpon la dbang nod par bya'o/ /'di snyam du slob dpon 'di ni/ bdag gi ston pa ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub la bskul ba'o/ /de nas
thal mo sbyar te nye bar song la gsol ba gdab bo/ /slob dpon gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar shes nas snying rje chen po mngon du byas te tshig 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| longs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bla na med pa de khyod la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi yid du 'ong ba brtags la cho ga snga mas sa gzhi sbyangs te dkyil 'khor
gru bzhi pa sgo gcig pa/ lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas legs par brtags pa/ mchod pa'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bkod pa bsgrubs pa/ spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum
pa dbus su bzhag pa bris la slob ma pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa/ rang gi lha'i gzugs bdag yin par dmigs pa la gnas pa/ yid byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa/ 'gro ba
mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ /'di skad du rigs kyi bu
@#/ /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan phye'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag bo/ de la byang chub sems
dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi lha'i gzugs ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji snyed pa'am sems dpa' mtha' yas pa
thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag kyang rung ste gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa las 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang sngags
dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yang ci lta bu yin zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la dbang bskur ba'i tshe slob dpon gyis pad+ma'i phyag rgyas gang na bkra zhing brtan pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa/ yongs su brtag pa ni/ gser ram/ zangs sam/ 'jim pa las byas pa'am/ ri mor bris pa bzhag ste bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'dug pa
la chos thams cad la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /slob dpon bdag nyid kyang ji ltar rjes su mthun
par mos par bya ba'am/ de'i phyag rgyas rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba bya'o/ /chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i
dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba mtha' dag gzhom par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags
kyis ni| mi shes pa'i grong khyer gzhig par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni/ gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba byin gyis brlab
par bya'o/ /mdzod spu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni/ /mdzod spu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis
ni| yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la 'khrig ma nas brkyang ste sor mo
thams cad go mnyam par brkyang ngo / /phyag rgya 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gdan yin te/ dam pa mthu chen po'o/ /gsang sngags 'di ni/ ngo mtshar che ba

thams cad kyi sgo ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga nA ma la pra b+hA badzra b+h+yed t+ya nA ma hA kr-i pAt+ma ka/ de la 'di dag ni/ rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa'o/ /a ti basmi ya mahA kr-i pAt+ma
@#/ /dzaHhUM/ lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la sor mo rnams phan tshun blas pa'i tshul du bsnol te g.yon pa'i mthe bong rgyab tu ldog la g.yas pa'i mthe
bos sen mo la sbyar ro/ /rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ /tsho kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrags/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ /'khor lo dam pa 'di bskor ro/ /na maH

sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ta thA gta ta a mr-i te bi dza ya wa r+Na sarba dza ya ga tha d+ha ra tha kA ri ma hA kr-i be hUM haM tra haM ma hA da b+hu te hUM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bcug
la mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtsa ba dkris te lhag ma rnams ni bzhag la bsgreng ngo / /'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya sems can thams cad kyi/ /don rnams rtag tu

myur byed 'di/ /chos kyi dung zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ t+r+yad d+h+wa b+ha ga wa ti pra tiSh+Thi te/ a nan+ta ru sa ra bi nir g+ho ShaM/ sarba ta thA ga tA bAka pra sa ra bisma ya ka
d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra ma Sha ka sarba satwa san+to shA nA rA ma hA ma hA hUM/ gang ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bo'i sen mo'i steng du ral gri'i tshul du
gzung ngo / /phyag rgya rab tu mthu chen 'di/ /ral gri'i phyag rgyar rnam par grags/ /sems can kun gyi 'jig tshogs lta/ /lhan cig skyes pa'ang gcod pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta

bud+d+hA nAM/ a ma hA khang+ga pra dz+nyA te dzi ta sa da kA ya dr-iSh+Ti ts+tshin+da na kA ra/ ta thA ga ta a d+hi muk+ti ni ra dza ta bi d+hu ta saM kalpa ma hA ma hA hUM dzaH/ phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol du brkyang
