ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzung la rdo rje lta bur byas te mthe bong dang srin lag dang mthe chung rnams nang du gzhug go /sangs rgyas
'jig rten mgon po yis/ /phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags pa 'di/ /mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa yi/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar rnam par grags/ /de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/

ma hA bisma ya te dzod b+ha ba ma hA tsaN+Da dur da na tA tra b+hany+dza tA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi ngos su gtsug tor lta bur gzud do/ /'di ni gtsug tor phyag
rgya ste| |'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yin/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pa/ /de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur/ /de yi gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba b+ha tra a pra ti ha ta b+ha

ba ti d+harmA hA pa laM nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta no du d+ha R+ya b+ha sha ya/ ma hA bud+d+hA sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te spu ra mahA ma hoSh+NI Sha swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su
gzud do/ /rgya 'di rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi/ /mdzod spur rtag tu rnam par bsgrags/ /de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man+to bud+d+hA nAM/ a shi khen du ba ma pra b+ha sarba satwa kA+e sha san+ta pa
@#/ /bra shA ma na ga ra ma hA ti d+hA ra/ sarba ta thA gta ta a laM ka ra ma hA pu ru Sha rU pa d+ha ra ka ko ti ga ta swAhA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang
sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la nye bar gnas pa de gang yin pa de dag ni/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag yin no/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams
ni| yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs pa dang 'dra ba'i lus rnams kyis sems can gyi khams rnams sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i
lus rnams ston to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang ba'i
snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sdom pa gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sams dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid
bsdams shing spyod par 'gyur pa'i sdom pa dang / byang chub kyi sems yod do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la sdom pa gang zhe na/ bsdam pa ni/ sdom pa ste/ lus dang / ngag dang /
yid rnams bsdus shing yongs su bsdus pa phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal sel bar 'gyur ba de ni/ sdom pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sdom pa ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drang pa byas
la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags te dkyil 'khor la phyogs te der 'dug la slob ma rnams la bos te dI skad du/ bu dus gsum du sgrib pa med par
gnas pa dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa nos shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /des kyang thal mo sbyar bus mo btsugs te 'di skad du/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming
'di zhes bgyi ba de dag gi dus 'di nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du slob dpon gyis bdag la dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa bdag la stsal du
gsol| ston pa'i bka' spyi bos nod par 'tshal lo/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dgongs shig /bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs
@#/ /pa'i byang chub 'dod pa khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sdom pa yin te/ sdom pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni/ tshul khrims bla na med pa la rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ gsang
sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i sgo 'di la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /
gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems gang dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub kyi sems de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba pa'i bdag
po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la byang chub gang zhe na/ byang chub ni/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /nam mkha' la yang gzugs med/
bstan du med/ gzung du med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin no/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ sems dang nam mkha' dang
byang chub 'di dag ni/ gnyis su med do/ /de la chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub yin no/ /de la mi skye ba'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi gzhi lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dngos po thams cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa stong pa sgyu
ma lta bur mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni/ chos la dmigs pas so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub
@#/ /sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas 'di ltar dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par
spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la dngos po
thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ skye ba'i shad las skyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/ phung po dang / khams
dang / skye mched tsam du zad do/ /zhes 'jig rten pa'i lam yongs su spangs par bstan pa yin no/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam
par spangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi lam mngon par rtogs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rnam par
gzhag pa yin no/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi sems
thog ma nas ma skyes par mthong zhing stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa mtshan nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di lta bas na/ byang
chub sems dpa' gnas med pa sgrib pa med pa spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems bskyed bar bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar theg pa chen po la
yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub la phan 'dogs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa du mar 'bad cing brtsal te gtang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi tshe 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ tshe zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la
'du shes su bya bar zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'du shes de yang chos thams cad gyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i sngon rol nyid du 'gags
pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor dang phyag
@#/ /rgya'i dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lnga ni/ rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ ser sna dang / sems can la
gnod pa dang / the tshom dang / le lo dang / gsang sngags la sogs pa la ma gus pa ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos 'di lnga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis rgyang ring du spang par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos 'di rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de
la byang chub kyi spyad pa cung zad kyang yongs su rdzogs par nga mi smra'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang
chub kyi sems kyi bar du gcod pa chen po'o/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang gsang ba'i snying po 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ci zhig 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bkar stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni/ rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad ma mchis pas de'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni/ rtogs par
nus kyang srid kyi/ gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams
de'i tshad ni/ rtogs par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ba'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor
zhes bya ba ni/ snying po gtso bo thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste/ de'i gong na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/ gnas su gyur
pa| skyabs su gyur pa'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de bas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor
dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur/ gang dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur gyis yongs su gang ba la yang rkang pa gnyis kyis 'bogs te 'gro bar bya'o//
byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
@#/ /'du shes dang / pha'i 'du shes dang / ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang la brten nas sems can dmyal ba rgyun chad par
'gyur zhing dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i phung po med par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la ji ltar lan ldon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gnas pa med pa'i spyod yul can du rig par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ngas khyod la bsgo bar bya'o/ /shes
par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi blun bo dmigs pa can la lta ba/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba/ mngon par zhen pa/ blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ bdag gi sems kyi gnas
gtan la ma phebs pa rnams rnam par 'khrul nas 'di skad du 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni/ rang bzo can gyis rang bzor byas pa yin no/ /
zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ mi blun po de dag ni/ 'gro ba gnyis su 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de dag la ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod par nga mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni/ rtsa ba chad par byed pa la
zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa/ bdud kyis zil gyis non pa/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can/ theg pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa/ nyan
thos kyi theg pa la snying por 'du shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson par gyur pa de dag la
tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ga la yod ces smra bar 'gyur te/ mi blun po de dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen
pa des sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di dag thams cad gsungs so/ /de dag la lta ba'i sems bskyed pas sdug bsngal gyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na| de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dzin pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i
@#/ /phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi/ rigs kyi bu de rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab par gyis shig /gnod
pa las bzlog par gyis shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed pa de dag gis mgrin gcig
tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rjes ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag nam byang
chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ci nas kyang ston pa'i
bstan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya dka' ba brgya stong du mar bsgrubs pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/ de
bas na khyed thams cad kyis nan tan bskyed la de dag srung bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dis ni/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /zhes bya bar
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung ba'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs bcu 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur
ro| |de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba ba'i phyir bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i
dang | sba pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag gis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par
'gyur ba dang / 'jig par mi 'gyur ba bya ba 'di ni/ nges par bya dgos so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gzigs nas
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir thugs rje chen po thog mar byas nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs so/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta

nAM| sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA ga ti ga te/ e ka d+harmA sam+b+ha sarba sa ra Ni bi tsi tra rU pa d+ha ra Ni/ sar+b+ba sa ta tra a b+hi pra ya ba ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi sa ta tra ga tA ma na se/ tra hi maM sar+b+ba d+harma

sa ma| ma hA ma hI bai ro tsa na gar+b+ha saM bud+d+hA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te tra hi te b+ha ga wa ti hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis snying rje chen po mngon du byas te 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma smras pa/ dang po slob dpon gtsang sbra byas te chos kyi
dbyings su gyur pa'i yid kyis bdag rnam par snang mdzad du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis bsgyur te dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /sngags pa gsang sngags cho ga la/ /rtag par cho ga snga ma
yis| |phye ma dkar po blangs nas su/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /rtag tu mi g.yo dran byas te/ /dang por tshon rtsi dgye bar bya/ /de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni/ /dmar por blangs nas
dgye bar bya/ /tshon rtsi gsum pa ser po yang / /shin tu nges par dgye bar bya/ /de nas margad 'dra bar dgye/ /de nas in+da rnyil 'dra dgye/ /gang gis kha dog ci 'drar gsungs/ /de yi dkyil 'khor
de nyid do/ /lha yi kha dog de bzhin te/ /zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod pa/ /de yi gsang sngags de nyid 'dod/ /de ni gsang ba bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gang / /de
dag dbang chen yin par bsngags/ /phyag na pad+ma'i chu yi yin/ /rdo rje can gyi rlung gi yin/ /pho nya la sogs bran rnams dang / /khro bo'i ming du gang gtogs pa/ /kun tu thogs med gang
gtogs pa/ /kun tu thogs med spyod pa rnams/ /kun gyi dkyil 'khor me dang rlung / /yang na 'di dag thams cad kyang / /nus pa'i mthu ni kun dang ldan/ /stong pa nyid kyi bdud rtsi ngoms//
snying rje mig gi dri ma med/ /byams pa'i go cha legs par bgos/ /dga' ba dri ma med rtsal bral/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi/ /sems can 'den par rab tu brtson/ /'khor ba
na yang mi gnas shing / /mya ngan 'das pa'ang gnas ma yin/ /yang dag mtha' la nges byas shing / /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas nas tshig smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa sdig bral ba/ /ston pa bcom par ldan pa 'dis/ /bgegs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas/
gtan la bab par bshad gyur pa/ /grogs po kun gyis mnyan par gyis/ /bgegs ni rnam pa du ma ste/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin mi/ /de la bgegs ni rnam gnyis te/ /phyi dang nang
gi spyod yul lo/ /glo lud dbugs brnang rims dang skyug /skya rbab nad dang yi ga 'chus/ /de la sogs pa'i rims nad ni/ /grang rlung tsha ba la sogs las/ /mi bzad ngo bo can 'byung
ba| |nang gi yin par shes par bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni bgegs chen rnams/ /mi dang de bzhin mi min te/ /ye shes tsher ma de dag ni/ /spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten gzhig
pa'i phyir 'byung ste/ /dka' thub gnas na rmongs par byed/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /de rnams slar ni bzlog par bya/ /tsha bar gyur nas 'ong ba'i bgegs/ /bsil bas nye bar
@#/ /zhi bar bya/ /shes rab can gyis gnyen po yis/ /de dag so sor gso bar bya/ /yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la/ /sngags pas nges par mtshams bcad
la| |bgegs rnams kun la ye shes ni/ /zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu bshad/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
pa theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang ba mchog gi rim par phye ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis rlob pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra po d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa| rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra
pA Ni tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa rdo
rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje sde dang / rdo rje kun tu 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu 'dul byed dang / rdo rje mi bzang
'joms dang / rdo rje gdug pa kun 'dul dang / rdo rje dbyings las rgyal ba dang / rdo rje dgyes gnas skyob la sogs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag snyed rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje thugs kar lan gsum gsor te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal
te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'byung po kun 'dul bar byed cing sa 'og gi
gdug pa can 'dul bar byed pa'i rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po bshad du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bshad du gsol/ khyab bdag chen po bshad du gsol/ gdug
pa kun 'dul bar byed ba bshad du gsol/ mun pa kun 'joms pa chen po bshad du gsol zhes phyag na rdo rje gsol ba btab bo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po gsang ba pa khyod sems can rnams kyi don du rdo rje kun 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang la zhu ba legs so/ /gsang ba'i bdag
po legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje'i rigs rnams khyod rjes su nyon la yid la zungs shig /ngas rnam par phye ste rdo rje sa 'og 'byung po
@#/ /'dul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad kyi/ rjes su zungs shig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sa 'og
gi gdon dang 'byung po kun 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom
ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo gdug pa kun 'dul bar byed ba du ma spros te sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum gang bar mdzad de/ sa 'og gi klu rnams
kyi gnas rnams gdug pa'i hUM sgras kun tu gang bar byas nas klu'i rgyal po brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa btul te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkug go /de nas klu'i rgyal
po mtha' yas gdug pa'i sems langs te dbugs shin tu tsha bar gtong bar sems pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la byin gyis
brlabs nas klu thams cad kyi zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM nI lAM badzra kro d+ha nA ga hUM phaT/ ces bzlas so/ /de nas klu mtha' yas sems
rab tu zhi ste byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur pas klu thams cad sems rab tu zhi'o/ /de nas mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klu rgyal sa 'og na bzhugs pa rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyi ma'i dus na slad ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sa 'og gi gdon rnams kyis bar du mi gcod
cing / de dag gi gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams dang / bdag cag gi 'khor rnams kyis sems can chen po de la bar du gcod
par mi nus pa bshad du gsol/ bdag cag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos klu'i
rgyal po chen po rnams la cung zad spyan gyis gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po dag legs so/ /zhu ba'i dus la bab bo/ /ngas sems can rnams kyi don du rab tu phye ste
bshad kyi/ nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di
bshad de| hUM| sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen ston pa des/ /nyid kyi 'khor la rab gzigs te/ /'od zer kun tu rab bkye nas/ /gdon rnams brlag byed thabs
gsungs pa/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga la/ /rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /phyag na rdo rje rab khros pa/ /gzhon tshul 'gying ba rab bsams la//
@#/ /rin chen snod dam kham phor du/ /gser la sogs pa'i rin chen bdun/ /dag par bsgrubs te rab bcug nas/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te//
dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pas/ /'byung po de la gtor byin te/ /gang gnas rten sar rab sbas la/ /'byung po klu gdug zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe zhi bas ma phan na/ /de tshe
gdug pa'i mtshon cha rnams/ /rang gi khang par rab tu 'bar/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po ste/ /de tshe sngon gyi sems dran pas/ /zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas 'dir
bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/ rtag tu byang chub sems thob cing / /dam tshig sdom pa kun ldan pa/ /khrus kyi las rnams kun bya ste/ /rnam par dag pa'i sa
gzhi la| |dkyil 'khor ji ltar mdzes par bya/ /hUM yig las byung lcags kyu yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /skad cig mdun bsams mchod sogs bya//
oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom/ /nam mkha'i khams su a dang ni/ /zla ba dang po yi ge hUM/ /'od zer kun tu 'bar bar bsgom/ /
'gro dug nyon mongs kun sbyangs te/ /rnam grol sa la des bkod nas/ /'od bsdus hUM gi rnam par bsam/ /de nyid rdo rje rtse lnga can/ /'od zer phreng ba 'phro bar bsam/ /de yi 'od
kyis sems can rnams/ /rdo rje'i ngo bo thim par bya/ /de las khro bo chen po'i sku/ /sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /g.yon brkyang na tshod bcu drug 'chang / /mtha' yas la sogs
brgyad kyis brgyan/ /sku mdog nag po'i gzugs can de/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams/ /na bza' sngon po'i zer 'jol can/ /spyan gsum dmar mdzes gyen du 'jil/ /
ral pa gyen brdzes rdo rje yi/ /dbu rgyan can du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes khro bo che/ /spyan drangs dzaHhUM baM hos gzhug /mgo dang lkog ma snying ga ru/ /oM AHhUM gi rnam pa yi/ /yi
ge bcu gsum sngags kyis brgyan/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje bsam/ /mi bskyod rdo rjes dbang bskur te/ /kun 'joms rnam par dag par bsam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i
rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad pa gsungs pa/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT rab tu brjod par bya'o/ /sngags kyi phreng ba de dag kyang / /zhi la rab dkar dbang la dmar/ /rgyas
la ser po drag la nag /rtog pa kun tu spangs te bzla/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag gis/ /ji ltar mos pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /mi mos rnal 'byor rab tu spang / /phyag na rdo rje khro rgyal gyis//
dag kun rten pa'i yid 'di la/ /gang brtson pa de phan yon no/ /kun tu dga' la sogs pa dag /mi snang la sogs rab tu 'grub/ /kun rten rab tu spyad dge can/ /rten can sbyor ba
@#/ /rab tu dben/ /dngos grub mchog tu rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ zhi ba'i las sgrub pa dang lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /bar chad zhi byed gtor ma yi/ /cho ga
mchog ni bshad du gsol/ /sems can don du brtson ldan bgyi/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so rdo rje 'chang ba gtso/ /bar
chod zhi ba'i cho ga dang / /dngos grub thabs kyi cho ga ni/ /gtor ma kun gyi gter 'gyur bshad/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i snod mchog tu/ /bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i/ /phun
sum tshogs pa rab tu bya/ /stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro bas/ /bruM las mdzes pa'i snod bskyed de/ /khaM las kha zas nam mkha'i khams/ /mnyam par bsams te sngags 'di
brjod| |oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhUM phaT swAhA zhes brjod do/ /bdud rtsir bsams te rab tu spel/ /spel ba gnyis kyis rnam par sbyangs/ /nam mkhar
hrIHlas pad+ma brgyad/ /dpag tu med pa bsam bya ste/ /gtso bo mgon po rnam thos bu/ /gnod sbyin bye tshogs kyis bskor cing / /klu brgyad kyis mchod spyan drangs bya/ /gnod sbyin
rgyal po de dag la/ /rmugs 'dzin gang ba bzang po dang / /nor bzang ku be ra dang ni/ /yang dag 'brog gnas lnga rtsen dang / /tsi pi kuN+Da li rnams ni/ /'khor gyi tshul gyis gtso la bskor//
phyogs dang mtshams su bsam par bya/ /bye ba'i 'khor tshogs thun mong yin/ /klu brgyad gnod sbyin phyi na 'o/ /de nas lcags kyus spyan drangs la/ /ma bral gtso dang lcags kyu'o/ /bzhon
pa seng+ge rta yi tshogs/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / /nor bu rin chen ral gri dang / /gri mdung khang brtsegs ral gri phub/ /mtshon cha sna
tshogs 'phyar bar bsgom/ /spyan 'dren tshe na rnga sogs dang / /dung chen 'bras spos dag ni dbul/ /oM bai shra ba Na sa pa ri wA ra sa ma dza dzaHhUM baM ho oM bai swAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na A kaR+Sha
ya hUM dzaH/ zhes spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ces pa ni/ bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags so/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa dag ni nam

mkha' ru/ /rab tu mchod de spro bar bya/ /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni Adz+nyA pa ya ti i maM ba liM grih+Na tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tshan+tu ma ma kar+m+ma mo g+ha swAhA/ oM bai shra ma NA

pa swAhA| oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pur+Na b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya swAhA /oM saM pra dz+nyA nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ye thA na ya swAhA/ oM pAny+tsi kA ya swAhA/ oM tsi bi kuN+Da li ne
@#/ /swAhA| gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so/ /de nas mchod de mgron rnams gtang / /'od zer lcags kyu dgrol nas su/ /dkrol ba'i dus na gshegs dang
mnyam| |mnyam langs spyod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i
dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pa'i don du 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku'i ba spu nas 'od zer spros te rnam thos
sras 'khor bcas kyi thugs bskul nas 'khor der 'dus te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te rin po che'i phye mas gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag ni/ chos skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi ba lags te/ bdag gis chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi chos srung zhing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir bdag
nyid kyi gsang ba bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so/ /rang
gi gsang ba legs par shod cig /ngas rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyis kyang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kyis legs par smros
shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rnam thos kyi bu rang gi stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi rig pa 'di smras so/ /oM bai shra ba NA ya hUM hUM pa tsa pa tsa
tshin+da tshin+da swAhA/ zhes brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sngags 'di'i sgrub pa ni/ 'di lags te/ gang zhig de dag sgrub
par 'dod pa des dus gsum du mchod pa rgya chen po bshams te bdag 'khor dang bcas pa mchod la sems rtse gcig dang ldan pas gnas dben par 'dug ste bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rje sgom pa pos bdag gi sngags de khri phrag gcig bzlas/ de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar bdag sgrub pa dang bdag gi las sgrub pa po des
bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /de la bdag dang bdag gi 'khor rnams la mchod pa dang gtor ma rgya chen po dbul ba'i sngags

ni| 'di rnams yin te/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swAhA/ oM dzam+b+ha lA ya swAhA/ oM pUr+Na pha drA ya swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swAhA/ oM ku be rA ya swAhA/ oM saM pradz+nyA nA ya swAhA/ oM gu h+ye thA nA ya
swAhA| oM pAny+tsi kA ya swAhA/ oM pi tsi kuN+Da li ne swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags de ni/ bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /de
@#/ /nas bdag gi las sgrub pa ni/ bdag gis bshad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes gsol nas 'di'i las bshad pa ni/ /gang
zag gang gis sgrub 'dod pas/ /bsad dang sbyin sreg mnan pa gsum/ /rim pa ji bzhin shes par bya/ /bsgrub bya bstan la sdang ba rnams/ /spra tshil la sogs gzugs byas
la| |dgug dang gzhug sogs dbang du bya/ /yig 'bru bco brgyad sngags kyis ni/ /dus gsum brdegs par rab byas nas/ /'phral du yid ches 'joms pa ste/ /bsgrub bya
gsod par the tshom med/ /gal te sbyin sreg byed pa na/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las/ /'dir ni drag pos bsgral bar bya/ /mer sbar tsha la rab bsreg bya/ /thab khung rab dang
'bring tha ma/ /rab kyis mtho gsum 'bring gis do/ /tha mas mtho gang tshad du bya/ /bud shing tsher ma can shing gis/ /kun tu drag po rab tu sgrub/ /bag zan yungs kar mer sreg
cing / /sdang ba'i lus ngag yid gsum rnams/ /rdzas la bstims te sbyin sreg bya/ /'khor bcas gnod sbyin mer bsams te/ /bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa'am/ /las
me gnod sbyin rdzas kyis brab/ /gang ltar byas kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /de tshe bstod pa 'dis kyang ni/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya/ /hUM| kun 'dul mi bzad gnod
sbyin sogs/ /gdug pa dbal tsha rab tu 'jigs/ /khro bo rngam pa cher sgrog pa/ /'khor bcas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /oM bai shra ba Na puSh+pa hUM swAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na d+hu pe hUM

swAhA| oM bai shra ba Na dI pai hUM swAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na gan+d+he hUM swAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na ne wid+ye hUM swAhA/ gtso bo gnod sbyin 'khor kyang mchod/ /de nas rim pas mchod pa ni/ /gsang sngags

kun tu spel te bzla/ /spro dang bsdu ba kun tu bya/ /spel byed kun gyi thun mong yin/ /oM bai shra ba Na che ge mo mA ra ya phaT swAhA/ gtso bo ji ltar 'khor kyang de/ /rang gi rig bas mchod par bya/ /rig
pa kun tu brten byas nas/ /rdul phran bzhin du brlag par bsam/ /'phrin las bcol la gtor ma gtang / /mchod dang gtor ma'i rim pa ni/ /go rim bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /
zhi ba'i las kyi rim pa ni/ /thab khung mtho gang tshad nyid la/ /bsreg rdzas la sogs rab tu dbul/ /lus ngag yid gsum sdig bcom nas/ /ye shes me yi ngo bor bya/ /snod dang
thabs ni dor bar bya/ /der ni gdon rnams kun sreg cing / /bgegs chen zhi ba'i las kyang bya/ /rgyas dang dbang du bya ba la/ /las dang bye brag rim pa rnams/ /sngar bshad pa yi
las bzhin du/ /thab dbyibs bye brag shes par bya/ /ser dang dmar ba'i bud shing sogs/ /rim pa rdzas ldan dbul pa ni/ /oM bai shra ba NA ya d+ha naM puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ oM bai shra ba Na ba
@#/ /shiM ku ru swAhA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ gtso bo ji bzhin 'khor bcas ni/ /rigs pa'i rdzas kyis mchod par bya/ /bsreg pa'i rdzas ni bag zan
dang / /yungs kar mdar sogs rim pas mchod/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi kun 'grub ste/ /brtse bar brtson pas nye bar 'grub/ /'bring dang tha mas 'bring dang ni/ /tha ma nyid du shes
par gyis/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnam thos kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis bshad pa'i las
'di rnams sgrub pa po des dus rgyun du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin rnams la dkar gsum gyis mchod par bya/ /chang kun tu sbang bar bgyi'o/ /sha rnams
ni 'os pa dang / shis pa drang bar bya'o/ /de ltar rtse gcig gis bdag cag sgrub pa de rnams kyi 'phrin las ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag gis ma bsgrubs na/ bdag cag gis
bcom ldan 'das la 'khus par gyur cing / bdag cag gis chos ma bskyangs par byas pa yin no/ /de la bdag gi bro tshig ni/ 'di yin no/ /oM bai shra ba Na ar+tha kha thaM zhes
pa'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam thos kyi bu chen po legs so/ /shin tu rab tu legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gi don du rang gi gsang ba smras
pa ni| don chen po dang ldan no/ /ngas kyang de rnams kyi don nges par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di bshad kyi/ nyon cig /bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes rnam thos kyi bu
la sogs pa rnams ltar nyan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra pA Ni nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra s+pho Ta hUM phaT swAhA/ rig pa 'di ni/ las thams cad dbang du sdud
pa'i sngags so/ /rnam thos kyi bu chen pos ji ltar khas blangs pa ltar gsang ba dang ldan par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gyur zhes smras nas gnod sbyin mi snang bar gyur to/ /rdo rje sa 'og
gi rgyud las/ rnam thos sras kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du gdug pa can la snun pa'i 'khor lo bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar thugs
kyis gnang nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer kun tu khyab par spros te/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par mdzad nas lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ ngas
bgegs la snun pa'i 'khor lo bshad kyi/ khyod rtse gcig tu nyon cig /de ltar 'tshal zhes ltar nyan no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig 'khrul 'khor byed
@#/ /'dod pas/ /nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya/ /snod bcud rdo rje gtum por sgom/ /rlung las ri rab mthar thug pa/ /
rdul snyed grangs kyi sku ru bsam/ /dbus na phyag rdor rnal 'byor bsgom/ /ri bong 'dzin pa zhabs kyis brdabs/ /stong gsum tshad kyi zla ba la/ /bgegs chen kun tu 'dar
bar bsgom/ /sku la nyi ma stong ldan pa'i/ /gzi brjid bzod dka'i 'od zer gyis/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'tshig par bsgom/ /ljags las bzlas pa'i sngags phreng
gis| |stong gsum gang bar rab tu bsgom/ /rgyan du byas pa'i klu brgyad kyis/ /kha blangs chen po btang ba las/ /lha klu thams cad skrag par 'gyur/ /thugs las khro spros de
dag gis/ /bskal pa'i rlung ltar 'thor bar 'gyur/ /phyag gis rdo rje rab bsnun pas/ /sgyogs gzer bzhin du bsnun par 'gyur/ /hUM hUM 'brug ltar rab tu sgrog /skad kyis
kun tu bkug par bsam/ /de ltar byas gyur thams cad 'grub/ /las kyis mnar ba 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje mi shes par/ /gang zhig gzhan du skal dman par/ /
'di la gang 'grub thams cad 'grub/ /mchog dang thun mong bye brag go /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las bsnun pa'i 'khor lo ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang 'khrul
'khor gyi/ /cho ga rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/ /gro ga'am shing shun dag la ni/ /re mig nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i/ /'khor lo dag ni rab bris te/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la brtsam/ /rtse gcig
sems kyis rab tu bri/ /dbus su drag po'i yi ge dgod/ /gnyis par nor 'dzin yi ge ste/ /gsum par badzra zhes pa dang / /bzhi pa chu yig dang po dgod/ /lnga par ni ni rab tu dgod//
mtshams bzhir bsgrub bya'i gsod snying bri/ /de ni nang gi re mig go /phyi yi re mig bcu gnyis la/ /oM spangs yi ge bcu gnyis la/ /de yi gsang sngags 'di yin te/ /nI lAm+pa ra d+ha
ra badzra pA Ni hUM phaT ces bya'o/ /rab tu rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gar dril te gzhug /dang po mtha' nas dril bar bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg cho ga bya/ /gal te mnan pa
byed 'dod pas/ /sngar bzhin 'khrul 'khor rdzogs byas nas/ /mtha' ru mnan pa'i cho ga bya/ /khaM phor gsar pa kha sbyar du/ /bcug nas rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /rdo rje sbyin gyis rab sbyar
nas| |gtsug lag khang sogs mnan par bya/ /gal te re mig mi 'dod na/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo la/ /hUM yig dbus su rab dgod de/ /lhag ma bcu gnyis rtsibs la
dgod/ /bri ba rdzogs na snying gar gzhug /dgug dang gzhug sogs byas la bsreg /mi 'dod mnan pa'i cho ga bya/ /mar gyi dus la shis pa yin/ /'khrul 'khor ji ltar bris pa
@#/ /ltar/ /gang 'dod las la the tshom med/ /dper na me lces rtsa bsregs 'dra/ /gang yin gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /bri ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga ste rdo rje sa
'og gi rgyud las bri ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi cho ga ste le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas yang lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad zab
mo'i spyod yul lags pas sbyin sreg la sogs pas grol bar cad 'gyur lags sam/ bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ zhes zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag
na rdo rje snying rje che/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis rab nyams te/ /dkyil 'khor rdzas kyis sbyor ldan zhing / /sbyin sreg las dang de nyid shes/ /sdom par dam tshig rgyud ldan na/ /mtshan mas grol bar
'gyur ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rdzas la sogs/ /med na dngos grub mi 'grub pas/ /sbyin sreg las ni 'bad pas brtsam/ /'phrin las bzhi yi sbyin sreg las/ /drag
po'i rim pa bya ba ni/ /gru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /dbus su zur gsum khru re tshad/ /zabs su khru phyed brko bar bya/ /phyi rol rim pa gsum ldan pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i
mtshan ma bri/ /rim pa gsum la rdo rje yi/ /rtse gsum phreng gis bskor ba bri/ /mtshams su lcags kyu bri bar bya/ /tsher ma can gyis shing bu ni/ /khru gang tshad kyis rab
tu shis| |dug dang khrag dang ske tshe sogs/ /rdzas ni rim par shes par bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul gzugs
su bsam/ /mchod pa'i rim pa rab tu dbul/ /de la sbyin sreg gi sngags gsungs pa 'di yin te/ oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra/ oM badzra dz+wa la a nA la ha na sa rba du Sh+Ta na sarba b+ha smi ku ru nI lAm+ba
ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT ces pas rdzas rnams bsreg go /dug khrag ske tshe lan tshwa las/ /gzugs byas rab tu bsgrubs te bsreg /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni yak+Sha

khA da ya khA da ya ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya mo ha ya mo ha ya sha trUM A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ gzugs la brab pa'i sngags so/ /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sha trUM gr-ih+Na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dzaH'gro ba dgug
pa'i sngags so/ /de ltar sbyin sreg rab byas nas/ /chu bo bskams dang klu shing bcad/ /glang chen g.yang lhung me chen 'bar/ /nad dang yams sogs byung ba'i tshe/ /zhi ba mchog gi las
bsgrubs te/ /thab khung zlum po rab dkar ba/ /rim pa gsum ldan khru gang tshad/ /zabs su khru phyed brkos byas nas/ /zhi ba'i las kyi cho ga bya/ /de ltar byas na mtshan ma yi/ /dngos grub
thob par the tshom med/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /gus pas rgyud don rab tu zungs/ /'gro ba'i don la rab brtson gyis/ /kye ma rgyud chen mchog tu gsang / /byin rlabs sngon du cher 'byung
@#/ /ba| |ston pa rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs/ /rab tu 'bad pas sgrub par gyis/ /dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //
de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /dpal chen gdan la rab bzhengs nas/ /lag na rdo rje la gzigs nas/ /las kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la/ /gang
'dod pa yi gzugs byas te/ /snying gar 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhug /bdag nyid las kyi lhar gsal bar/ /ga 'u nang du rab bcug ste/ /tshon gyi tha gu sna lnga dkri /snying ga'i
lcags kyu rab bkug nas/ /yi ge bcu gsum 'khrul 'khor bzlas/ /'gul g.yo yi ni rtags byung nas/ /chu chen gzhung la gtang bar bya/ /gal te rtags de ma byung na/ /d+ha
du ra yi khu ba dang / /khrag dang dug bsres rab byugs te/ /tsher ma can gyi shing mes bsreg /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni stam+b+ha ya mo ha ya ban+d+ha ya da ha nA ya hUM hUM phaT/
dus gsum dag tu bdugs byas na/ /skad ngan sna tshogs 'don par byed/ /de nas sngags 'di chu la dor/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ tshon gyis dril nas rab tu bor/ /bsam pas

ba tshwa'i rgya mtshor bsgyur/ /de nas mi ldog bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags 'di rgyun du bzla bar bya/ /oM nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM stam+b+ha ya nan phaT ces rgyun du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas las
de nges par 'grub bo/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ bskrad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sems can rnams kyi don du sngags
kyi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags las thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs gsang
ba'o| |'dis ni/ ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'ching ba sgrub pa la ni/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni/ rdo rje rab tu
gdengs pas so/ /sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni/ rdo rje bzhad pas so/ /thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni/ rdo rje hUM sgras so/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos
grub la ni/ rdo rje ku mu das bya'o/ /klu thams cad 'dul bal ni/ rma bya'i mjug sgros bya'o/ /dgra thams cad bsad pa la ni/ 'khrul 'khor gyis so/ /nor sgrub par 'dod na dzam+b+ha la'i
chu sbyin gyis bya'o/ /bgegs 'phang bar 'dod na ting nge 'dzin gyis bya'o/ /thams cad 'gugs pa la ni/ rdo rje lcags kyus bya'o/ /rims srung ba la ni/ rtswa ku sha'i 'brum bus bya'o/ /
klu sgrub par 'dod na tshar bu'i lcug ma dang / bdud rtsi'i chus bya'o/ /pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par 'dod na gu gul gyis bya'o/ /las rnams la sngags 'bum gyis bya'o/ /rdo rje sa
@#/ /'og gi rgyud las/ sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi/ /nges pa 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang zhig dngos
grub 'grub 'dod pas/ /dam tshig sdom dang rab ldan pas/ /bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgoms te/ /ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHdgug sogs bya/ /rang snying zla bar
sngags kyi phreng / /dngul sbram lta bur rab bsams te/ /myur dal gsal dang mi gsal spang / /yid kyis bsgrims pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas kyang mchod/ /rab tu bsgrims
pa'i bzlas pa 'dis/ /gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'grub/ /oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra pA Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags
so| |oM badzra pA Ni ti Sh+Tha hUM/ thugs brtan pa'i sngags so/ /sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba dang / /gsung gi gsang bam lus pas/ /myur du byang chub la reg 'gyur/ /gang tshe sgrub la brtson
ldan pa| |tshe gcig 'bras bu myur thob 'gyur/ /gnyis med rang bzhin rdo rje can/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun tu khyab/ /brjod med rtog bral de nyid don/ /lhun grub ngang la rab tu gzhag/
hUM dang AHyi rnam pa can/ /ji ltar chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /ma yengs sems kyis rgyun du bsgom/ /e ma'o mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /mchog las mchog tu rnam par rgyal/ /e ma'o
sprul pa'i rnam pa sku/ /sgra la rab tu dmigs pa med/ /dge chen kun gyi spyod yul yin/ /rang gsal nyid la rnam par dag /mchog gi byang chub tshul du gnas/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud
las| nges pa dang rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /'gro ba'i mgon la rab gzigs te/ /srung ba'i cho ga rab tu gsungs/ /lag na rdo rje
rab tu nyon/ /'gro ba gdug pas zin gyur pa/ /zangs ma dag la dud 'gro'i gzugs/ /legs pa dag tu rab byas te/ /khong pa dngul la sogs pas dgang / /gang nas 'dod pa'i
sa phyogs sam/ /rang lus dag la legs sbas nas/ /srung ba dam par 'gyur ba 'o/ /bde gshegs sku gdung ring bsrel can/ /rab tu gnas pa legs byas te/ /gang gnod sar ni
rab sbas na/ /bden stobs brjod pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /bya la sogs pa'i byol song tshogs/ /yid 'ong mdzes pa'i dud 'gro la/ /sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye tshogs kyis/ /gsungs
pa'i gzungs sngags dag gis ni/ /skud pa sngon po dag dang ni/ /dar la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ /bden pa bdar la rab tu bsngos/ /gtor ma btang na zhi bar 'gyur/ /kham phor
la sogs snod gtsang mar/ /sman dang dar sogs rab bcug ste/ /me tog skud sogs mchod byas te/ /sa la sbas la gnod pa rnams/ /zhi ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/ /skud pa dkar
@#/ /po sum sgril la/ /mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ /sgrub dang bsgrub pa'i mchod pa bya/ /rgyal la rab tu mgul du btags/ /bar chod bzlog par 'gyur bar
nges| |yungs kar mar dang mu zi rnams/ /cha snyoms lus la rab byugs na/ /gdug pas zin las thar bar 'gyur/ /ba gu na da'i me tog dang / /'da' hu na da'i 'bras bu la/ /
smin drug dus su rab bsgrubs na/ /gdug pa phyogs su mi gnas so/ /stag dang dred dang 'ja' thar gyi/ /spus ni gdug pa las grol 'gyur/ /'bab chu rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ /
lus srung bya ba mthar phyin par/ /byas na mchog tu srung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang ba khyod kyis zungs/ /mthar phyin zla ba sprin gza' las/ /grol ba lta bur 'gyur ba yin/ /dpal
rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //lag na rdo rjes legs smras pa/ /bsdu ba sngags kyi cho ga ni/ /ji ltar legs so rdo rje 'chang / /khyed la rab tu nyan
par 'tshal/ /nyon cig rdo rje 'chang ba khyod/ /sngags btu khyod la bshad par bya/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /'dod don thams cad
rab 'grub pa/ /der ni gsang sngags btu bar bya/ /dbus su yi ge'i bdag po gzhag /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /yi ge i ni rab tu sbyar/ /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /
lnga pa yi ni mtha' dang sbyar/ /de nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa gzhag /de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhag /de nas bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gzhag /de nas mthar gnas gnyis pa gzhag /de nas
lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /ra dang bcas pa gzhag par bya/ /de nas lnga pa'i dang po la/ /A yig rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de nas gsum pa'i tha ma la/ /i ni
rab tu sbyar te gzhag /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /yi ge u ni rab tu sbyar/ /stong pas mnan pas nyis 'gyur dang / /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la/ /gsum pa yi ni dang po sbyar/ /yi ge
bcu gsum rig pa'i sngags/ /brtse bas brtson par rab bzlas na/ /gang 'dod dngos grub nges par 'gyur/ /kye ma'o rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bla med lam/ /phyag
na rdo rje'i dngos grub 'thob/ /dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /spyan mig 'od zer sprul mdzad
nas| |slob ma rab tu smin bya'i phyir/ /dbang bskur cho ga rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /gsang dang ldan pa dbang thob cing / /dul dang drang dang shes nyen che/ /g.yo chud dang
bzang byang sems thob/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga rab mkhas pa/ /slob ma dam pa dbang bskur phyir/ /yid 'ong gtsug lag khang sogs su/ /brtul zhugs sngon du legs spyad nas/ /de nas
@#/ /sa yi cho ga bya/ /brtag dang sbyang zhing bslang ba dang / /mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa dang / /rmi lam mtshan ma'i sgo nas brtag /zhi ba'i cho gas sbyin sreg ni//
brgya rtsa brgyad kyi cho ga bya/ /'byung po rnams la mchod cing bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab gnas te/ /hUM las rdo rje chen po bsgom/ /bruM las gzhal yas khang chen bsgom//
spyan gnyis nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis/ /bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gtsod do/ /rdo rje chen po gar 'gros kyis/ /sa gzhi lan gsum bskor bar bya/ /ba yi rnam lngas legs
byugs te/ /tshom bu gcig gis lha dgod bya/ /mchod dang bstod dang snyan gsan dbab/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /slob ma cho gas rab sbyin bya/ /thig dang tshon gyi
cho ga ni| |las kyi cho ga bzhin du bya/ /gdong g.yogs dar ni sngon po yis/ /slob ma dag ni gzhug par bya/ /sdom ldan dbang bskur lngas bskur ro/ /bum pa dang po rdo rje
dang / /dril bu dbu rgyan ming gi dbang / /las kyi cho ga ji bzhin no/ /tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu gsum la/ /slob ma las la gzud par bya/ /byin rlabs rim pas 'pho ba dang / /
'phral du yid ches bskyed par bya/ /rin chen snying po dri med rgyud/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ni/ /'dir dbang bskur ba dam pa yin/ /smin pa'i las la brten pa yi/ /dbang
bskur mchog gi rgyud gsungs pas/ /rab gnas dge ba sdom pa ldan/ /dam pa yon gyis mnyes par bya/ /grol ba mthar phyin rab tu gnas/ /slob ma smin pa'i cho ga 'o/ /rdo rje
sa 'og gi rgyud las/ slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to| |bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi don du thugs kyi gsang ba bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje mi
bzang khyod/ /gzhan don bag brtson legs so legs/ /gang zhig dus kyi snyigs ma la/ /gdul dka'i sems can 'dul 'dod pas/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed la/ /tshogs
gnyis kun rdzogs mthar phyin pas/ /rin chen snod du pad+ma'i gter/ /dbus su gsang ba'i bdag po can/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad/ /sbrul mgos brgyan pa dgod par bya//
khrus dang gtsang sbra dang ldan pas/ /las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dang por spyan drang rab mchod nas/ /bdag dang lha gnyis 'phro 'dur bzlas/ /klu brgyad zhi bar 'gyur sems kyis//
hUM dang hUM gi thag pa las/ /bsgrub bya 'od kyi phung por bya/ /skad cig mas ni hUM du bslang / /oM badzra kro d+ha a hi tsaN+Da phaT/ khri bzlas gdon las nges grol 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje khyod
@#/ /kyis ni| |thugs kyi 'phro 'du gsang ba yin/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni tshon gyis dkri/ hUM chen phreng ba'i 'phro 'dus bcad/ /rdzas chen rnams la rab brtags
nas| |nges par gdon las grol bar 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma grub na/ /sngags kyi phreng ba ldog ste bzlas/ /rdo rje phreng bas rab bcad na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par
'gyur| |'og gi bgegs zlog cho ga mchog /yid bzhin nor ltar 'byung ba yin/ /theg pa gsum las nges rgyal ba'i/ /rgyud chen gsang ba mthar thug pa/ /skyob pa thugs
kyi dam pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor rnams dang / lha'i tshogs thams cad yi rang
ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gsang ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //
kha che'i paN+Di ta tse lu dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya badzra pA Ni nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA tA lA nA ma
tan+t+ra| bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje sa 'og ces bya ba'i rgyud/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sa 'og rim pa bdun klu'i rgyal po'i gnas na rin po che'i khri la bzhugs te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / rigs ldan la sogs te
klu rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang thabs cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye bas
'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / ltas byung bas 'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas brgyal bar gyur te/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa/ 'od zer 'di 'gyur ba dang / ltas byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa las grub
pas 'bras bu yang tshad med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba las bslang du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas 'od zer brgya stong du ma bkye
ste| 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis brgyal ba las bslangs so/ /de nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis ched du brjod pa/ e ma thabs chen thugs rje yis/ /'jig rten thams cad brgyal
gyur na| |thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis/ /brgyal ba thams cad bslangs par gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten ba rnams sa 'og rim pa bdun gyi klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'dus par
@#/ /gyur nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las can/ /ston pa bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jig rten rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /
rdul bral chos rnams bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ badzra a b+hi ShIny+tsa badzra pA Ni hUM/ zhes gsungs bas snod dang ldan par byas so/ /de nas klu rgyal po
rnams 'khrugs so/ /shin tu yid 'khrugs nas kha g.yab cing brang brdungs te/ kye ma kyi hud bdag klu'i gnas dang / ston pa ni/ 'jig rten pas 'phrog pas 'jig rten pa
rnams brlag par bya'o zhes zer nas klu'i kha'i rlangs pas 'jig rten pa rnams la mdze'i nad btang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs ka'i dpal be'u las nad sel ba'i 'od/ zhal nas kyang badzra da ya zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas te byung ba me long la has btab pa bzhin
du song ngo / /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis klu bran rnams bskul nas la la tsa nas zhugs so/ /la la dbang po'i sgo nas zhugs so/ /la la rus pa nas zhugs pa la bcom ldan
'das kyis dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la dbugs kyis bsregs so/ /dbang po la zhugs pa dang / rus pa la zhugs pa sreg pa'i
'khor los bcom mo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams cher 'khrugs nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la snang ba re re chad nas lus la dkri bas byang chub kyi sems dang ldan te rgyan du song
ngo / /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bstod pa/ 'jig rten 'di na klu rgyal mthu chen yang / /bcom ldan brgya yi ba spu'i char mi phod/ /de na bcom ldan 'gro ba skyob pa la/ /klu yi rgyal
po rnams kyis rtag tu bstod/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la yang dang yang du phyag
'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ ser sna'i dbang gis dbul gyur pa/ /nor rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ /mdun gyi phyag na rdo rje yi/ /ye shes sems dpa'i phyag g.yas par/ /
dzam+b+ha la ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid sngags kyi rgyal po zlos/ /snying gar 'od zer dag gis ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' bskul bar bya/ /ye shes sems dpas dzam+b+ha la'i/ /sngags
ni zlas pa nyid du bsgom/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas/ /'od byung dzam+b+ha la bskul lo/ /nor gyis rgya mtsho gang bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje
'dzin la gsol ba btab pa/ nyes pa shin tu phra mo la/ /grags dang rnyed pa'i don du ni/ /'jig rten gnod byed sgrub byed pa/ /thog ser zlog pa bshad du gsol/ /thog mar mchod
@#/ /rten sngon po brtsig /rab gnas gzhung dang mthun par bya/ /de yi 'og tu 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas pa bri/ /rtsibs la lha srin snying po

bri| |k+hAM d+ha/ ts+hA d+ha/ tsh+hA d+ha/ sh+ha d+ha/ a+hoM d+ha/ m+ho d+ha/ t+hoM d+ha/ s+t+ha d+ha/ dbus su sngags mkhan bri bar bya/ /de nas thod pa'i nang du gzhug /thod pa mchod rten 'og tu mnan/ /snying po'i
'od kyis sngags mkhan dang / /lha srin 'khor dang bcas pa dgug /de la thun gyis brab par bya/ /'byung po 'khrugs pa'i dus su ni/ /ston pa'i nga rgyal ldan pa la/ /mthe bong
dang ni mthe chung la/ /hUM las phyag na rdo rje bskyed/ /mthe chung phyag na rdo rje yi/ /thugs nas phyag na rdo rje ni/ /zhags pa lcags kyu thogs pa spro/ /snying gi lcags kyus dgug pa dang //
mgrin pa zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /mthe bong phyag na rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje las ni rdo rje spro/ /bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/ /ba spu'i gshis na rdo rje 'phro/ /nam mkha' thams
cad rdo rjer grub/ /yungs kar rdo rjer bskyed la brab/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho ston
pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /tshar gcad rjes gzung gsungs pa mtshar/ /dbul dang yi dwags gnas las thar/ /rdo rje 'og go rgyud las/ nor
sgrub pa dang gnod pa zlog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ klu dang
gnod sbyin sa bdag gi/ mdze dang dmu chu ji ltar bzlog /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /mdo sdes ni/ las kyi rnam par smin pa mi bzlog la
sngags kyis bzlog pas khyad par du 'phags so/ /de la klu zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa gti mug shas che bas chags pa dang zhe sdang yang che ste/ gti mug gi dbang gis gnyid che ba
dang / zhe sdang gi dbang gis skye ba bdun du mi gtong ba dang / chags pa'i dbang gis chags pa la gnas pa'i lus la zhugs nas mi gtong ba'o/ /klu gdol pa can gyis mthong ba
tsam gyis nang skyed do/ /rigs gsum ni/ reg pa tsam gyis nad skyed do/ /klu bran rnams ni/ steng sgo gsum nas zhugs nas lus kyi bcud za bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ de rnams ji ltar 'dul bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sngags 'di
gsungs so/ /nA ga bi dA rA NA dzaH/ nA ga uta sA da na ya dzaH/ sbyor ba gsum la legs gnas pas/ /'jigs ba'i gzugs kyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
@#/ /'das kyis klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dbugs las sngags 'di rnams phyung ngo / /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha

bud+d+ha| bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra na gA nAM/ tshin+da tshin+da nA ga hri da yA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da nA ga mar+m+ma Ni bi ShIR+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA
ga na ya ni/ 'jigs shing skrag ste brgyal bar 'gyur/ /snying gar yi ge hUM bsgoms pas/ /klu rnams thams cad bsregs gyur pas/ /bde ba can gyi gnas su skye/ /byang
chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ de la 'jug pa'i gnas du mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa bzhi dag nas zhugs gyur nas/ /rtsa rnams na
zhing tsha ba dang / /steng sgo mi bde rdul yang 'byung / /rmugs dang gnyid kyi bdag nyid can/ /sha mdog lbu ba lta bu ste/ /rmi lam du ni chu 'od 'byung / /de nas chags pa spyad
par bya| |dbang po gsum du zhugs gyur na/ /dbang po sbrid cing lus kyang 'dar/ /sha ni skam zhing rus pa na/ /de la chags pa mi spyad do/ /sa yi dbang po kun nas 'jug /ba
spu'i khung bu dmar zhing 'gyur/ /phol dang sha bkra 'byung ba dang / /rmi lam du ni byol song 'byung / /rgyal po dang ni rtsa bzhir 'jug /tho rangs mi dga' mngon shes smra/ /gnyid
chung ba spu'i gshis kyang dkar/ /gu gul nag po bsten par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ nad de 'tsho ba dang mi 'tsho ba'i rnam pa ji ltar lags/ rdo rje 'dzin
pas gsungs pa/ bsnyen pa mtshan ma thob pa yis/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang gla rtsi dang / /'bras bu gsum dang rma bya'i sha/ /ril bu byas la rgal tshigs gzhag /de yi bar du rma bya'i sgro/ /
mdangs dang ldan na 'tsho bar nges/ /nag por gyur na mi 'tsho 'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la tshar gcod pa'i thabs du mchis/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang 'khrul 'khor sman dang sreg /thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dbang bskur dam tshig ldan pa dang / /
bsnyen pa brtan par gyur pa yis/ /dang por sngags kyis bzlog par bya/ /snying ga'i sngags kyi rgyal po yis/ /rlung dang 'grogs te 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nad kyi snying po hUM bsams te//
rgyu rkyen tshogs pas bsreg par bya/ /de nas phyir bzlog mnan par bya/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /dang po zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ste/ /zlum po khru gang kha dog dkar/ /kha khyer
sor bzhir rdo rjes mtshan/ /gru gsum sor bcu kha dog nag /kha khyer sor gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ /zla dbyibs zla ba dmar 'dra ba/ /khru do kha khyer de 'drar shes/ /zhi ba 'o ma can shing
@#/ /gi/ gtum pa 'bigs par byed de'o/ /dbang yang zhi ba dag dang mtshungs/ /rgyun bzhag me dang rigs ngan khyim/ /raM las thab dang me lha bskyed/ /zhi
rgyas dbang la bdud rtsi lnga/ /gtum pa dmar dang khrag dag dang / /dug dang gu gul nag po dang / /gzugs brnyan dag gis mchod par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa
mchog gi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po Tak+kis dbang bskur zhing / /shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg /'jigs byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gzi brjid
chen po me yi lha/ /'dod pa thams cad rab stsol zhing / /bdag gzhan phan sogs la zhugs pa/ /tshangs sras mchog la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /me yi thugs kar drag po ni//
cho ga bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /sbyin sreg de dag 'brel pa yis/ /nor rnams thams cad ster bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'dzin pa la zhus pa/ drag po'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas lha srin thams cad 'dul ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi d+ha ra NA
ya hUM phaT/ nA ga uta sa da nA ya hUM phaT/ nI laM ba sa nA ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta ya hUM phaT/ kr-i tAn+ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha Na ya hUM phaT/

trA sa nA ya hUM phaT/ kuM b+hAN+Da uta sa da nA ya hUM phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha a pasmA ra bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya

nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM brta bi nA sha ka rA ya hUM phaT/ nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hu ta dz+wa la b+hasmiM ku ru
swAhA/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ puSh+Ti ku ru oM/ sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha srin thams cad brgyal bar gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa/ e
ma dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ /drag po 'dul bar dbang bskur nas/ /sngags rgyal gsungs pas skrag 'gyur ba/ /ngo mtshar 'di ni shin tu lhag/ /ces pa'o/ /de nas rang rang gi srog
snying ston pa la phul nas bran gyi tshul du gnas so/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ bcos dka' ba'i nad zlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod pa dang phyag byas nas gsol ba btab pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal
pos| |gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing / /dbang bskur ba yang ma thob na/ /bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo/ /de bas da ni bshad bya ba/ /gru
@#/ /bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi/ /thig bzhi dag dang ldan gyur pas/ /cha chen bzhi ru btab byas na/ /shar gyi cha chen dang por ni/ /bzhir bgos dang po lte
ba dang / /gnyis pa pad+ma ral gri gnyis/ /gsum pa lha yi snam bu 'o/ /de nas tshon ni dgye bar bya/ /lte ba dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas/ /pad+ma sngon po ral gri sngon/ /lha snam
nag la rdo rje'i sgo/ /bzhi ni dkar po bri bar bya/ /sgo yi phyi rol kha dog nag /me ri 'bar ba bri bar bya/ /de la rdo rje phreng bas bskor/ /mda' dang phur bu bcu drug la/ /tshon skud
sngon po bri bar bya/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la/ /klu chen phyed gzugs sbrul mgo can/ /rdzogs par byas nas rnal 'byor ni/ /cho ga bzhin du gnyis ka yi/ /rgyud
las gsungs pa bzhin du bskyed/ /dang po bla ma'i spyan sngar ni/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun rnam dag /de nas ye shes sems dpa' la/ /me tog gtor zhing bstod pa bya//
phyag 'tshal bskor ba bdun rnam dag /byas nas ye shes dbab par bya/ /gnas gsum ye ge gsum bsams la/ /sngags 'di yang ni brjod par bya/ /A be sha ya stam+b+ha
ya rA rA tsA la ya tsA la ya hUM A oM dzaiH/ de nas dkyil 'khor bstan byas la/ /rig pa'i dbang ni cho ga bzhin/ /de nas sngags kyi rjes gnang sbyin/ /rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon
las| |sngags kyi 'od kyis ye shes bskul/ /ye shes ljags las 'od byung las/ /snod gyur lce la thim par bsam/ /bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bkra shis brjod/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las
dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa la mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ snying po kun la phan
gdags dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gzhug don du/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /
gnod sbyin bsgrub par bya ba ni/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa che la smod pa dang / /de sgrub pa la snying nas brnyas/ /sgrub pa 'di ni brtsam
par bya| |de la ri rab kyi 'og na las kyi gnod sbyin gyi lus blangs la gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi yod pa/ gdong dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos pa/ gnyis pa rang gi srog
snying bzla ba/ gsum pa na me lce'i dbugs 'byung / bzhi pa na sha dang khrag za ba yong / de sgrub pa'i thabs bshad kyi/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'bum bzlas la/ /'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bri/ /de yi steng du khrag chen gyis/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa/ /btson dong tshul du bri bar bya//
@#/ /dar sngon de yi nang du bting / /dbus su mi yi sha dang khrag /dang po khyi ste gnyis pa phag /gsum par rna can zangs gtsug phud/ /lnga par skad can drug
par ra| |bdun par skye gnyis brgyad par glang / /g.yas kyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o/ /ma he lug dang spre 'u dang / /g.yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba 'o/ /de ni dbul ba'i dam
tshig go /khrag dang dug dang ske tshe yis/ /nam gyi phyed kyi dus dag tu/ /dur khrod ras la 'di ltar bri/ /zhal brgyad phyag stong yang na bcu/ /zhal bzhi dang po zhi ba ste/ /gnyis pa
dmar po chu srin no/ /gsum pa khro nag yid dang khro/ /bzhi pa yi dwags mgo yin no/ /skra ni gyen brdzes zhal dang mtshungs/ /sprul pa bya rgod khra dang spyang / /de yi mgo can bri bar
bya| |dgug gzhug dbang ni bskrad par bya'o/ /'di ni bsten pa'i dam tshig go /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig gnyis dag gis/ /gsum rgyal dag las shes par bya/ /oM yak+Sha ha sa
ha sa da ra da ra hUM/ khra dang spyang ki khyi la sogs/ /rmi lam du 'am dngos su 'byung / /de nas mchod pa'i dam rdzas kun/ /bsgrub bya'i rdzas dang bsres byas la/ /gzugs
brnyan byas la thod par gzhug /mar ngo gnod sbyin gzugs kyis mchod/ /oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ a pra ti ha ba la ba rA kra mA ya phaT/ sarba sha trUM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya
phaT| nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA ni rAHdz+nyA pa ya ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la phaT/ des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /gzugs brnyan rdul la sbyin sreg bya/ /las skyes gzugs brnyan gong bur
gzhug /des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /oM yak+Sha mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ tsit+ta la rbad rbad/ phyag gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya/ /des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /nI lAM ba sa
nA ya phaT/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngo mtshar nas ched du brjod pa/ zung du 'brel bar gnas gyur pa/ /yaM las rlung ste paM las
pad| |'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems
dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang la gsol ba btab pa/ snying nas slob dpon smod pa la/ /klu gzhug pa ni ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad du gsol/ /klu'i lag na nad bcu
gcig yod de/ mdze dang / mdza' to dang / ka ta ma dang / ka she dang / 'bras dang / phol dang / shu ba dang / skem pa dang / g.yan pa dang / dmu chu dang / gag pa'o/ /klu'i gnas ni/ sa
'og gi rim pa bdun no/ /klu bran ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling na yang yod do/ /'khor ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis/ /gtsang ma'i gos dag gyon nas ni/ /dkar gsum dag kyang bza' bar bya/
@#/ /sngags rgyal nyis 'bum bzlas byas la/ /dkyil 'khor tsan+dan gur gum byug /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bya ste/ /bdag nyid lag na rdo rje la/ /klu chen brgyad
kyis bskor ba bri/ /de la sogs pa bshad zin to/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub phyogs su/ /klu yi gzugs gcig brtsam bya ste/ /rin chen lnga 'am gla rtsi 'am/ /mchod pa'i rdzas
ni 'o ma sogs/ /dang po 'das pa'i mchod pa bya/ /spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bya ba 'o/ /klu yi snying gar hUM bsgoms la/ /'od zer rnam pa gsum dag gis/
klu chen gnas nas dgug par bya/ /gzugs brnyan de la bstims byas la/ /mchod pa dag gis mchod par bya/ /gzugs brnyan g.yo ba 'byung ba na/ /sdang ba'i lus la
gzhug bya ste/ /dbang po brgyad nas gzhug bya ste/ /brgyad cha tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /'o ma gla rtsi kha ra yis/ /lam ni drang por drangs byas la/ /gong bu dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de
la klu chen gzhug par bya/ /sgrub pa po yis gu gul bsten/ /gzugs la phur bus gdab par bya/ /des kyang grub par ma gyur na/ /lha yi rnam pa nyid dag la/ /spogs pa dag

gi cho ga bzhin/ /tad+ya thA/ hUM phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hUM/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba sha truM saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra

badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti sha truM tsit+ta mA ra ya phaT/ oM nA ga g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI lA ya kI lA ya/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra daMSh+Tod A dz+nyA pa ya ti nA ga kA ya bAka
tsi ta badzra kI la ya phaT/ nA ga bi dA rA ya phaT/ nA ga uta sA da nA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brgyal ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas A be sha gsungs pas thams cad kyang dbugs
dbyung zhing brgyal ba sangs nas 'dar zhing thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing / /gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /sngags dang ting
'dzin nus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzhal mi nus/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las/ klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas gtam rgyud bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos lha gnas rnam pa brgyad du rgyud thams cad bsdus nas ri rab kyi byang phyogs su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba'i rgyud gsungs so/ /de nas zhal gsum pa phyag
drug pa'i sngags gsungs pas lha dang lha ma yin gyi rna bar song ngo / /rig sngags 'chang de rnams ngo mtshar nas bstod pa byas so/ /de nas gling gi snying por 'khor gyi snying po gnod
@#/ /sbyin gyi cha 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byon nas mar gyi snying po dang 'dra ba dam pa'i chos rgyud thams cad bsdus so/ /nyid kyi las
gnyis kyi bdag nyid can rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad cu yang dag gsungs so/ /de nas 'jig rten du gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod de sgron ma za ba rdo rjes mgo lus phral te nyams par
byas so| |de nas klu 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sa 'og rim pa bdun du byon nas rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud gsungs so/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi
rgyud las/ gtam rgyud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bya'i gdong
pa can gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a tsa la ma hA kro d+ha rA dza sarba ta thA ga ta s+ya ba lA pa ri mi ta bI ra ba na ya b+hA Shi to nA ma kalpa/ bod skad du/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba de'i stobs dpag tu med pa rtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rlung la bzhugs te rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa rin po che'i gzhal
yas khang bye ba grangs med pa du mas bkod cing yongs su bskor ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
seng+ge'i khri bshams pa rin po ches spras pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnam par snang bar byed pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcags ris yongs su bskor cing shin tu yid
'phrog pa/ steng du rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i rin po che'i bla bres nam mkha'i khams go 'byed par snang bar byed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pad+ma'i rgyal po rin po che sna
bdun gyi rgyu las yang dag par byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ 'od zer chen po phul du byung ba gsal bar byed cing mun nag
thams cad rab tu dang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes las 'khrungs pa'i seng+ge'i khri bsam gyis mi khyab pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems
dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa du mas
yongs su bskor ba der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas chos ston to/ /'di lta ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / byams
@#/ /pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkod pa dang / nam mkha' me tog 'chang dang / nam mkha'i snying po
dang / shin tu rnam dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ nyan thos bye ba phrag tu ma 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal dang /
rta thul dang / 'od srung la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba/ grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / lus ngan po la sogs pas yongs su
bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs kyis chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang
thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi
bsam pa sna tshogs la dgos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod lam gyis zhugs shing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams mdzad do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bsnyen
bkur dang / yongs su mnyes par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul du ma rnams kyang gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa du ma yang mngon par sprul pa mdzad
do| |bkod pa chen po yang bskyed par mdzad do/ /mdor na thabs gnag dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gzigs pa de dang de mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des 'khor chen po rnams la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ bdag gis sna tshogs du ma'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phyung ste tshig dang yi ge du ma bkod pa/ sems can sna
tshogs mgu bar byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags sna tshogs kyis rnam par mtshan par gyur pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi khyad par brjod pa/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/
dbang phyug du ma dang ldan zhing yid 'phrog pa'i yi ge gcig dang / stong phrag brgyad dang / grangs med pa dang / bye ba phrag gsum dang / rjes 'jug dang / ring po dang / thung ngu dang /
nga ro dang / gsal byed kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang / 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang / lha'i gnas la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / mi'i 'gro ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba la thug par phye zhing bcad pa
@#/ /rnams gang bdag gis sems can rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis sems can rnams kyi don du
gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang gzhi dang me tog gi snying pos brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dar bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ bye ba phrag grangs med pa
bdun cu rtsa bdun po de rnams kun gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis thabs sna tshogs kyi cho ga'i sgo bstan to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de rnams la ni/ mngag gzhug dang / mngag gzhug ma
dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo la sogs pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rtog pa'i cho ga yang rgyas par bstan to/ /las sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
kyang bstan te/ sgrub thabs sna tshogs yang dag ldan/ /ras ris cho ga rnam par bstan/ /yang na las kyi cho ga dbye/ /gang du stobs chen gsang ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg
dag ni bdag gis bstan/ /lhag ma de bzhin yul gnas gzhan/ /de nas ma lus me thab dang / /de bzhin zhi ba rgyas pa dang / /dbang du bya dang mngon spyod dang / /de nas
dus kyi khyad par dang / /dkyil 'khor yang ni de bzhin bstan/ /phyag rgya dag kyang ma lus par/ /sa bon dang ni mtshan ma dang / /gsang ba yi ni sngags nyid dang / /rigs kyi mtshan
ma de bzhin sku/ /ma lus pa yi dbyings dang yang / /de lta bu la sogs pa'i las/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bstan/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i rtog pa ni/ /de ni slar yang bdag
gis bshad/ /dag pa'i sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /sngags pas gang zhig bsgrub bya yi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sna tshogs las/ /gsang sngags kyi ni sgrub thabs shig /
rtog pa 'di ru mdor bsdus nas/ /de yi cho ga yang dag bshad/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bsnyen cing / /bsgrubs pas go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sras kyi mchog /chos zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par/ /de ni kun tu dag par 'gyur/ /rtag par rgyun du rnam rtog med/ /nam mkha' yi ni lam la
gnas| |gzugs can lus la brten nas su/ /sems can bye brag thugs su chud/ /sems can zhi ba gdul dka' dang / /bgegs chen dang ni log par 'dren/ /de rnams
gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu sprul/ /mtshan ni mi g.yo zhes bsgrags pa/ /khro bo 'phags pa stobs po che/ /dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul
@#/ /mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi sras/ /de 'dir rgyal mchog rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin rgyal sras kyis rtag par/ /phyag 'tshal tshangs
pa la sogs dang / /lus can thams cad kun tu mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa gzo/ /de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas sras/ /'di kun smon lam yongs rdzogs
shing / /bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes rdzogs/ /mi g.yo zhes bya'i sa thob pas/ /mi g.yo 'di yang de yi mtshan/ /bdud rnams kun gyis mi g.yo bas/ /brtan pa'i
ye shes dri med bzang / /rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /bshad kyi bu khyod tshur nyon cig /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /chos kyi dbyings su rab gzhol
bas| |rtag tu tshe dang nad med mchog /dngos grub myur du stsol mdzad pa/ /rtag tu bgegs rnams sel byed cing / /de bzhin bdud rnams rab tu 'joms/ /sems
can rnams ni bde ba'i phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni rab tu bshad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag
mgrin gcig gi ngag gis gsol pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar
gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
pas gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas nas dpal gyi be'u las byung ba
zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba byas nas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di nas bzung ste ji srid brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas nam mkha'i khams kyi
mthas gtugs pa'i bar du de khyab nas g.yas phyogs nas bskor te/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / nub dang / lho dang / shar gyi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi bar du khebs par byas so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de rnams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /shAkya
mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gzi brjid chen po gang bzhugs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs/ /de ru dri med dam chos nyon/
@#/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba/ /gang thos 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /byang chub 'dus ma byas pa brnyes/ /de nas 'od chen po des
tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rang
rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams nas khro bo'i mthus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyi sems rtse gcig par mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje bsgyings pa sreg pa'i me lce kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos
so| |kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun
tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'jig rten du snang ba chen po
